活板门

> BOOK.FNAM bk_Yagrum's_Book
Tamrielic Lore
《泰姆瑞尔传说》

> BOOK.TEXT bk_Yagrum's_Book
"""<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
Tamrielic Artifacts<BR><BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR><BR>
The following are notes I have gathered, over the past centuries, of items of unimaginable significance. All have been seen, owned, and lost, again and again throughout Tamriel. Some may be myth, others may be hoax, but regardless, many have lost their lives attempting to find or protect these very coveted items. <BR>
<BR>
Lord's Mail<BR>
<BR>
Sometimes called the Armor of Morihaus or the gift of Kynareth, this is an ancient cuirass of unsurpassable quality. It grants the wearer power to absorb health, resist the effects of spells, and cure oneself of poison when used. It is said that whenever Kynareth deigns the wearer unworthy, the Lord's Mail will be taken away and hidden for the next chosen one.<BR>
<BR>
Ebony Mail<BR>
<BR>
The Ebony Mail is a breastplate created before recorded history by the Dark Elven goddess Boethiah. It is she who determines who should possess the Ebony Mail and for how long a time. If judged worthy, its power grants the wearer added resistance of fire, magicka, and grants a magical shield. It is Boethiah alone who determines when a person is ineligible to bear the Ebony Mail any longer, and the goddess can be very capricious.<BR>
<BR>
Spell Breaker<BR>
<BR>
Spell Breaker, superficially a Dwemer tower shield, is one of the most ancient relics of Tamriel. Aside from its historical importance in the Battle of Rourken-Shalidor, the Spell Breaker protects its wielder almost completely from any spell caster, either by reflecting magicks or silencing any mage about to cast a spell. It is said that Spell Breaker still searches for its original owner, and will not remain the property of anyone else for long. For most, possessing Spell Breaker for any length of time is power enough.<BR>
<BR>
Chrysamere<BR>
<BR>
The Paladin's Blade is an ancient claymore with offensive capabilities surpassed only by its own defenses. It lends the wielder health, protects him or her from fire, and reflects any spells cast against the wielder back to the caster. Seldom has Chrysamere been wielded by any bladesman for any length of time, for it chooses not to favor one champion.<BR>
<BR>
Staff of Magnus<BR>
<BR>
The Staff of Magnus, one of the elder artifacts of Tamriel, was a metaphysical battery of sorts for its creator, Magnus. When used, it absorbs an enemy's health and mystical energy. In time, the Staff will abandon the mage who wields it before he becomes too powerful and upsets the mystical balance it is sworn to protect.<BR>
<BR>
Warlock's Ring<BR>
<BR>
The Warlock's Ring of the Archmage Syrabane is one of the most popular relics of myth and fable. In Tamriel's ancient history, Syrabane saved all of the continent by judicious use of his Ring, and ever since, it has helped adventurers with less lofty goals. It is best known for its ability to reflect spells cast at its wearer and to improve his or her speed and to restore health. No adventurer can wear the Warlock's Ring for long, for it is said that the Ring is Syrabane's alone to command.<BR>
<BR>
Ring of Phynaster<BR>
<BR>
The Ring of Phynaster was made hundreds of years ago by a man who needed good defenses to survive his adventurous life. Thanks to the Ring, Phynaster lived for hundreds of years, and since then it has passed from person to person. The Ring improves its wearer's overall resistance to poison, magicka, and shock. Still, Phynaster was cunning and cursed the ring so that it eventually disappears from its holder's possessions and returns to another resting place, discontent to stay anywhere but with Phynaster himself.<BR>
<BR>
Ring of Khajiit<BR>
<BR>
The Ring of the Khajiit is an ancient relic, hundreds of years older than Rajhin, the thief that made the Ring famous. It was Rajhin who used the Ring's powers to make himself invisible and as quick as the breath of wind. Using the Ring, he became the most successful burglar in Elsweyr's history. Rajhin's eventual fate is a mystery, but according to legend, the Ring rebelled against such constant use and disappeared, leaving Rajhin helpless before his enemies.<BR>
<BR>
Mace of Molag Bal<BR>
<BR>
Also known as the Vampire's Mace, the Mace of Molag Bal drains its victims of magicka and gives it to the bearer. It also has the ability to transfer an enemy's strength to its wielder. Molag Bal has been quite free with his artifact. There are many legends about the Mace. It seems to be a favorite for vanquishing wizards. <BR>
<BR>
Masque of Clavicus Vile<BR>
<BR>
Ever the vain one, Clavicus Vile made a masque suited to his own personality. The bearer of the Masque is more likely to get a positive response from the people of Tamriel. The higher his personality, the larger the bonus. The best known story of the Masque tells the tale of Avalea, a noblewoman of some renown. As a young girl, she was grossly disfigured by a spiteful servant. Avalea made a dark deal with Clavicus Vile and received the Masque in return. Though the Masque did not change her looks, suddenly she had the respect and admiration of everyone. A year and a day after her marriage to a well connected baron, Clavicus Vile reclaimed the Masque. Although pregnant with his child, Avalea was banished from the Baron's household. Twenty one years and one day later, Avalea's daughter claimed her vengeance by slaying the Baron.<BR>
<BR>
Mehrunes Razor<BR>
<BR>
The Dark Brotherhood has coveted this ebony dagger for generations. This mythical artifact is capable of slaying any creature instantly. History does not record any bearers of Mehrune's Razor. However, the Dark Brotherhood was once decimated by a vicious internal power struggle. It is suspected that the Razor was involved.<BR>
<BR>
Cuirass of the Savior's Hide<BR>
<BR>
Another of Hircine's artifacts was the Cuirass of the Savior's Hide. The Cuirass has the special ability to resist magicka. Legend has it that Hircine rewarded his peeled hide to the first and only mortal to have ever escaped his hunting grounds. This unknown mortal had the hide tailored into this magical Cuirass for his future adventures. The Savior's Hide has a tendency to travel from hero to hero as though it has a mind of its own.<BR>
<BR>
Spear of Bitter Mercy<BR>
<BR>
One of the more mysterious artifacts is the Spear of Bitter Mercy. Little to nothing is known about the Spear. There are no recorded histories but many believe it to be of Daedric origin. The only known legend about it is its use by a mighty hero during the fall of the Battlespire. The hero was aided by the Spear in the defeat of Mehrunes Dagon and the recapturing of the Battlespire. Since that time, the Spear of Bitter Mercy has made few appearances within Tamriel.<BR>
<BR>
Daedric Scourge<BR>
<BR>
The Daedric Scourge is a mighty mace forged from sacred ebony in the Fires of Fickledire. The legendary weapon of Mackkan, it was once a fierce weapon used to send spirits of black back into Oblivion. The weapon lhas the ability to summon creatures from Oblivion, Once a tool used against the Daedric Lords in the Battlespire, it now roams the land with adventurers. <BR>
<BR>
Bow of Shadows<BR>
<BR>
Legend has it that the Bow of Shadows was forged by the Daedra Nocturnal. The legendary ranger, Raerlas Ghile, was granted the Bow for a secret mission that failed, and the Bow was lost. Raerlas did not go down without a hearty fight and is said to have, with the aid of the Bow, taken scores of his foes with him. The Bow grants the user the ability of invisibility and increased speed. Many sightings of the Bow of Shadows have been reported, and it is even said that the sinister Dark Elf assassin of the Second Era, Dram, once wielded this bow.<BR>
<BR>
Fists of Randagulf<BR>
<BR>
Randagulf of Clan Begalin goes down in Tamrielic history as one of the mightiest warriors from Skyrim. He was known for his courage and ferocity in battle and was a factor in many battles. He finally met his fate when King Harald conquered Skyrim. King Harald respected this great hero and took Randagulf's gauntlets for his own. After King Harald died, the gauntlets disappeared. The King claimed that the Fists granted the bearer added strength.<BR>
<BR>
Ice Blade of the Monarch<BR>
<BR>
The Ice Blade of the Monarch is truly one of Tamriel's most prized artifacts. Legend has it that the Evil Archmage Almion Celmo enchanted the claymore of a great warrior with the soul of a Frost Monarch, a stronger form of the more common Frost Atronach. The warrior, Thurgnarr Assi, was to play a part in the assassination of a great king in a far off land, and become the new leader. The assassination failed and the Archmage was imprisoned. The Ice Blade freezes all who feel its blade. The Blade circulates from owner to owner, never settling in one place for long.<BR>
<BR>
Ring of Surroundings<BR>
<BR>
Little is known of this prize but it is said that it lends the wearer the ability to blend in with their surroundings.<BR>
<BR>
Boots of the Apostle<BR>
<BR>
The Boots of the Apostle are a true mystery. The wearer of the boots is rumored to be able to levitate, though nobody has ever seen them used.<BR>
<BR>
The Mentor's Ring<BR>
<BR>
This ring is a prized possession for any apprentice to magic. It lends the wearer the ability to increase their intelligence and wisdom, thus making their use of magic more efficient. The High Wizard Carni Asron is said to be the creator of the Ring. It was a construct for his young apprentices while studying under his guidance. After Asron's death, the Ring and several other possessions vanished and have been circulated throughout Tamriel.<BR>
<BR>
Ring of the Wind<BR>
<BR>
No facts are known about this Ring, but the title and the few rumors lend one to think it grants the wearer added speed.<BR>
<BR>
Vampiric Ring<BR>
<BR>
One of the more deadly and rare artifacts in Tamriel is the Vampiric Ring. It is said that the Ring has the power to steal its victim's health and grant it to the wearer. The exact nature and origin of the Ring is wholly unknown, but many elders speak of its evil creation in Morrowind long, long ago by a cult of Vampire followers. The Vampiric Ring is an extremely rare artifact and is only seen every few hundred cycles of the moons.<BR>
<BR>
Eleidon's Ward<BR>
<BR>
Eleidon was a holy knight of legend in Breton history. He was a sought after man for his courage and determination to set all wrongs right. In one story, it is said that he rescued a Baron's daughter from sure death at the hands of an evil warlord. For his reward, the Baron spent all of his riches to have an enchanted shield built for Eidelon. The Shield granted Eleidon the opportunity to heal his wounds.<BR>
<BR>
Staff of Hasedoki<BR>
<BR>
Hasedoki was said to have been a very competitive wizard. He wandered the land in search for a wizard who was greater than he. To the best of all knowledge, he never found a wizard who could meet up to his challenge. It is said that he felt so lonely and isolated because so many feared his power, that he bonded his life-force into his very own staff, where his soul remains to this very day. Magic users all over Tamriel have been searching for this magical staff. Granting its wielder a protection of magicka, it is a sure prize for any magic user.<BR>
<BR>
Bloodworm Helm<BR>
<BR>
The King of Worms was said to have left behind one of his prized possessions, the Bloodworm Helm. The Helm is a construct of magically formed bone. The Helm allows the user to summon skeletons and control the undead. It would be a prized artifact to a necromancer.<BR>
<BR>
Dragonbone Mail<BR>
<BR>
This cuirass is one of the greatest artifacts any collector or hero could own. It is constructed of real dragon bone and was enchanted by the first Imperial Battlemage, Zurin Arctus, in the early years of the Third Era. It is a truly exquisite piece of work and many have sought to possess it. The properties of the Cuirass allow the wearer to be resist fire, and to damage an enemy with a blast of fire. Little is known about the involvement of Zurin Arctus with the enchantment of the Cuirass, but an old tale speaks of a debt that he owed to a traveling warrior. Like the warrior, the Dragonbone Mail never stays put for long.<BR>
<BR>
Skull Crusher<BR>
<BR>
The Skull Crusher is an amazingly large, and powerful weapon. The Warhammer was created in a fire, magically fueled by the Wizard, Dorach Gusal, and was forged by the great weaponsmith, Hilbongard Rolamus. The steel is magically hardened and the weight of the weapon is amazingly light, which makes for more powerful swings and deadly blows. The Warhammer was to be put on display for a festival, but thieves got it first. The Skull Crusher still travels Tamriel in search of its creators.<BR>
<BR>
Goldbrand<BR>
<BR>
This magical Sword is almost a complete mystery. Thieves tell tales about its golden make and how it was actually forged by ancient dragons of the North. Their tales claim that it was given to a great knight who was sworn to protect the dragons. The Sword lends its wielder the ability to do fire damage on an enemy. Goldbrand has not been sighted in recent history and is said to be awaiting a worthy hero.<BR>
<BR>
Fang of Haynekhtnamet<BR>
<BR>
Black Marsh was once known to be inhabited with what the Argonians called the Wamasus. Northern men considered them to be intelligent dragons with lightning for blood. One such mighty beast, Haynekhtnamet, was slain by the Northern men, though it took 7 days and nights, and a score of men. One of the surviving men took a fang home as a trophy. The fang was carved down into a blade and fashioned into a small dagger. The Dagger mysteriously houses some of the beast's magical properties and grants the user the ability to do shock damage on an opponent. This unique Dagger is seen occasionally by traveling heroes.<BR>
<BR>
Umbra Sword<BR>
<BR>
The Umbra Sword was enchanted by the ancient witch Naenra Waerr, and its sole purpose was the entrapment of souls. Used in conjunction with a soul gem, the Sword allows the wielder the opportunity to imprison an enemy's soul in the gem. Naenra was executed for her evil creation, but not before she was able to hide the Sword. The Umbra Sword is very choosy when it comes to owners and therefore remains hidden until a worthy one is found.<BR>
<BR>
Denstagmer's Ring<BR>
<BR>
All that is known of this Ring is that it may grant the user protection from certain elements. Even the name Denstagmer is a mystery.<BR>
<BR>
Helm of Oreyn Bearclaw<BR>
<BR>
One of Valenwood's legendary heroes is Oreyn Bearclaw. Son of King Faume Toad-Eye, he was a respected clan hunter and a future leader. Wood Elven legend claims Oreyn single handedly defeated Glenhwyfaunva, the witch-serpent of the Elven wood, forever bringing peace to his clan. Oreyn would go on to accomplish numerous other deeds, eventually losing his life to the Knahaten Flu. His Helm stood as a monument of his stature for future generations to remember. The Helm was lost eventually, as the Clan split, and is now a treasured artifact for adventurers. The Helm of Oreyn Bearclaw is rumored to improve the wearers agility and endurance.<BR>
Daedric Crescent Blade<BR>
<BR>
Probably the most rare and even outlawed item of all the great prizes is the Daedric Crescent Blade. The Blade was used by Mehrunes Dagon's Daedric forces in the capture of the Imperial Battlespire. These extremely unique Blades were gathered up and destroyed after the Battlespire was recaptured by the Empire. All but one it seems. Though the Empire believes them all to be destroyed, it is rumored that one still remains in existence, somewhere in Tamriel, though none have ever seen it. The Blade lends it's weilder the ability to do great damage on an enemy and allows him to paralyze and put heavy wear on his enemy's armor. Quite the prize for any mighty warrior, if it does indeed exist.<BR>
"""
"""<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
泰姆瑞尔诸神器<BR><BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR><BR>
下列笔记由我于过去几个世纪中所撰，用以辑录各色超凡法器。 下列神器在全泰姆瑞尔大陆失而复得、得而复失、循环往复。其中有些可能是神话传说，有些可能是骗局整蛊，但无论如何，许多人在对此类令人垂涎之物的寻宝和护宝的过程中丧命。<BR>
<BR>
君王链甲<BR>
<BR>
有时亦唤作墨里奥斯之甲或凯娜瑞丝馈赠，是质量无与伦比的古代胸甲。其赋予着甲者吸收生命值、抵御魔法效果并在并在中毒后解毒的神力。据说，当凯娜瑞丝认为着甲者难堪兹位时，君王链甲便会被剥夺，并藏匿至下一位获选者出现。<BR>
<BR>
黑檀链甲<BR>
<BR>
黑檀链甲在史前时代由暗精灵女神波耶西亚所造。谁人穿得此甲，且可保有多久，均决于她手。如果某一着甲者得到认可，护甲的法力会给予着甲者额外的火焰抗性、魔法抗性，并提供魔法护盾。着甲者几时失去着甲资格只由波耶西亚方能决定，而女神可能非常反复无常。<BR>
<BR>
破法者<BR>
<BR>
明面上看是一面锻莫塔盾的破法者是泰姆瑞尔最古老的神器之一。除却其于鲁肯-沙利多之战中的重要戏份以外，破法者几乎可以护持盾者以周全，通过反射魔法或使任何施法中的法师沉默使其免受免受任何施法者侵害。据说，破法者仍眷念故主，并不会久居他人篱下。对大多数人而言，持有破法者不论多久，都是赚到不亏。<BR>
<BR>
克里萨米尔<BR>
<BR>
圣骑士之剑是一柄古老的阔剑，攻防俱佳，甚至防御方面更胜一筹。 其可为执剑人增益生命，使之免于火焰伤害，并将对执剑人施放的各种法术反弹给施法者。少有剑士可挥舞克里萨米尔哪怕须臾，只因其择勇士豪杰而栖，而非逢迎之物。<BR>
<BR>
玛格努斯之杖<BR>
<BR>
作为泰姆瑞尔上古神器之一的玛格努斯之杖，对其创造者玛格努斯而言是一种形而上学的装置。使用时，其将吸噬敌方的生命和秘法能量。随着时间的推移，法杖会在持有其的法师变得过强，足以破坏法杖誓要捍卫的秘法平衡之前弃他而去。<BR>
<BR>
巫者之戒<BR>
<BR>
大法师锡拉拜恩的巫者之戒是神话和寓言中最受欢迎的神器之一。在泰姆瑞尔的古久历史中，锡拉拜恩对其戒指的精妙操作拯救了全大陆，自彼时起，戒指还帮助了一些并不志存高远的冒险者。其以能够反弹对佩戴者施放的法术而最为闻名，且可为佩戴者加速并恢复生命。没有冒险者可以长期据有巫者之戒，因为传言说，戒指由锡拉拜恩径自发号施令。<BR>
<BR>
菲纳斯特之戒<BR>
<BR>
数百年前，一位需要上乘防护以在冒险生涯中存活的人士制造了菲纳斯特之戒。菲纳斯特数百年的寿数，全仰仗此枚戒指，自其后就在外人间相传起来。戒指提升了佩戴者对毒药、魔法和电击的整体抵御。尽管如此，菲纳斯特仍然狡猾地诅咒这枚戒指，以至于其最终从持有者的所有中消失并返回另一个栖身之地，不满于留在除菲纳斯特本尊以外的他处。<BR>
<BR>
卡吉特之戒<BR>
<BR>
卡吉特之戒是一件古老的遗物，其出现早于使用并令此戒指闻名的盗贼拉津数百年。拉津用戒指的力量令自己隐踪匿迹，风驰电掣。有赖于戒指，他成为了艾斯维尔历史中的头号大盗。拉津的下场是个谜，但据传说，戒指对长期此种勾当以逆反并消失，令拉津在敌人面前束手无策。<BR>
<BR>
莫拉格-巴尔之锤<BR>
<BR>
又名吸血鬼钉锤，莫拉格-巴尔之锤汲取其受害者的法力并移转至持有者，对敌方的体力亦如是，也将之转移给其持有者。莫拉格-巴尔对其神器非常率性。有关此柄钉锤的传说众多，其似乎是征服法师的上佳之选。<BR>
<BR>
卡拉维库斯・维尔面具<BR>
<BR>
古时候，“太虚”卡拉维库斯・维尔制作了一副适合自身个性的面具。面具佩戴者更有可能得到泰姆瑞尔民众的积极响应。其个性越鲜明，增益便越大。此副假面最为人知的故事便是闻名遐迩的贵妇阿瓦莉亚的传说。在少女时代，她被一个恶毒的下人严重毁容。阿瓦莉亚与卡拉维库斯・维尔做了一笔黑暗交易，报偿便是面具。虽然假面没有改变她的相貌，但霎时间她便广受众人尊敬与爱慕。在与一位交往深厚的男爵结婚一年零一天后，卡拉维库斯・维尔重新取回了面具。尽管已经怀了他的种，阿瓦莉亚还是被男爵的家族扫地出门。二十一年零一天后，阿瓦莉亚之女以弑父报仇雪恨。<BR>
<BR>
梅鲁涅斯利刃<BR>
<BR>
历代以来，黑暗兄弟会都垂涎这把黑檀岩匕首。此等神话级法器能够瞬杀任何生物。梅鲁涅斯利刃的任何持有者都于史无据。然而，黑暗兄弟会一度被一场恶性内斗所重挫元气。人皆怀疑此事与利刃有关。<BR>
<BR>
救世主的庇护<BR>
<BR>
海尔辛的另一件神器是救世主的庇护胸甲。胸甲具有抵御魔法的特殊功能。传说海尔辛将其剥皮赐予第一个也是唯一一个逃离其猎场的凡人。这位佚名的凡人将剥皮制作了此件魔法胸甲，为其未来的冒险所用。救世主的庇护有在英豪之间流转的趋势，犹如自作主张一般。<BR>
<BR>
苦仁之矛<BR>
<BR>
苦仁之矛则是更为神秘的神器之一了。世人对此矛几近一无所知。虽然于史籍已不可考，但多则认同其乃魔族本源之说。唯一闻名而与其相关的传说是，在战斗尖塔陷落之时，一名强悍英雄持有此矛。此英雄倚借长矛襄助，击败了梅鲁涅斯・大衮并重夺战斗尖塔。自彼时后，苦仁之矛便鲜见于泰姆瑞尔。<BR>
<BR>
众魔灾厄<BR>
<BR>
众魔灾厄是一柄强力钉锤，由无常暴烈之火中的神圣黑檀岩锻造而成。其作为麦坎的传奇兵戈，曾是用于将黑暗造物送回湮灭的利器。该武器具有从湮灭召唤生物的能力，过去用于对抗战斗尖塔中对抗魔族战将，现在正与冒险者一起浪迹大陆。<BR>
<BR>
暗影之弓<BR>
<BR>
传说中，暗影之弓是由魔君诺克图娜尔铸造。传奇级游侠雷尔拉斯・吉尔为执行秘密任务获赠此弓，然而功败垂成，弓也丢失不见。雷尔拉斯的战败并非激战不敌，据信，凭借此弓，他放倒了许多敌人。此弓给予射手以隐形和提速的能力。暗影之弓的目击记录层出不穷，甚至据说第二纪元时阴狠的暗精灵刺客卓姆便曾持有此弓。<BR>
<BR>
兰达高夫之拳<BR>
<BR>
贝加林氏的兰达高夫以天际最强战士之一之名载入了泰姆瑞尔史册。他以悍勇善战闻名，并且影响了众多战局。当哈拉尔德王征伐天际时，他终于迎来了自己命运的结局。哈拉尔德王敬重此位豪杰，却自将夺走了兰达高夫的腕甲。哈拉尔德王驾崩后，腕甲便消失不见。国王声称兰达高夫之拳腕甲赋予了穿戴者更大的气力。<BR>
<BR>
君主冰刃<BR>
<BR>
君王冰刃实乃泰姆瑞尔最为珍贵的神器之一。传说有闻，邪恶的大法师阿尔米昂・塞尔莫用一只寻常寒霜元素的加强形态--寒霜君王的灵魂附魔了一名勇士的阔剑。战士苏尼亚尔・阿西本打算参与对一位域外贤王行刺，并僭祚为新君。暗杀失败，大法师也被囚禁。冰刃会冻结任何剑下之敌。君王冰刃在人际相传，不得久留。<BR>
<BR>
周遭之戒<BR>
<BR>
世人对此件神器知之甚少，但据说其能使佩戴者能够融入周遭环境。<BR>
<BR>
使徒之靴<BR>
<BR>
使徒之靴是一个真正的谜。据信，穿上靴子后着靴者便能悬浮起来，尽管未尝有人目睹如此。<BR>
<BR>
导师之戒<BR>
<BR>
对任何魔法学徒而论，此枚戒指都是珍贵的财富。其可以提升佩戴者更多智慧与智识，从而更高效地使用魔法。据传卡尼・阿斯隆高阶巫师制造了这枚戒指。这是他为聆其教诲的门下年轻弟子所作。在阿斯隆故去后，戒指和其他一些财产散佚，并在整个泰姆瑞尔流转。<BR>
<BR>
疾风之戒<BR>
<BR>
此枚戒指的实质尚不为人知，但望文生义而论，再辅以少数传闻令人认为其可为佩戴者提速。<BR>
<BR>
吸血鬼之戒<BR>
<BR>
吸血鬼之戒是泰姆瑞尔最为致命而稀有的神器之一。据说戒指有能力汲取受害者的生命并转予佩戴者。戒指的确切本性和起源完全未知，但许多长者则称此物乃旧时晨风一众吸血鬼追随者的邪恶创造。吸血鬼之戒是一种极为罕见的神器，每隔上百个双月循环周期才会出现一次。<BR>
<BR>
埃雷唐坚盾<BR>
<BR>
埃雷唐是布莱顿历史上的传奇圣骑士。他因痛改前非的勇气和决心而广受追捧。在一个故事中，据说他将男爵命悬一线的女儿从邪恶战将手中救出。作为报偿，男爵倾尽财帛为埃雷顿打造了一面附魔盾牌。该盾牌可让埃雷唐有几率治愈创伤。<BR>
<BR>
哈斯多奇之杖<BR>
<BR>
哈斯多奇据说是个争强好胜的巫师。他巡游四方，寻觅劲敌。据他所知，他从未找到一个接下战书的巫师。据信，他因为其法力为众多人所畏惧而感到颇为孤寂，便将自己的生命力与其法杖合为一体，其灵魂附于法杖之上，直至当下。泰姆瑞尔全大陆的施法者一直在寻找这魔杖。其可赋予持有者以魔法防护，显然对任何施法者而言都是一件宝具。<BR>
<BR>
血虫之盔<BR>
<BR>
血虫之盔据说是蠕虫之王珍贵的孑遗之一。头盔乃是魔法构建的骨骼的造物。头盔准许佩戴者召唤骷髅并操纵亡灵。此盔对死灵法师而言可谓一件珍贵的神器。<BR>
<BR>
龙骨链甲<BR>
<BR>
此件胸甲是任何收藏家或英雄都可拥有的最顶级神器之一。其由真正龙骨所造，在第三纪元初期被帝国首席战斗法师祖林・阿克图斯附魔。其制作精良、巧夺天工，欲据为己有者甚众。胸甲的魔力是令佩戴者抵御火焰，并以火焰爆能击伤敌人。有关祖林・阿克图斯与胸甲的附魔之间的知之甚少，但一个古老的传说声称他于一位云游勇士有所亏欠。就像战士征战四方一般，龙骨链甲亦从不作久留。<BR>
<BR>
碎颅者<BR>
<BR>
碎颅者是一柄硕大而强力的兵器。此战锤是由巫师多拉克・古萨尔以魔能燃起的炉火为热量，由良匠希尔邦高・罗拉穆斯锻造而成。钢材由魔法硬化，武器的自重惊人地轻，从而使挥击更为强力，捶打更加致命。该战锤本打算是用作节日展览，但盗贼抢先窃据之。碎颅者仍然在泰姆瑞尔寻求与匠人的重逢。<BR>
<BR>
黄金烙印<BR>
<BR>
这柄魔法太刀简直是个彻头彻尾的谜。盗贼们常谈及其黄金构造以及实质地被北境古龙所铸的传说。故事讲到，其本是赠予一名立誓保卫龙族的强大骑士之物。此太刀赋予执剑人以火焰杀伤敌方的能力。黄金烙印在近代不见诸史册，可谓兵刃有利剑，宝刀待英雄。<BR>
<BR>
哈尼赫纳迈之牙<BR>
<BR>
黑沼泽曾经以阿尔贡人呼之为“瓦马苏斯”的沼龙的栖息地而闻名。北方人认为他们是智慧的龙族，血脉中流淌着闪电力量。这一族中一只强大的怪兽--哈尼赫纳迈，被北方人在七天七夜之内，以数十人的伤亡为代价所击杀。幸存者中的一员拔下一只尖牙作为战利品带回家。尖牙被雕刻成刀刃，制成了一把短匕。该匕首神秘地附有怪兽本身的一些魔法属性，并令使用者可对对手造成电击伤害。此柄独特的匕首偶尔会为云游四方的英杰们所目睹。<BR>
<BR>
噬影剑<BR>
<BR>
噬影剑由古代女巫奈茵拉・瓦尔所附魔，其唯一目的即是俘获灵魂。此剑与灵魂石结合使用，令执剑人有机会将敌人的灵魂囚禁在灵魂石中。奈茵拉因其恶堕造物而被处决，但在此前她将噬影剑藏匿起来。噬影剑对执剑人的选择甚是挑剔，因此在堪当斯任者出现前会一直隐匿不见。<BR>
<BR>
丹斯塔格莫之戒<BR>
<BR>
我们只知道该戒指可予以佩戴者对于某些元素伤害的保护。就连丹斯塔格莫这个名字也是个谜。<BR>
<BR>
奥伦“熊爪”之盔<BR>
<BR>
奥伦“熊爪”是威木的传奇英雄之一。身为“蛤目”弗姆王之子，他是受人尊敬的氏族猎手和储君。木精灵传说声称奥瑞因孤身一人击败了精灵森林的蛇妖女巫格伦弗努亚，为其氏族带来了永远的和平。奥瑞因本要实践其王道征途，却最终丧命于纳哈腾流感。他的头盔作为对其伟业的纪念而留存，供后人铭记。随着氏族分裂，头盔最终散佚，现在成了冒险者的争相竞逐的神器。据传，奥伦“熊爪”之盔可以提升佩戴者的敏捷与耐力。<BR>
魔族新月刃<BR>
<BR>
可能所有神器中最稀有，甚至最不为官厅法度所容忍之物便是魔族新月刃了。梅鲁涅斯・大衮的魔族大军在攻占帝国战斗尖塔时使用了这种刀兵。此类尤其独特的兵器在帝国光复战斗尖塔后便集中销毁。却唯独漏了一把。 尽管帝国确信已尽数销毁，但有传言称在泰姆瑞尔的某处仍有一把留存，虽然未尝有人一睹。新月刃令持有者对敌人以巨大杀伤，并允许其麻痹敌人和极大磨损提防护甲。倘若此物确实存在，那对任何猛士而言都是相当不错的神器。<BR>
"""

> BOOK.FNAM bk_AlchemistsFormulary
The Alchemists Formulary
《炼金术士配方集》

> BOOK.TEXT bk_AlchemistsFormulary
"""<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
The Alchemist's Formulary<BR><BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR><BR>
Healers' Recipes<BR>
<BR>
Healers should all know the recipes for the following popular potions. Fortunately, in most cases, the ingredients are common and cheaply obtained.<BR>
<BR>
To restore health to the afflicted and wounded, combine in equal parts two or more of the following cheap and common ingredients: marshmerrow, wickwheat, corkbulb root, and saltrice. Marshmerrow is an important crop of the Ascadian Isles, but it also grows wild in the Grazelands and on Azura's Coast. Wickwheat is a wild Ashland grain that grows in the Grazelands. Corkbulb grows best in the Ascadian Isles. Most saltrice comes from southeastern Morrowind, but there are also some new and prospering farms and plantations in the Ascadian Isles. Saltrice occasionally grows wild in the Grazelands and on Azura's Coast.<BR>
<BR>
To restore fatigue after heavy exertion, combine two or more of the following: crab meat, bread, small kwama egg, and chokeweed. Crabmeat is taken from the mud crab, commonly found along all coasts. Bread in Morrowind is usually baked from saltrice flour. Kwama eggs are harvested from egg mines, and sold everywhere in Morrowind; the smaller eggs retain properties lost in later states of gestation. Chokeweed is a tough shrub growing in the rocky highlands of the West Gash.<BR>
<BR>
To cure common diseases, combine gravedust and green lichen. Gravedust is spirit-affinitive dust taken from remains buried in consecrated ground. Green lichen is a hardy primitive plant that grows in the Ascadian Isles and Azura's Coast.<BR>
<BR>
To restore magicka for spellcasting, combine comberry and frost salts. Comberry is a bitter berry, used to make wines. It grows mainly in the Ascadian Isles. Frost salts, by contrast, are rare and expensive. These crystalline compounds precipitate from elemental frost in solution. Such residues may be collected from the remains of frost atronachs that have been banished from the mortal plane.<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
Travelers' Recipes<BR>
<BR>
Pilgrims and travelers will find the following inexpensive recipes of particular interest.<BR>
<BR>
Feather reduces the weary traveler's burdens and can be gained from heather and scuttle. Heather is a low evergreen shrub of the Ascadian Isles, known for its small, pinkish-purple flowers. Scuttle, Vvardenfell's favorite local dish, is similar to cheese and made from the flesh of local beetles.<BR>
<BR>
Levitation can be produced from any two of the following ingredients: trama root, racer plumes, and coda flowers. A thick, bitter-tasting root of the trama shrub grows in the Ashlands, Molag Amur, and Red Mountain regions. Racer plumes are plucked from dead cliff racers. Coda flowers are collected from the primitive draggle-tail plant of the Bitter Coast.<BR>
<BR>
The power of Water Breathing is handy for travelers. A potion may be made from two or more of the following ingredients: luminous russula, hackle-lo leaf, and kwama cuttle. Luminous russula is a squat, mottled-brown-and-green toadstool mushroom of the Bitter Coast region. Hackle-lo leaf is a succulent leaf of the Grazelands, prized for its taste and its roborative powers. Kwama cuttle is a tough, waxy substance that comes from sacs in the mouths of kwama.<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
Adventurers' Recipes<BR>
<BR>
Unfortunately, the potions most favored by adventurers require more rare and expensive ingredients. There are exceptions, like the easy and affordable recipe for fire shield. But most such potions require at least one ingredient with high cost in coin or blood.<BR>
<BR>
Fire Shield potions can be made from comberry and sload soap. Comberry is the bitter berry of the Ascadian Isles. Sload soap is a waxy substance made from the immature non-sentient forms of the sload. Sload soap is not expensive, but is only rarely stocked by apothecaries or alchemists, and cannot be collected locally.<BR>
<BR>
An adventurer can fortify his strength with a potion made from ash yams and dreugh wax. Ash yam is a tough tuberous root vegetable common to the Ascadian Isles region. Dreugh wax is a tough, waxy substance scraped from dreugh shells. Dreugh are powerful aquatic creatures, and hunting them for their hides and wax is a dangerous occupation.<BR>
<BR>
Invisibility, one of the most prized effects of potions, can be made only from crushed diamonds and bittergreen petals. Bittergreen is a red flowering plant growing in the Red Mountain region. Diamonds, on the other hand, are very rare and expensive and usually must be purchased from fine alchemists.<BR>
<BR>
"""
"""<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
炼金术士配方集<BR><BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR><BR>
治疗师的配方<BR>
<BR>
治疗者都应该知道以下流行药水的配方。幸运的是，在大多数情况下，这些成分都很常见，而且很便宜。<BR>
<BR>
为了恢复受伤者的健康，将以下两种或两种以上的廉价常见成分：沼泽糖蔗、灯芯麦、软木鳞茎根和盐水稻。沼泽糖蔗是阿斯卡迪亚群岛的一种重要作物，但它也生长在放牧平原和阿祖拉海岸。灯芯麦是一种生长在放牧平原上的野生灰烬之地谷物。软木鳞类植物在阿斯卡迪亚群岛生长得最好。大部分的盐水稻来自于东南部的晨风，但阿斯卡迪亚群岛上也有一些新的繁荣的农场和种植园出产它们。盐水稻偶尔也会在放牧平原和阿祖拉海岸的野外生长。<BR>
<BR>
要想在剧烈运动后恢复耐力，可以将以下两种或两种以上的食物混合：蟹肉、面包、小夸蚂卵和窒息草。蟹肉取自泥沼蟹，常见于沿海地区。晨风的面包通常是用含盐的面粉烤成的。夸蚂卵产自卵矿，在晨风随处可见，而较小的卵保留了在妊娠后期丢失的特性。窒息草是一种生长在西境之痕的坚硬的灌木。<BR>
<BR>
治疗常见疾病，应将坟土与绿色地衣混合。坟土是从埋在圣地里的遗骸中取来的与灵有关的尘土。绿色地衣是一种耐寒的原始植物，生长在阿斯卡迪亚群岛和阿祖拉海岸。<BR>
<BR>
要恢复法师的施法能力，可以把异梅和霜盐混合在一起。异梅是一种苦味浆果，用于酿酒。它主要生长在阿斯卡迪亚群岛。相比之下，霜盐则是稀有且昂贵的。这些结晶化合物是从冰侍灵的融液中沉淀出来的。这些残余物可以从被驱逐出凡人位面的寒冰侍灵尸体中收集到。<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
旅行者的配方<BR>
<BR>
朝圣者和旅行者会发现以下便宜的处方特别有趣。<BR>
<BR>
“轻羽术”可以减轻疲惫的旅行者的负担，此种魔法的效果也从石楠花和虫酪中获得。石楠是阿斯卡迪亚群岛的一种低矮的常绿灌木，以其小而粉紫色的花而闻名。虫酪是瓦登费尔最受欢迎的当地菜肴，与奶酪相似，其实是由当地甲虫的肉制成。<BR>
<BR>
“漂浮术”的效果可以由以下任意两种成分产生：特拉玛根、迅鸟羽和尾声花。特拉玛灌木的根生长在灰烬之地、莫拉格-阿穆尔河和红山地区。迅鸟羽是从死去的峭壁迅鸟身上拔下来的。尾声花是从苦涩海岸的原始拖尾植物中采集的。<BR>
<BR>
水中呼吸的能力对旅行者来说很方便。产生这种效果的药剂可以由以下两种或两种以上的成分制成：微光红菇、颈羽罗叶和夸蚂膏。微光红菇是一种矮胖的、斑驳的褐绿色毒蕈蘑菇，生长在苦涩海岸地区。颈羽罗叶是一种多汁的草类植物叶子，因其味道和效力而备受赞誉。夸蚂膏是一种坚硬的蜡质物质，来自夸蚂的口腔。<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
冒险家的配方<BR>
<BR>
不幸的是，冒险家最喜欢的魔药需要更稀有和昂贵的成分。当然也有例外，比如制作火盾药水的配方就很简单经济。但大多数此类药剂都需要至少一种成本较高的成分。<BR>
<BR>
火盾药水可以由异梅和蛞蟾人皂制成。异梅是阿斯卡迪亚群岛的苦浆果。蛞蟾人皂是一种蜡质物质，来自未成熟的无知觉形式的蛞蟾人。蛞蟾人皂并不贵，但药剂师或炼金术士很少储备，而且无法在当地收集。<BR>
<BR>
冒险家可以用灰烬山药和蟹灵蜡制成的药剂来增强体力。灰烬山药是一种坚硬的块根类蔬菜，在阿斯卡迪亚群岛地区很常见。蟹灵蜡是从蟹灵壳上刮下来的一种坚硬的蜡质物质。蟹灵是强大的水生生物，捕猎它们是非常危险的。<BR>
<BR>
隐形魔药是魔药最珍贵的效果之一，它只能由碎钻石和苦绿花瓣制成。苦绿花是生长在红山地区的一种开花植物。另一方面，钻石是非常稀有和昂贵的，通常必须从优秀的炼金术士那里购买。<BR>
<BR>

> BOOK.FNAM bk_commontongue
The Common Tongue
《众口真言》

> BOOK.TEXT bk_commontongue
"""<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
[This broadsheet is a newsletter copied on cheap paper, featuring sensational events in the city of Mournhold. One article describes a list of individuals who died under suspicious circumstances when their interests conflicted with those of 'a former prince of the West'. The reference is clearly King Helseth, King of Morrowind, formerly Prince Helseth of the kingdom of Wayrest in the province of High Rock.]<BR>
<BR>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
THE COMMON TONGUE<BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR>
"A poet can have no higher purpose than to tell the truth about the human condition."  -- Lord Vivec<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><BR>
*MYSTERIES*<BR>
OF THE WEST<BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR>
I have a little list. They never would be missed.<BR>
<BR>
Appearing at the top -- three names... Anhar, Khajiit male -- Martyrius Arruntius, Imperial male -- Jusole Asciele, Breton male. What do these three names have in common?<BR>
<BR>
All three at one time or another represented an inconvenience to a Western noble prince named Helseth.<BR>
<BR>
Anhar was an agent for Eastern ebony merchants. There was an unfortunate scandal concerning improper contracts offered to Helseth as compensation for his assistance in obtaining ebony import remits from the Imperial Board of Census and Excise. Luckily for Prince Helseth, this scandal blew over when no one could be found to testify. Is it just a coincidence that Anhar's health went into a steep decline, just as he was to testify before the Imperial magistrates? He died a natural death, according to the Imperial coroners. Convenient and timely, perhaps, but natural.<BR>
<BR>
Martyrius Arruntius was a city alderman of Wayrest. Prince Helseth's liaison with the alderman's married daughter was potentially embarrassing to the Prince -- especially when Martyrius Arruntius forcefully pressed his suit for 'predatory adultery' in Wayrest's courts. Many thought it strange that Martyrius Arruntius should suddenly fall ill and die of 'exhaustion' on the eve of the trial. The suit was settled out of court, and charges dismissed. The Imperial coroners ruled that Martyrius Arruntius had died a natural death. Convenient and timely, admittedly, but natural.<BR>
<BR>
Jusole Asciele was a diplomatic attache at the High Rock embassy in Wayrest. Widely rumored to be an intelligence officer, Jusole Asciele was often seen at court, taking a great interest in the affairs of Queen Barenziah and her family. It is said that Wayrest can be a beastly uncomfortable place in high summer. Perhaps the Breton's constitution was ill-suited to the relentless heat and pestilential swarms of the southern Iliac. Jusole Asciele took suddenly ill one evening, and within three days he was dead. Once again, Imperial coroners ruled that Jusole Asciele had died a natural death. Convenient and timely, yes, but natural.<BR>
<BR>
And these, The Common Tongue notes significantly, are only the 'A's on the list.<BR>
<BR>
Some have quietly suggested that Prince Helseth was the most accomplished and subtle poisoner in the West. But The Common Tongue has never seen a single scrap of evidence that would prove such an indictment. [Admittedly, the absence of such proof could count as qualifying towards the title of a 'most accomplished and subtle poisoner'.]<BR>
<BR>
And, further, The Common Tongue does not wish to suggest that King Helseth is a poisoner, or that the recent death of King Athyn Llethan's was a poisoning, and not a natural death. The Common Tongue has never seen a single scrap of evidence that would prove such an indictment. And the Imperial coroners have ruled that Athyn Llethan died a natural death. <BR>
<BR>"""
"""<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
[这份报道是用廉价纸抄写的信息，报道了哀伤之城的一些耸人听闻的事件。一篇文章描述了一些在可疑情况下死亡的人员名单，他们的利益与“前西方王子”的利益发生冲突。而如今晨风的国王赫尔塞斯王，以前是高岩省途歇城王国的一个王子。]<BR>
<BR>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
众口真言<BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR>
"诗人提笔撰文意在影射现实，除此之外别无他求。"  -- 维威克领主<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><BR>
西方的<BR>
*谜团*<BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR>
这份名单，请世人务必铭记。<BR>
<BR>
名单上最显眼的 -- 三个名字... 安哈尔，卡吉特男性 -- 马蒂里乌斯・阿伦提乌斯，帝国男性 -- 尤索莱・阿斯切莱，布莱顿男性。这三个名字有什么共同点？<BR>
<BR>
这三个人一次又一次地给一位名叫赫尔塞斯的西方贵族王子带来了麻烦。<BR>
<BR>
安哈尔是东方黑檀贸易商的代理人。有一桩不幸的丑闻，是关于赫尔塞斯如何协助从帝国人口普查和税务局获得黑檀进口汇票，并以此作为补偿而向他提供的不正当合同。不过对于赫尔塞斯来说很幸运的是，当这个丑闻爆发的时候，安哈尔的健康状况也急转直下，因此没有任何人可以为之作证。这只是巧合吗？根据帝国的验尸官称，安哈尔是自然死亡。嗯，自然死亡，就在这个节骨眼上，真巧，不是吗？<BR>
<BR>
马蒂里乌斯・阿伦提乌斯是途歇城的一名市议员。赫尔塞斯王子与这名市议员的已婚的女儿之间的一些小联系可能会对这位王子造成一些不利--尤其是当马蒂里乌斯・阿伦提乌斯在途歇城的法庭上指控其“掠夺性强奸”时。很多人都认为，马蒂里乌斯・阿伦提乌斯在审判前夕忽然病倒，并且死于“工作劳累而猝死”这件事非常奇怪。这场诉讼最终在庭外和解，指控也被驳回。根据帝国的验尸官称，马蒂里乌斯・阿伦提乌斯同样也是自然死亡。没错，自然死亡，很方便，也很及时。<BR>
<BR>
尤索莱・阿斯切莱是途歇城高岩大使馆的外交官。坊间传闻尤索莱・阿斯切莱有一个隐藏身份是一名情报官，他经常出没于法庭之中，对于巴兰兹娅女王以及其家人的事物非常感兴趣。据说每当到了盛夏时节，途歇城可能就会变成一个环境非常不舒服的地方。或许是布莱顿人的体质不太能够适应颌骨湾南部无情的高温和瘟疫，某天晚上，尤索莱・阿斯切莱突然病倒了，并且仅仅过去了三天，他就病死了。再一次地，根据帝国的验尸官称，尤索莱・阿斯切莱仍然是自然死亡。<BR>
<BR>
而这些人，只是这份民间传闻的名单上“A”开头的名字。<BR>
<BR>
一些人悄悄地暗示着赫尔塞斯王子拥有着西方最狡猾最阴险的毒药。但民间也从未收集到过任何可以证明这种事情的证据。[诚然，就是因为没有这样的证据，这种毒药才能获得“最狡猾最阴险”的称号。]<BR>
<BR>
当然，本报道 -- 《众口真言》只是整理了一些民间的资料，与赫尔塞斯国王并无关联，也不是在证明艾辛・莱森国王的死因是什么。《众口真言》并没有在这两件事之间找到任何关联性的证据。艾辛・莱森国王的死因就如同官方公布的消息那样，属于自然死亡。<BR>
<BR>"""

> BOOK.FNAM bk_commontongue_irano
The Common Tongue: Irano's copy
《众口真言》：伊拉诺的副本

> BOOK.TEXT bk_commontongue_irano
"""<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
[This broadsheet is a newsletter copied on cheap paper, featuring sensational events in the city of Mournhold. One article describes a list of individuals who died under suspicious circumstances when their interests conflicted with those of 'a former prince of the West'. The reference is clearly King Helseth, King of Morrowind, formerly Prince Helseth of the kingdom of Wayrest in the province of High Rock.]<BR>
<BR>
This copy was found under the pillow on Ivulen Irano's bed. The ownership of the chest at the foot of the bed indicates the ownership of the document.<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
THE COMMON TONGUE<BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR>
"A poet can have no higher purpose than to tell the truth about the human condition."  -- Lord Vivec<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><BR>
*MYSTERIES*<BR>
OF THE WEST<BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR>
I have a little list. They never would be missed.<BR>
<BR>
Appearing at the top -- three names... Anhar, Khajiit male -- Martyrius Arruntius, Imperial male -- Jusole Asciele, Breton male. What do these three names have in common?<BR>
<BR>
All three at one time or another represented an inconvenience to a Western noble prince named Helseth.<BR>
<BR>
Anhar was an agent for Eastern ebony merchants. There was an unfortunate scandal concerning improper contracts offered to Helseth as compensation for his assistance in obtaining ebony import remits from the Imperial Board of Census and Excise. Luckily for Prince Helseth, this scandal blew over when no one could be found to testify. Is it just a coincidence that Anhar's health went into a steep decline, just as he was to testify before the Imperial magistrates? He died a natural death, according to the Imperial coroners. Convenient and timely, perhaps, but natural.<BR>
<BR>
Martyrius Arruntius was a city alderman of Wayrest. Prince Helseth's liaison with the alderman's married daughter was potentially embarrassing to the Prince -- especially when Martyrius Arruntius forcefully pressed his suit for 'predatory adultery' in Wayrest's courts. Many thought it strange that Martyrius Arruntius should suddenly fall ill and die of 'exhaustion' on the eve of the trial. The suit was settled out of court, and charges dismissed. The Imperial coroners ruled that Martyrius Arruntius had died a natural death. Convenient and timely, admittedly, but natural.<BR>
<BR>
Jusole Asciele was a diplomatic attache at the High Rock embassy in Wayrest. Widely rumored to be an intelligence officer, Jusole Asciele was often seen at court, taking a great interest in the affairs of Queen Barenziah and her family. It is said that Wayrest can be a beastly uncomfortable place in high summer. Perhaps the Breton's constitution was ill-suited to the relentless heat and pestilential swarms of the southern Iliac. Jusole Asciele took suddenly ill one evening, and within three days he was dead. Once again, Imperial coroners ruled that Jusole Asciele had died a natural death. Convenient and timely, yes, but natural.<BR>
<BR>
And these, The Common Tongue notes significantly, are only the 'A's on the list.<BR>
<BR>
Some have quietly suggested that Prince Helseth was the most accomplished and subtle poisoner in the West. But The Common Tongue has never seen a single scrap of evidence that would prove such an indictment. [Admittedly, the absence of such proof could count as qualifying towards the title of a 'most accomplished and subtle poisoner'.]<BR>
<BR>
And, further, The Common Tongue does not wish to suggest that King Helseth is a poisoner, or that the recent death of King Athyn Llethan's was a poisoning, and not a natural death. The Common Tongue has never seen a single scrap of evidence that would prove such an indictment. And the Imperial coroners have ruled that Athyn Llethan died a natural death. <BR>
<BR>"""
"""<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
[这份报道是用廉价纸抄写的信息，报道了哀伤之城的一些耸人听闻的事件。一篇文章描述了一些在可疑情况下死亡的人员名单，他们的利益与“前西方王子”的利益发生冲突。而如今晨风的国王赫尔塞斯王，以前是高岩省途歇城王国的一个王子。]<BR>
<BR>
[这份抄本是在伊武伦・伊拉诺床头的枕头下发现的，床脚的箱子的所有权表明了该文件的所有权。]<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
众口真言<BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR>
"诗人提笔撰文意在影射现实，除此之外别无他求。"  -- 维威克领主<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><BR>
西方的<BR>
*谜团*<BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR>
这份名单，请世人务必铭记。<BR>
<BR>
名单上最显眼的 -- 三个名字... 安哈尔，卡吉特男性 -- 马蒂里乌斯・阿伦提乌斯，帝国男性 -- 尤索莱・阿斯切莱，布莱顿男性。这三个名字有什么共同点？<BR>
<BR>
这三个人一次又一次地给一位名叫赫尔塞斯的西方贵族王子带来了麻烦。<BR>
<BR>
安哈尔是东方黑檀贸易商的代理人。有一桩不幸的丑闻，是关于赫尔塞斯如何协助从帝国人口普查和税务局获得黑檀进口汇票，并以此作为补偿而向他提供的不正当合同。不过对于赫尔塞斯来说很幸运的是，当这个丑闻爆发的时候，安哈尔的健康状况也急转直下，因此没有任何人可以为之作证。这只是巧合吗？根据帝国的验尸官称，安哈尔是自然死亡。嗯，自然死亡，就在这个节骨眼上，真巧，不是吗？<BR>
<BR>
马蒂里乌斯・阿伦提乌斯是途歇城的一名市议员。赫尔塞斯王子与这名市议员的已婚的女儿之间的一些小联系可能会对这位王子造成一些不利--尤其是当马蒂里乌斯・阿伦提乌斯在途歇城的法庭上指控其“掠夺性强奸”时。很多人都认为，马蒂里乌斯・阿伦提乌斯在审判前夕忽然病倒，并且死于“工作劳累而猝死”这件事非常奇怪。这场诉讼最终在庭外和解，指控也被驳回。根据帝国的验尸官称，马蒂里乌斯・阿伦提乌斯同样也是自然死亡。没错，自然死亡，很方便，也很及时。<BR>
<BR>
尤索莱・阿斯切莱是途歇城高岩大使馆的外交官。坊间传闻尤索莱・阿斯切莱有一个隐藏身份是一名情报官，他经常出没于法庭之中，对于巴兰兹娅女王以及其家人的事物非常感兴趣。据说每当到了盛夏时节，途歇城可能就会变成一个环境非常不舒服的地方。或许是布莱顿人的体质不太能够适应颌骨湾南部无情的高温和瘟疫，某天晚上，尤索莱・阿斯切莱突然病倒了，并且仅仅过去了三天，他就病死了。再一次地，根据帝国的验尸官称，尤索莱・阿斯切莱仍然是自然死亡。<BR>
<BR>
而这些人，只是这份民间传闻的名单上“A”开头的名字。<BR>
<BR>
一些人悄悄地暗示着赫尔塞斯王子拥有着西方最狡猾最阴险的毒药。但民间也从未收集到过任何可以证明这种事情的证据。[诚然，就是因为没有这样的证据，这种毒药才能获得“最狡猾最阴险”的称号。]<BR>
<BR>
当然，本报道 -- 《众口真言》只是整理了一些民间的资料，与赫尔塞斯国王并无关联，也不是在证明艾辛・莱森国王的死因是什么。《众口真言》并没有在这两件事之间找到任何关联性的证据。艾辛・莱森国王的死因就如同官方公布的消息那样，属于自然死亡。<BR>
<BR>"""

> BOOK.FNAM bk_Irano_note
handwritten note
手写的笔记

> BOOK.TEXT bk_Irano_note
"""<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
handwritten note<BR>
<BR>

[A curious copy of guard duty rosters for the past several weeks. The handwriting is tiny and almost illegible, with frequent misspellings. But three names are always correctly spelled -- Milvela Dralen, Ivulen Irano, and Aleri Aren -- and those watches when all three are the only guards in the Throne Room have been underlined twice.]<BR>"""
"""<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
手写的笔记<BR>
<BR>

[一份奇怪的过去几周的卫兵值班名单。字迹很小，几乎难以辨认，经常出现拼写错误。但是三个名字的拼写总是正确的--米尔维拉・达拉伦、伊武伦・伊拉诺和艾蕾莉・爱伦--而这三个人都是王座室看守中唯一已经被划了两次下划线的人。]<BR>"""

> BOOK.FNAM bk_Alen_note
handwritten letter
手写的信

> BOOK.TEXT bk_Alen_note
"""<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
handwritten letter<BR>
<BR>
[Addressed outside: "To my honorable cousin Forven Berano, be this delivered in haste"]<BR>
<BR>
Forven,<BR>
<BR>
I cannot agree. I am a merchant, and have no skill at arms. You are a noble, and in your prime were proven on practice and tournament grounds -- though, in truth, you have never fought a duel, and have few gifts as a liar. No one can doubt Hloggar the Bloody's aptitude and enthusiasm for mayhem, but he is not a subtle man, more suited for a brawl or battlefield than an assassin's role.<BR>
<BR>
And we cannot trust the Dark Brotherhood. Helseth owns them. They promise discretion, but their promises are worthless.<BR>
<BR>
I am afraid we must approach the Morag Tong. I agree with you. They will probably refuse. But at least they can be trusted to be discreet.<BR>
<BR>
If, in the end, we are forced to choose among ourselves, I fear it must be you. And we will have to wrack our brains for some plausible pretext that will get you into Helseth's presence.<BR>
<BR>
I am disappointed, though not surprised, at lack of public outcry over Athyn's murder. The popular sentiment seems to be to avoid personal risk and accept Helseth. It's short-sighted, but understandable. I have noted, however, that the writer of THE COMMON TONGUE is sympathetic to our cause, clever and eloquent. He may be able to sway opinion. We should try to identify this fellow and try to bring him into our counsels.<BR>
<BR>
your faithful servant,<BR>
Bedal Alen<BR>"""
"""<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
手写的信<BR>
<BR>
[函外附：“此信送至我尊敬的堂兄弟福文・贝拉诺，尽快送达！”]<BR>
<BR>
福文，<BR>
<BR>
我不可能同意的。我只是个商人，我没有和人打架的能力。虽然你是一个贵族，你在全盛时期在练习场地上得到过证明 -- 但事实上你从来没有参加过任何决斗，而且你也没有撒谎骗人的天赋。没人会怀疑血腥者赫洛格对于血的热情和对于战斗的天赋，但是他并不是什么很狡猾的人，他更适合去和人斗殴或者去战场上厮杀，而不是去当个刺客。<BR>
<BR>
并且我们不可能去相信黑暗兄弟会。黑暗兄弟会归赫尔塞斯所有，他们承诺慎重行动，但他们的承诺毫无价值。<BR>
<BR>
恐怕我们得去联系莫拉格堂，我同意你的看法，他们可能会拒绝我们，但至少可以相信他们做事很谨慎。<BR>
<BR>
如果最终我们不得不在我们两个之间做出选择，恐怕你是我们唯一的选择。我们将不得不绞尽脑汁寻找一些看似合理的借口让你来到赫尔塞斯面前。<BR>
<BR>
对于艾辛的谋杀案没有引起公众的强烈抗议我感到很失望，但我也并不惊讶。当下大众的情绪似乎都是想接受赫尔塞斯并让自己远离风险，虽然可以理解，但这太短视了。不过我注意到，《众口真言》的作者似乎同情我们的事业，他写出的文章口若悬河而且非常聪明地避开风险。他或许能够左右舆论，我们应该找出这个人，并尝试将他纳入我们的计划中。<BR>
<BR>
你忠实的仆人，<BR>
贝达尔・艾伦<BR>"""

Royal Writ of Execution
王室处决令

<BR>

> ACTI.FNAM act_sotha_lever1a

> BOOK.FNAM bk_playscript
The Horror of Castle Xyr
《夏尔城堡惊魂》

> BOOK.TEXT bk_playscript
"""<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
The Horror of Castle Xyr<BR>
A One Act Play<BR>
by Baloth-Kul<BR><BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR><BR>
Dramatis Personae<BR>
Clavides, Captain of the Imperial Guard. Cyrodilic.<BR>
Anara, a Dunmer maid.<BR>
Ullis, a Lieutenant of the Imperial Guard. Argonian.<BR>
Zollassa, a young Argonian mage.<BR>
<BR>
Late evening. The play opens in the interior Great Entrance Hall of a castle in Scath Anud, replete with fine furnishings and tapestries. Torches provide the only illumination. In the center of the foyer is a great iron door, the main entrance to the castle. The staircase up to the landing above is next to this door. On stage left is the door to the library, which is currently closed. On stage right is a huge suit of armor, twenty feet tall, nearly touching the ceiling of the room. Though no one can be seen, there is the sound of a woman singing coming from the library door.<BR>
<BR>
A loud thumping knock on the iron front door stops the woman's singing. The door to the library opens and ANARA, a common-looking maid, comes out and hurries to open the front door.  CLAVIDES, a handsome man in Imperial garb, stands there.<BR>
<BR>
ANARA: Good evening to you, serjo.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES: Good evening. Is your master at home?<BR>
<BR>
ANARA: No, serjo, it's only me here. My master, Sedura Kena Telvanni Hordalf Xyr, is at his winter estate. Is there something I can do for you?<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES: Possibly. Would you mind if I came in?<BR>
<BR>
ANARA: Not at all, serjo. Please. May I offer you some flin?<BR>
<BR>
Clavides comes into the Hall and looks around.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  No, thank you. What's your name?<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  Anara, serjo.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  Anara, when did your master leave Scath Anud?<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  More than a fortnight ago. That's why it's only me in the castle, serjo. All the other servants and slaves who tend to his lordship travel with him. Is there something wrong?<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  Yes, there is. Do you know an Ashlander by the name of Sul-Kharifa?<BR>
<BR>
ANARA: No, serjo. I know no one by that name.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  Then you aren't likely to now. He's dead. He was found a few hours ago dying of frostbite in the ashlands. He was hysterical, nearly incomprehensible, but among his last words were $93castle$94 and $93Xyr.$94<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  Dying of frostbite in summertide in the ashlands? B'vek, that's strange. I suppose it's possible that my master knew this man, but being an ashlander and my master being of the House of Telvanni, well, if you'll pardon me for being flippant, serjo, I don't think they would be friends.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  That is your master's library? Would you mind if I looked in?<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  Please, serjo, go wherever you want. We have nothing to hide. We're loyal Imperial subjects.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES: As, I hear, are all Telvanni.<BR>
<BR>
(Note from the playwright: this line should be delivered without sarcasm. Trust the audience to laugh -- it never fails, regardless of the politics of the locals.)<BR>
<BR>
Clavides enters the library and looks over the books.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  The library needs dusting.<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  Yes, serjo. I was just doing that when you knocked at the door.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  I'm grateful for that. If you had finished, I wouldn't notice the space in the dust where a rather large book has recently been removed. Your master is a wizard, it seems.<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  No, serjo. I mean, he studies a lot, but he don't cast no spells, if that's what you mean by wizard. He's a kena, went to college and everything. You know, now that I think about it, I know what happened to that book. One of the other kenas from the college been round yesterday, and borrowed a couple of books. He's a friend of the master, so I thought it'd be all fine.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  This kena, was his name Warvim?<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  Coulda been. I don't remember.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  There is a suspected necromancer at the college named Kena Warvim we arrested last night. We don't know what he was doing at the college, but it was something illegal, that's for certain. Was that the kena who borrowed the book? A little fellow, a cripple with a withered leg?<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  No, serjo, it weren't the kena from yesterday. He was a big fella who could walk, so I noticed.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES: I'm going to have a look around the rest of the house, if you don't mind.<BR>
<BR>
Clavides goes up the stairs, and delivers the following dialogue from the landing and the rooms above. Anara continues straightening up the downstairs, moving a high-backed bench in front of the armor to scrub the floor.<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  Can I ask, serjo, what you're looking for? Maybe I could help you.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  Are these all the rooms in the castle? No secret passages?<BR>
<BR>
ANARA (laughing):  Oh, serjo, what would Sedura Kena Telvanni Hordalf Xyr want with secret passages?<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES (looking at the armor):  Your master is a big man.<BR>
<BR>
ANARA (laughing):  Oh, serjo, don't tease. That's giant armor, just for decoration.  My master slew that giant ten years ago, and kind of keeps it for a souvenir.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  That's right, I remember hearing something about that when I first took my post here. It was someone named Xyr who killed the giant, but I didn't think the first name was Hordalf. Memory fades, I'm afraid.  hat was the giant's name?<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  I'm afraid I don't remember, serjo.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  I do. It was Torfang. $93I got out of Torfang's Shield.$94<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  I don't understand, serjo. Torfang's shield?<BR>
<BR>
Clavides runs down the stairs, and examines the armor.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES: Sul-Kharifa said something about getting out of Torfang's shield. I thought he was just raving, out of his mind.<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  But he ain't got a shield, serjo.<BR>
<BR>
Clavides pushes the high-backed bench out of the way, revealing the large mounted shield at the base of the armor.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  Yes, he does. You covered it up with that bench.<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  I didn't do it on purpose, serjo! I was just cleaning! I see that armor every day, serjo, and b'vek I swear I ain't never noticed the shield before!<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  It's fine, Anara, I believe you.<BR>
<BR>
Clavides pushes on the shield and it pulls back to reveal a tunnel down.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  It appears that Sedura Kena Telvanni Hordalf Xyr does have a need for a secret passage. Could you get me a torch?<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  B'vek, I ain't never seen that before!<BR>
<BR>
Anara takes a torch from the wall, and hands it to Clavides. Clavides enters the tunnel.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  Wait here.<BR>
<BR>
Anara watches Clavides disappear down the tunnel. She appears agitated, and finally runs for the front door. When she opens it, ULLIS, an Argonian lieutenant in the Imperial guard is standing at the entrance. She screams.<BR>
<BR>
ULLIS:  I'm sorry to frighten you.<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  Not now! Go away!<BR>
<BR>
ULLIS:  I'm afraid the Captain wouldn't like that, miss.<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  You're... with the Captain? Blessed mother.<BR>
<BR>
Clavides comes out of the tunnel, white-faced. It takes him a few moments to speak.<BR>
<BR>
ULLIS:  Captain? What's down there?<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES (to Anara):  Did you know your master's a necromancer? That your cellar is filled with bodies?<BR>
<BR>
Anara faints. Ullis carries her to the bench and lays her down.<BR>
<BR>
ULLIS:  Let me see, serjo.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  You'll see soon enough. We're going to need every soldier from the post here to cart away all the corpses. Ullis, I've seen enough battles, but I've never seen anything like this. No two are alike.  Khajiiti, sload, dunmer, cyrodiil, breton, nord, burned alive, poisoned, electrified, melted, torn apart, turned inside out, ripped to shreds and sewn back up together.<BR>
<BR>
ULLIS:  You think the Ashlander escaped, that's what happened?<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  I don't know. Why would someone do something like this, Ullis?<BR>
<BR>
There is a knock on the door. Clavides answers it. A young Argonian woman, ZOLLASSA, is standing, holding a package and a letter.<BR>
<BR>
ZOLLASSA:  Good morning, you're not Lord Xyr, are you?<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  No. What do you have there?<BR>
<BR>
ZOLLASSA:  A letter and a package I'm supposed to deliver to him. Will he be back shortly?<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  I don't believe so. Who gave you the package to deliver?<BR>
<BR>
ZOLLASSA:  My teacher at the college, Kema Warvim. He has a bad leg, so he asked me to bring these to his lordship. Actually, to tell you the truth, I was supposed to deliver them last night, but I was busy.<BR>
<BR>
ULLIS:  Greetings, sistre. We'll give the package to his lordship when we see him.<BR>
<BR>
ZOLLASSA:  Ah, hail, brothre. I had heard there was a handsome Argonian in Scath Anud. Unfortunately, I promised Kema Warvim that I'd deliver the package directly to his lordship's hands. I'm already late, I can't just --<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  We're Imperial Guard, miss. We will take the package and the letter.<BR>
<BR>
Zollassa reluctantly hands Clavides the letter and the package. She turns to go.<BR>
<BR>
ULLIS:  You're at the college, if we need to see you?<BR>
<BR>
ZOLLASSA:  Yes. Fare tidings, brothre.<BR>
<BR>
ULLIS:  Goodnight, sistre.<BR>
<BR>
Clavides opens the package as Zollassa exits. It is a book with many loose sheets.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  It appears we've found the missing book. Delivered to our very hands.<BR>
<BR>
Clavides begins to read the book, silently to himself.<BR>
<BR>
ULLIS (to himself, very pleased): Another Argonian in Scath Anud. And a pretty one, at that. I hope we weren't too rude to her. I'm tired of all these women with their smooth, wet skin, it would be wonderful if we could meet when I'm off duty.  <BR>
<BR>
While Ullis talks, he opens the letter and reads it.<BR>
<BR>
ULLIS (continued):  She looks like she's from the south, like me. You know, Argonians from northern Black Marsh are... much... less...<BR>
<BR>
Ullis continues reading, transfixed by the letter. Clavides skips to the back of the book, and reads the last sentences.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES (reading): In black ink $93The Khajiiti male showed surprisingly little fortitude against a simple lightning spell, but I've had interesting physiological results with a medium-level acid spell cast slowly over several days.$94 In red ink on the margins, $93Yes, I see. Was the acid spell cast uniformly over the entire body of the subject?$94 In black ink $93The Nord female was subjected to sixteen hours of a frost spell which eventually crystalized her into a state of suspended animation, from which she eventually expired. Not so the Nord male, nor the Ashlander male who lapsed into their comas much earlier, but then recovered. The Ashlander then tried to escape, but I restrained him. The Nord then had an interesting chemical overreaction to a simple fire spell and expired. See the accompanying illustration.$94 In red ink, $93Yes, I see. The pattern of boils and lesions suggest some sort of internal incineration perhaps caused by the combination of a short burst of flame following a longer session with frost. It's such a shame I can't come to see the experiment personally, but I compliment you on your excellent notation.$94 In black ink, $93Thank you for the suggestion about slowly poisoning my maid Anara. The dosages you've suggested have had fascinating results, eroding her memory very subtly. I intend to increase it expotentially and see how long it is before she notices. Speaking of which, it is a pity that I haven't any Argonian subjects, but the slave-traders promise me some healthy specimens in the autumn. I should like to test their metabolism in comparison to elves and humans. It's my theory that a medium-level lightning spell cast in a continuous wave on an Argonian wouldn't be lethal for several hours at least, similiar to my results with the Cyrodilic female and, of course, the giant.$94 In red ink, $93It'd be a shame to wait until autumn to see.$94<BR>
<BR>
ULLIS (reading the letter):  In red ink, $93Here is your Argonian. Please let me know the results.$94 It's signed $93Kema Warvim.$94<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  By Kynareth, this isn't necromancy. It's Destruction. Kema Warvim and Kena Telvanni Hordalf Xyr haven't been experimenting with death, but with the limits of magical torture.<BR>
<BR>
ULLIS:  The letter isn't addressed to Kena Telvanni Hordalf Xyr. It's addressed to Sedura Iachilla Xyr. His wife, do you think?<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  Iachilla.  That was the Telvanni of the Xyr family who I heard about in connection with the giant slaying. We'd best get the maid out of here. She'll need to go to a healer.<BR>
<BR>
Clavides wakes up Anara.  She appears disoriented.<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  What's happening? Who are you?<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  Don't worry, everything is going to be fine. We're going to take you to a healer.<BR>
<BR>
ULLIS:  Do you need a coat, Iachilla?<BR>
<BR>
ANARA:  Thank you, no, I'm not cold --<BR>
<BR>
Anara/Iachilla stops, realizing that she's been caught. Clavides and Ullis unsheathe their blades.<BR>
<BR>
CLAVIDES:  You have black ink on your fingers, your ladyship.<BR>
<BR>
ULLIS:  And when you saw me at the door, you thought I was the Argonian your friend Warvim sent over. That's why you said, $93Not now. Go away.$94<BR>
<BR>
ANARA/IACHILLA:  You're much more observant than Anara. She never did understand what was happening, even when I tripled the poison spell and she expired in what I observed as considerable agony.<BR>
<BR>
ULLIS:  What were you going to use on me first, lightning or fire?<BR>
<BR>
ANANA/IACHILLA:  Lightning. I find fire to be too unpredictable.<BR>
<BR>
As she speaks, the flames in the torchs extinguish. The stage is utterly dark.<BR>
<BR>
There is the sound of a struggle, swords clanging. Suddenly a bolt of lightning flashes out, and there is silence. From the darkness, Anana/Iachilla speaks.<BR>
<BR>
ANANA/IACHILLA: Fascinating.<BR>
<BR>
There are several more flashes of lightning as the curtain closes.<BR>
<BR>
THE END.<BR>
<BR>"""
"""<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
夏尔城堡惊魂<BR>
独幕剧<BR>
巴罗斯・库尔　著<BR><BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR><BR>
出场人物<BR>
克拉维德斯，帝国卫队的队长。西罗帝尔人。<BR>
阿娜拉，一名丹莫女仆。<BR>
乌利斯，帝国卫队的一名副官。阿尔贡人。<BR>
佐拉萨，一名年轻的阿尔贡人法师。<BR>
<BR>
深夜。剧幕于司凯斯・艾努德的一座城堡的宏伟入口大厅内拉开，这里满是华美的家具和挂毯。火把是唯一的光源。大厅中央的巨大铁门便是通往城堡的主入口，通往上层的楼梯坐落其侧。舞台的左侧是一扇通往图书馆的门，目前是关闭着的。舞台的右侧是一副足有二十尺高的巨大护甲，几乎触及到天花板。虽然空无一人，但可以听见一个女人的歌声从图书馆的门里传出来。<BR>
<BR>
敲打铁前门的一声巨响打断了女人的歌声。图书馆的门打开了，一个相貌普通的女仆阿娜拉匆匆跑出来打开了前门。身着帝国制服的英俊男子，克拉维德斯站在那里。<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：晚安，先生。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：晚安。你的主人在家吗？<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：不，先生，只有我在这里。我的主人瑟杜拉・科纳・泰瓦尼・霍达夫・夏尔在他的避暑庄园。有什么我可以为您效劳的吗？<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：或许吧。我可以进来吗？<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：当然可以，先生。请进。我能为您端上一杯飞令酒吗？<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯走进大厅并环顾四周。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：不，谢谢。你叫什么名字？<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：阿娜拉，先生。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：阿娜拉，你的主人什么时候离开司凯斯・艾努德？<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：超过两个星期以前。这就是为什么只有我在这个城堡里，先生。所有其他的仆人和奴隶都跟着主人一起走了。有什么问题吗？<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：是的。你认识一位名叫苏尔・哈瑞发的灰烬民吗？<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：不，先生。我并不认识这个人。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：你大概也没有这个机会了。他已经死了。在数小时前，他被发现在灰烬因冻伤而死。他当时有些狂乱，话语乱到无法理解，但在他最后的话语中出现了“城堡”和“夏尔”两个词。<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：死于冻伤？在灰烬的夏天？天哪，这太奇怪了。我想我的主人可能会认识这个人，但鉴于他是一个灰烬民，而我的主人出身泰瓦尼家族，请恕我无礼，先生，我不认为他们会是朋友。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：那是你主人的图书馆？我能进去看看吗？<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：请随意，先生。我们没有什么好隐瞒的。我们是忠诚的帝国人民。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：我听说所有泰瓦尼家族的人都如此。<BR>
<BR>
（剧作家的注释：这句话应不带任何讽刺意味地说出。观众一定会发笑--从未失效，不管当地人的政见为何。）<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯进入图书馆，并仔细查看书籍。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：图书馆需要打扫了。<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：是的，先生，在您敲门的时候我正在打扫。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：我对此很感谢。如果你已经打扫完了，我就不会注意到这片灰尘中有一处空白，想必一本相当大的书最近被拿走了。看起来你的主人似乎是一名法师。<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：不，先生。我的意思是，他在这方面做了很多研究，但他从未施放过任何法术，如果你所指的法师是这样的话。他是一位学者，去过学院和各种地方。喔，现在我想起来了，我知道这本书怎么回事了。来自学院的一位学者昨天到过这里，并借走了几本书。他是主人的一位朋友，所以我想应该没什么问题。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：这位学者，他是不是叫做沃维姆？<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：好像是，我不太记得了。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：昨晚，我们在学院拘捕了一位名叫科玛・沃维姆的亡灵法师，他涉嫌此案。我们不知道他在学院都做些什么，但肯定是一些非法的事情。是那位学者借的书吗？一个瘦小的，拖着残腿的跛脚之人？<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：不，先生，这不是昨天来的那位学者。他是个步伐稳健的大个子，所以我留心了一下。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：我要去查看一下这个房子的其他部分，如果不介意的话。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯上了楼，并在二楼楼梯和上面的房间里说出接下来的台词。阿娜拉继续在楼下打扫，把一个高椅背的椅子移到护甲前，以便清洗地板。<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：我能问一下吗，先生，您在找些什么？也许我可以帮您。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：这些就是城堡的全部房间了吗？没有任何密道？<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉（笑）：噢，先生，瑟杜拉・科纳・泰瓦尼・霍达夫・夏尔要密道做什么？<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯（看着那副护甲）：你的主人身材很魁梧。<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉（笑）：噢，先生，不要说笑了。那只是用来装饰的巨人护甲。我的主人在十年前杀了那个巨人，然后把它留下来作为纪念。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：没错，我记得我刚来这里履职的时候听说过这件事。是个姓夏尔的人杀死了巨人，但我不认为他的名字是霍达夫。可能记忆模糊了。那个巨人的名字是？<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：我恐怕我不记得了，先生。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：我记得。他叫托尔范。“我从托尔范的盾里出来”。<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：我不明白，先生。托尔范的盾？<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯抛下楼梯，仔细查看那副护甲。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：苏尔・哈瑞发说了一些关于从托尔范的盾里出来的话。当时我以为他是语无伦次，胡言乱语的。<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：但是他没有盾牌，先生。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯把高椅背的椅子推开，护甲下露出一面固定着的巨大盾牌。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：是的，他有。被你用椅子挡住了。<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：我并不是故意这么做的，先生！我只是在打扫！我每天都看见这副护甲，先生，我发誓我从未发现过这个盾牌！<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：没事的，阿娜拉，我相信你。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯推动盾牌，盾牌向后退去，露出了一个地道。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：看来瑟杜拉・科纳・泰瓦尼・霍达夫・夏尔的确需要一个密道。你能给我一支火把吗？<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：天哪，我从来没见过这个！<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉从墙上取下一支火把，并递给克拉维德斯。克拉维德斯进入地道。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：在这等着。<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉看着克拉维德斯走下地道，消失在视野中。她显得很焦虑，并最后跑向前门。当她打开大门时，乌利斯，一名帝国卫队的阿尔贡人副官站在入口处。她尖叫起来。<BR>
<BR>
乌利斯：我很抱歉吓到你了。<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：现在不是时候！走开！<BR>
<BR>
乌利斯：恐怕队长不这样想，小姐。<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：你是......和队长一起的？天啊。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯脸色苍白地走出地道。他花了一会儿工夫才开口说话。<BR>
<BR>
乌利斯：队长？底下有些什么？<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯（对阿娜拉）：你知不知道你的主人是个亡灵法师？而且你们的地窖里塞满了尸体？<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉昏倒了。乌利斯将她抱到椅子上并扶她躺下。<BR>
<BR>
乌利斯：让我看看，先生。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：你待会能看个够。我们现在需要驻地内的每个士兵过来搬走全部的尸体。乌利斯，我见过的战场已经够多了，但从来没见过哪次像今天这样。没有两具尸体是相似的。凯季特人，蛞蟾人，丹莫，赛瑞迪尔人，布莱顿人，诺德人，活活烧死的，毒死的，电死的，溶解的，身体被撕裂的，内脏被挖出来的，被撕成碎片再缝起来的。<BR>
<BR>
乌利斯：你认为那个灰烬民从这里逃了出来，这就是真相？<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：我不知道。为什么会有人做这样的事，乌利斯？<BR>
<BR>
有人敲门。克拉维德斯前去应门。一名年轻的阿尔贡人女子，佐拉萨站在门口，拿着一个包裹和一封信。<BR>
<BR>
佐拉萨：早安，你不是夏尔领主，对吧？<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：不是。你拿着什么？<BR>
<BR>
佐拉萨：一封信和一个包裹，我应该要交给他。他很快就会回来吗？<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：我不这么认为。谁给你这个包裹的？<BR>
<BR>
佐拉萨：我在学院的老师，科玛・沃维姆。他行动不便，所以他要我帮他带这些给阁下。实际上，说实话，我应该在昨天晚上就交给他，不过我太忙了。<BR>
<BR>
乌利斯：你好，姐妹。等我们碰到阁下时，我们会转交给他。<BR>
<BR>
佐拉萨：噢，你好，兄弟。我早就听说在司凯斯・艾努德有一位英俊的阿尔贡人。不好意思，我答应过科玛・沃维姆要亲手将包裹直接交到阁下手里。我已经晚了，我不能再......<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：我们是帝国卫兵，小姐。我们会拿走这个包裹和信件。<BR>
<BR>
佐拉萨有些不情愿地将信件和包裹交给克拉维德斯。她转身离去。<BR>
<BR>
乌利斯：你会在学院里吗，如果我们需要见你的话？<BR>
<BR>
佐拉萨：是的。祝你好运，兄弟。<BR>
<BR>
乌利斯：再见，姐妹。<BR>
<BR>
在佐拉萨离开后，克拉维德斯打开包裹。里面是一本夹着许多活页的书。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：看来我们已经找到了那本失踪的书。恰好送到我们手中。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯开始默默地阅读这本书。<BR>
<BR>
乌利斯（自言自语，非常开心）：另一个在司凯斯・艾努德的阿尔贡人！而且那么漂亮。我希望我们刚才对她不会太失礼。我已经厌倦了这些皮肤光滑又湿润的女人了，如果能够在不当值的时候碰面就太美妙了。<BR>
<BR>
乌利斯说着，一边拆开信件阅读。<BR>
<BR>
乌利斯（继续自言自语）：她看起来像是和我一样从南方来的。你知道，那些来自黑沼北部的阿尔贡人都......很......<BR>
<BR>
乌利斯继续看信，被信里的内容吓得瞠目结舌。克拉维德斯跳到了书的最后，开始读最后的几句话。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯（朗读）：用黑色墨水写着，“男性凯季特人显示了出人意料的极弱的闪电抗性，即使是对一个简单的闪电法术，但在持续数天对其施放一个中级的酸性法术后，得到了一个有趣的生理学结果”用红色墨水在空白处写着，“是的，我看到了。这个酸性法术是均匀地施放在整个身体上吗？”用黑色墨水写着，“女性诺德人可忍受十六个小时的寒霜法术，最终以假死的状态将她冻结，并以这个状态逐渐死亡。男性诺德和灰烬民都不会如此，他们陷入昏迷的时间要早得多，但随后会醒过来。那个灰烬民试图逃跑，但我阻止了他。那个诺德人接着对一个简单的火焰法术产生了有趣的化学过度反应，然后就死了。见附随的图解”用红色墨水写着，“是，我见着了。烧伤的痕迹和身体损伤的模样令人想起某种内部焚化，可能是短时间的火烧和长时间的冰冻一起作用的结果。很遗憾我无法亲自来观察这个实验，但我非常欣赏你周密的实验记录”用黑色墨水写着，“感谢你关于对我的女仆阿娜拉逐渐缓慢下毒的建议。你所建议的计量产生了极好的效果，巧妙地腐蚀着她的记忆。我打算逐渐地增加毒性，看看何时她才会后知后觉。说到这，对于还没有得到任何阿尔贡人实验体，我觉得很可惜，不过奴隶贩子向我保证会在秋天送来一些健康的样本。我希望测试他们的新陈代谢情况，并与精灵和人类的进行比较。我的理论是，一个中级等幅波的闪电法术在阿尔贡人身上不会导致他在至少几个小时之内死亡，类似于我在女性赛瑞迪尔人，以及，当然了，巨人身上获得的结果”用红色墨水写着，“要等到秋天才能看到真是太可惜了”。<BR>
<BR>
乌利斯（朗读信件）：用红色墨水，“这是你要的阿尔贡人。请让我知道实验结果”署名为“科玛・沃维姆”。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：凯娜瑞丝啊，这不是亡灵法术。这是毁灭系法术。科玛・沃维姆和科纳・泰瓦尼・霍达夫・夏尔不是在对死亡进行实验，而是在研究法术折磨的极限。<BR>
<BR>
乌利斯：这封信的收信人不是科纳・泰瓦尼・霍达夫・夏尔，而是瑟杜拉・亚奇拉・夏尔。他的妻子，你认为呢？<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：亚奇拉。我听说那就是杀死巨人的泰瓦尼家族成员。我们最好带那位女仆离开这里。她需要一位治疗者。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯叫醒阿娜拉。她看起来有些混乱。<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：发生了什么事？你们是谁？<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：别担心，一切都会没事的。我们要带你去找治疗者。<BR>
<BR>
乌利斯：你需要外套吗，亚奇拉？<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉：谢谢，不了，我不冷--<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉/亚奇拉停顿了，意识到自己被设了圈套。克拉维德斯和乌利斯拔出了他们的剑。<BR>
<BR>
克拉维德斯：您的手指上还有黑色墨水，尊贵的夫人。<BR>
<BR>
乌利斯：而且当你在门口看到我时，你还以为我是你朋友沃维姆送来的阿尔贡人。这就是为什么你会说，“现在不是时候，走开”。<BR>
<BR>
阿娜拉/亚奇拉：你们比阿娜拉机灵多了。她从来都不明白到底发生了什么事，甚至在我将法术毒性加剧了三倍，使她痛苦致死，也浑然不解。<BR>
<BR>
乌利斯：你原本打算对我做什么，闪电还是火焰？<BR>
<BR>
阿娜娜/亚奇拉：闪电。我发现火焰的效果太难预测了。<BR>
<BR>
在她说话时，火把上的火焰熄灭了。舞台陷入彻底的黑暗。<BR>
<BR>
从中传出打斗的声音，剑撞击的铿锵之声。突然，一道闪电一闪而过，随后便安静了。在黑暗之中，阿娜娜/亚奇拉说话了。<BR>
<BR>
阿娜娜/亚奇拉：太美妙了。<BR>
<BR>
随着布幕的缓缓拉阖，多道闪电不断划过。<BR>
<BR>
剧终<BR>
<BR>

Plate

Ornate Dwemer Goblet

Dwemer Mug
锻莫缸

Ahnia,<BR>
I've tried so hard, and yet no one has any interest in this blasted book. Perhaps if anyone could READ it, it might sell as well as the scrolls do. If I can't get rid of it soon, I'm returning it to you. I don't want to hold on to it for too much longer, or else people might suspect something.<BR>

> BOOK.FNAM bk_diary_sailor
Diary of a Lost Sailor
迷途水手的日记

> BOOK.TEXT bk_diary_sailor
"""<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>

<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR><BR>
Day One:<BR>
<BR>
My crew and I were caught in a fierce storm just outside Ebonheart. We managed to make it to safety, but are now completely lost. Without a cargo or a ship there isn't much we can do. I will try to find passage for us somewhere. We are unarmed and ill-equipped to defend ourselves. Hopefully someone will take pity on us. The crew is waiting on the shore for my return.<BR>

<BR>
Day Three:<BR>
<BR>
I am confident I will find a village inland that will have access to a ship. I think I see smoke off in the distance. Maybe tomorrow will bring a change of luck.<BR>

<BR>
Day Seven:<BR>
<BR>
Those cursed villagers! May their fields dry up and their children suffer! They have steered me completely in the wrong direction. I firmly believe I am going further and further inland. If I don't see a fishing village soon I will be forced to turn back. I have been subsiding on roots and grasses and grow weaker every day. I must find a way for my crew and I to get home.<BR>
<BR>
Boiled my shoes to make broth. I had heard it would work. It didn't. Now I have no shoes.<BR>
<BR>
Day Twelve:<BR>
<BR>
This is pointless. I have been directed to a fishing village to the east but so far have seen or heard nothing.<BR>
<BR>
Killed a rat today. It was the most food I have eaten in days. Tasted worse than scrib jelly but better than shoes.<BR>
<BR>
Day Thirteen:<BR>
<BR>
From my vantage point in a tall tree I finally see a town! While I do not see any sign of water it does look to be a fairly sizable town, and may have a trade route to the sea. I should reach it tomorrow.<BR>
<BR>
Day Twenty:<BR>
<BR>
Lost. All is lost. I have, once again, been misled. After entering the town, I came across a man who offered to help. Weak from hunger and exhaustion I believed him, and followed him underground to his home. They have a massive underground system of tunnels and old sewers here. It's really quite amazing. Unfortunately I seem to have made a rude comment about his sister being smoldering and he beat me senseless. When I awoke I was in this pit with no way out in sight. I can see up to the floor above, but no one responds to my cries for help. I fear I will end my days here. Oh, why did I ever leave my crew! They must be giving up hope now, as am I.<BR>
<BR>
Day Twenty-five:<BR>
<BR>
Woke up to hear noises of construction from the floor above. Ran to the opening and cried out. It was to no avail, however. Instead they tossed down the most horrible creature. It is rank and ugly and eyes me in the most vicious way. I have retreated to this corner and await my doom. It will get hungry soon, and I fear it sees me as its only source of food. I am too weak to defend myself. This will be my last entry. If someone finds my bones, bury me facing the sea, wherever that may be.<BR>

<BR>
"""
"""<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR><BR>
第一天：<BR>
<BR>
我和我的船员们再黑檀心外遭遇了一场猛烈的风暴。我设法想要挺过这场危机，但最终我们还是遇难了。我们漂到一个岸边，失去了我们的船，没有物资，没有其他路过的船只，我们完全无能为力。我会设法在某个地方为我们找到出路的。我们现在手无寸铁，没有任何自卫能力，我只希望有人会同情我们。我的船员们在岸边等着我回来。<BR>

<BR>
第三天：<BR>
<BR>
我想我应该可以找到一个内陆的村庄并借到一艘船，我看到远处有炊烟，也许明天就能迎来转机。<BR>

<BR>
第七天：<BR>
<BR>
我诅咒那些村民！我诅咒他们的田地干涸，诅咒他们的孩子受苦！他们指引我走向了完全错误的方向！我在内陆里面越走越远了，如果我不能尽快找到一个渔村，我可能不得不折返回去了。每天吃树根和野草，我感觉自己的身体一天比一天虚弱了。我必须尽快为我和我的船员找到回家的路…<BR>
<BR>
我听说用我的鞋子煮汤可能会有用，但事实证明它没用，我现在失去了自己的鞋子。<BR>
<BR>
第十二天：<BR>
<BR>
这没有意义。我被告知东部有一个渔村，但是到现在为止我什么也没看到什么也没听到。<BR>
<BR>
我今天杀了一只老鼠，这是我这几天内吃的最好的一顿了。味道不如幼虫胶质但总比吃鞋子好。<BR>
<BR>
第十三天：<BR>
<BR>
我从一棵很高的树上终于在远处看到了一个城镇！虽然我没有在附近看到水域，但那确实是一个规模相当大的城镇，并且很有可能有能够通往大海的贸易路线！我应该能够在明天抵达这座城镇。<BR>
<BR>
第二十天：<BR>
<BR>
完了，一切都完了。我又一次，错失了机会。我遇到了一个愿意帮我的人，在饥饿和疲惫所带来的虚弱下，我相信了他，跟着他回到了他位于地下的家。他们在这里拥有庞大的地下隧道系统和老旧的下水道系统，这太神奇了。很不幸的是，我好像对他发烧的妹妹做出了一些粗鲁的言论，然后挨了他一顿打。当我醒来的时候，我发现自己在这个坑里，找不到任何出路。我能看到上面的地面，但是没有任何人回应我的呼救。恐怕我就要交代在这里了。唉！我为什么要离开我的船员呢？他们肯定已经放弃希望了，我也是。<BR>
<BR>
第二十五天：<BR>
<BR>
当我醒来时，我听到楼上发出建筑的噪音。我跑到洞口大叫了一声，然而这无济于事。不仅如此，他们还放进来一头恐怖的生物。这头生物真的丑陋无比，它恶狠狠地看着我。我现在躲在角落里，等待着厄运的降临。估计很快它就会饿了，恐怕它会把我当作它唯一的食物来源。我现在太虚弱了，没办法保护自己。这可能会是我写下的最后一段，如果有人能找到我的遗骸，我请求你把我的遗骸扔进大海里，不管是哪里的大海都行。<BR>

<BR>
"""

"""<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR><BR>
The Bearer of this document, under special dispensation of the Night Mother, who has entered in a contract in perpetuity with H, is given special dispensation to execute %PCName, a %PCRace recently residing on the island of Vvardenfell. In accordance with all laws and traditions, the afore-mentioned personage will be executed in the name of H in the most expedient manner possible. All services of the Dark Brotherhood are at the disposal of the Bearer of this binding and non-disputable document.<BR>
<BR>"""
"""<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>

<DIV ALIGN="center"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="2" FACE="Daedric">THE  SOUL OF ANOTHER IS PAINED. INVOKE AND RELEASE HIM FROM ANGUISH AND SUFFERING</FONT><BR>

Athelyn Malas
阿瑟林・马拉斯

> CONT.FNAM crate_Andren_UNI
Andren's - Keep Out!
属于安德伦 - 闲人勿动！

> BOOK.FNAM bk_Adren

警告！！！

> BOOK.TEXT bk_Adren
"""<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
This is my box. What I keep all my stuff in. Stay out or I will make you dead like Gilur's pet durzog what stopped moving after he sat on it.
<BR>
<IMG SRC="Adren_note.tga" WIDTH="240" HEIGHT="240"><BR>
<BR>

"""
"""<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
这是我的盒子，我把我所有的东西都放在里面。吉路尔的宠物杜佐格犬曾坐在了我的盒子上，现在它已经断气了。不准乱动，否则我会让你落得和那只畜牲一样的下场！
<BR>
<IMG SRC="Adren_note.tga" WIDTH="240" HEIGHT="240"><BR>
<BR>

"""

> CONT.FNAM crate_Malar_UNI
Malar's Stuff
玛拉尔的物品

> BOOK.FNAM bk_suicidenote
For Shara, on my death
写给莎拉的永别信

> BOOK.TEXT bk_suicidenote
"""<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
My dearest love,<BR>
I have failed you. But how? I brought you sacks of comberry, crates of fine clothes, and chests of gold. But still you spurn my affections. I killed the trader who robbed you and still you refuse me. I have sat by your house day after day, rain or sun, waiting for a hint of your affection, but to no avail. I grow weary of this life. Since you have not yet arrived here to meet me, I can only assume the worst - that I will never feel your soft arms around me or watch you sleep without having to fear the guards that now patrol your land. <BR>
<BR>
Goodbye my darling. Think of me fondly and often. And without reaching for your knife.
<BR>



"""
"""<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
我的宝贝，<BR>
我让你失望了。但是我该怎么做？我给你带来了几袋麻袋、几箱精美的衣服和几箱金币。但你仍然拒绝我的感情。我杀了抢劫你的商人，你仍然拒绝我。我日复一日地坐在你家，风雨无阻，等待你的一丝情意，但无济于事。我厌倦了这种生活。既然你还没有到这里来见我，我只能假设最坏的情况--我永远等不到你柔软的手臂搂着我的感觉，也等不到能够静静地看着你睡觉，而不必害怕现在在你的土地上巡逻的那些守卫的那一天。<BR>
<BR>
再见，我的宝贝。希望你能经常想起我。不过也希望你不要为我的离开而寻短见。
<BR>



"""

> CONT.FNAM de_r_chest_01_aleri
Aleri Aren's Chest
艾蕾莉・爱伦的箱子

> CONT.FNAM de_r_chest_01_milvela
Milvela Dralen's Chest
米尔维拉・达拉伦的箱子

> CONT.FNAM de_r_chest_01_Drusus
Drusus Gratus' Chest
德鲁苏斯・格拉图斯的箱子

> CONT.FNAM de_r_chest_01_Alusannah
Alusannah's Chest
阿鲁萨纳的箱子

> CONT.FNAM de_r_chest_01_Diradeni
Diradeni Farano's Chest

> NPC_.FNAM ordinator_MH_Sadri
