高级神殿卫兵

> CONT.FNAM com_chest_02_v_indalen
Wooden Chest
木箱

> WEAP.FNAM silver dagger_othril_unique
Othril Dagger
奥瑟里尔匕首

> WEAP.FNAM silver dagger_iryon_unique
Iryon Dagger
伊瑞恩匕首

> WEAP.FNAM silver dagger_rathalas_unique
Rathalas Dagger
瑞萨拉斯匕首

> NPC_.FNAM ordinator_mh_stationary
High Ordinator
高级神殿卫兵

> BOOK.FNAM bk_Artifacts_Tamriel
Famed Artifacts of Tamriel
《泰姆瑞尔的闻名至宝》

> BOOK.TEXT bk_Artifacts_Tamriel
"""<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
Tamrielic Artifacts<BR><BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR><BR>
Liested below are some of the more storied items found throughout Tamrielic lore. The existence of some has been proven, while others may simply be the stuff of legend. Regardless, these items have found their way into the tales we tell our children, and our children will tell their children, and are inextricably linked to the <BR>
<BR>
Lord's Mail<BR>
<BR>
Sometimes called the Armor of Morihaus or the gift of Kynareth, this is an ancient cuirass of unsurpassable quality. It grants the wearer power to absorb health, resist the effects of spells, and cure oneself of poison when used. It is said that whenever Kynareth deigns the wearer unworthy, the Lord's Mail will be taken away and hidden for the next chosen one.<BR>
<BR>
Ebony Mail<BR>
<BR>
The Ebony Mail is a breastplate created before recorded history by the Dark Elven goddess Boethiah. It is she who determines who should possess the Ebony Mail and for how long a time. If judged worthy, its power grants the wearer added resistance of fire, magicka, and grants a magical shield. It is Boethiah alone who determines when a person is ineligible to bear the Ebony Mail any longer, and the goddess can be very capricious.<BR>
<BR>
Spell Breaker<BR>
<BR>
Spell Breaker, superficially a Dwemer tower shield, is one of the most ancient relics of Tamriel. Aside from its historical importance in the Battle of Rourken-Shalidor, the Spell Breaker protects its wielder almost completely from any spell caster, either by reflecting magicks or silencing any mage about to cast a spell. It is said that Spell Breaker still searches for its original owner, and will not remain the property of anyone else for long. For most, possessing Spell Breaker for any length of time is power enough.<BR>
<BR>
Chrysamere<BR>
<BR>
The Paladin's Blade is an ancient claymore with offensive capabilities surpassed only by its own defenses. It lends the wielder health, protects him or her from fire, and reflects any spells cast against the wielder back to the caster. Seldom has Chrysamere been wielded by any bladesman for any length of time, for it chooses not to favor one champion.<BR>
<BR>
Staff of Magnus<BR>
<BR>
The Staff of Magnus, one of the elder artifacts of Tamriel, was a metaphysical battery of sorts for its creator, Magnus. When used, it absorbs an enemy's health and mystical energy. In time, the Staff will abandon the mage who wields it before he becomes too powerful and upsets the mystical balance it is sworn to protect.<BR>
<BR>
Warlock's Ring<BR>
<BR>
The Warlock's Ring of the Archmage Syrabane is one of the most popular relics of myth and fable. In Tamriel's ancient history, Syrabane saved all of the continent by judicious use of his Ring, and ever since, it has helped adventurers with less lofty goals. It is best known for its ability to reflect spells cast at its wearer and to improve his or her speed and to restore health. No adventurer can wear the Warlock's Ring for long, for it is said that the Ring is Syrabane's alone to command.<BR>
<BR>
Ring of Phynaster<BR>
<BR>
The Ring of Phynaster was made hundreds of years ago by a man who needed good defenses to survive his adventurous life. Thanks to the Ring, Phynaster lived for hundreds of years, and since then it has passed from person to person. The Ring improves its wearer's overall resistance to poison, magicka, and shock. Still, Phynaster was cunning and cursed the ring so that it eventually disappears from its holder's possessions and returns to another resting place, discontent to stay anywhere but with Phynaster himself.<BR>
<BR>
Ring of Khajiit<BR>
<BR>
The Ring of the Khajiit is an ancient relic, hundreds of years older than Rajhin, the thief that made the Ring famous. It was Rajhin who used the Ring's powers to make himself invisible and as quick as the breath of wind. Using the Ring, he became the most successful burglar in Elsweyr's history. Rajhin's eventual fate is a mystery, but according to legend, the Ring rebelled against such constant use and disappeared, leaving Rajhin helpless before his enemies.<BR>
<BR>
Mace of Molag Bal<BR>
<BR>
Also known as the Vampire's Mace, the Mace of Molag Bal drains its victims of magicka and gives it to the bearer. It also has the ability to transfer an enemy's strength to its wielder. Molag Bal has been quite free with his artifact. There are many legends about the Mace. It seems to be a favorite for vanquishing wizards. <BR>
<BR>
Masque of Clavicus Vile<BR>
<BR>
Ever the vain one, Clavicus Vile made a masque suited to his own personality. The bearer of the Masque is more likely to get a positive response from the people of Tamriel. The higher his personality, the larger the bonus. The best known story of the Masque tells the tale of Avalea, a noblewoman of some renown. As a young girl, she was grossly disfigured by a spiteful servant. Avalea made a dark deal with Clavicus Vile and received the Masque in return. Though the Masque did not change her looks, suddenly she had the respect and admiration of everyone. A year and a day after her marriage to a well connected baron, Clavicus Vile reclaimed the Masque. Although pregnant with his child, Avalea was banished from the Baron's household. Twenty one years and one day later, Avalea's daughter claimed her vengeance by slaying the Baron.<BR>
<BR>
Mehrunes Razor<BR>
<BR>
The Dark Brotherhood has coveted this ebony dagger for generations. This mythical artifact is capable of slaying any creature instantly. History does not record any bearers of Mehrune's Razor. However, the Dark Brotherhood was once decimated by a vicious internal power struggle. It is suspected that the Razor was involved.<BR>
<BR>
Cuirass of the Savior's Hide<BR>
<BR>
Another of Hircine's artifacts was the Cuirass of the Savior's Hide. The Cuirass has the special ability to resist magicka. Legend has it that Hircine rewarded his peeled hide to the first and only mortal to have ever escaped his hunting grounds. This unknown mortal had the hide tailored into this magical Cuirass for his future adventures. The Savior's Hide has a tendency to travel from hero to hero as though it has a mind of its own.<BR>
<BR>
Spear of Bitter Mercy<BR>
<BR>
One of the more mysterious artifacts is the Spear of Bitter Mercy. Little to nothing is known about the Spear. There are no recorded histories but many believe it to be of Daedric origin. The only known legend about it is its use by a mighty hero during the fall of the Battlespire. The hero was aided by the Spear in the defeat of Mehrunes Dagon and the recapturing of the Battlespire. Since that time, the Spear of Bitter Mercy has made few appearances within Tamriel.<BR>
<BR>
Daedric Scourge<BR>
<BR>
The Daedric Scourge is a mighty mace forged from sacred ebony in the Fires of Fickledire. The legendary weapon of Mackkan, it was once a fierce weapon used to send spirits of black back into Oblivion. The weapon lhas the ability to summon creatures from Oblivion, Once a tool used against the Daedric Lords in the Battlespire, it now roams the land with adventurers. <BR>
<BR>
Bow of Shadows<BR>
<BR>
Legend has it that the Bow of Shadows was forged by the Daedra Nocturnal. The legendary ranger, Raerlas Ghile, was granted the Bow for a secret mission that failed, and the Bow was lost. Raerlas did not go down without a hearty fight and is said to have, with the aid of the Bow, taken scores of his foes with him. The Bow grants the user the ability of invisibility and increased speed. Many sightings of the Bow of Shadows have been reported, and it is even said that the sinister Dark Elf assassin of the Second Era, Dram, once wielded this bow.<BR>
<BR>
Fists of Randagulf<BR>
<BR>
Randagulf of Clan Begalin goes down in Tamrielic history as one of the mightiest warriors from Skyrim. He was known for his courage and ferocity in battle and was a factor in many battles. He finally met his fate when King Harald conquered Skyrim. King Harald respected this great hero and took Randagulf's gauntlets for his own. After King Harald died, the gauntlets disappeared. The King claimed that the Fists granted the bearer added strength.<BR>
<BR>
Ice Blade of the Monarch<BR>
<BR>
The Ice Blade of the Monarch is truly one of Tamriel's most prized artifacts. Legend has it that the Evil Archmage Almion Celmo enchanted the claymore of a great warrior with the soul of a Frost Monarch, a stronger form of the more common Frost Atronach. The warrior, Thurgnarr Assi, was to play a part in the assassination of a great king in a far off land, and become the new leader. The assassination failed and the Archmage was imprisoned. The Ice Blade freezes all who feel its blade. The Blade circulates from owner to owner, never settling in one place for long.<BR>
<BR>
Ring of Surroundings<BR>
<BR>
Little is known of this prize but it is said that it lends the wearer the ability to blend in with their surroundings.<BR>
<BR>
Boots of the Apostle<BR>
<BR>
The Boots of the Apostle are a true mystery. The wearer of the boots is rumored to be able to levitate, though nobody has ever seen them used.<BR>
<BR>
The Mentor's Ring<BR>
<BR>
This ring is a prized possession for any apprentice to magic. It lends the wearer the ability to increase their intelligence and wisdom, thus making their use of magic more efficient. The High Wizard Carni Asron is said to be the creator of the Ring. It was a construct for his young apprentices while studying under his guidance. After Asron's death, the Ring and several other possessions vanished and have been circulated throughout Tamriel.<BR>
<BR>
Ring of the Wind<BR>
<BR>
No facts are known about this Ring, but the title and the few rumors lend one to think it grants the wearer added speed.<BR>
<BR>
Vampiric Ring<BR>
<BR>
One of the more deadly and rare artifacts in Tamriel is the Vampiric Ring. It is said that the Ring has the power to steal its victim's health and grant it to the wearer. The exact nature and origin of the Ring is wholly unknown, but many elders speak of its evil creation in Morrowind long, long ago by a cult of Vampire followers. The Vampiric Ring is an extremely rare artifact and is only seen every few hundred cycles of the moons.<BR>
<BR>
Eleidon's Ward<BR>
<BR>
Eleidon was a holy knight of legend in Breton history. He was a sought after man for his courage and determination to set all wrongs right. In one story, it is said that he rescued a Baron's daughter from sure death at the hands of an evil warlord. For his reward, the Baron spent all of his riches to have an enchanted shield built for Eidelon. The Shield granted Eleidon the opportunity to heal his wounds.<BR>
<BR>
Staff of Hasedoki<BR>
<BR>
Hasedoki was said to have been a very competitive wizard. He wandered the land in search for a wizard who was greater than he. To the best of all knowledge, he never found a wizard who could meet up to his challenge. It is said that he felt so lonely and isolated because so many feared his power, that he bonded his life-force into his very own staff, where his soul remains to this very day. Magic users all over Tamriel have been searching for this magical staff. Granting its wielder a protection of magicka, it is a sure prize for any magic user.<BR>
<BR>
Bloodworm Helm<BR>
<BR>
The King of Worms was said to have left behind one of his prized possessions, the Bloodworm Helm. The Helm is a construct of magically formed bone. The Helm allows the user to summon skeletons and control the undead. It would be a prized artifact to a necromancer.<BR>
<BR>
Dragonbone Mail<BR>
<BR>
This cuirass is one of the greatest artifacts any collector or hero could own. It is constructed of real dragon bone and was enchanted by the first Imperial Battlemage, Zurin Arctus, in the early years of the Third Era. It is a truly exquisite piece of work and many have sought to possess it. The properties of the Cuirass allow the wearer to be resist fire, and to damage an enemy with a blast of fire. Little is known about the involvement of Zurin Arctus with the enchantment of the Cuirass, but an old tale speaks of a debt that he owed to a traveling warrior. Like the warrior, the Dragonbone Mail never stays put for long.<BR>
<BR>
Skull Crusher<BR>
<BR>
The Skull Crusher is an amazingly large, and powerful weapon. The Warhammer was created in a fire, magically fueled by the Wizard, Dorach Gusal, and was forged by the great weaponsmith, Hilbongard Rolamus. The steel is magically hardened and the weight of the weapon is amazingly light, which makes for more powerful swings and deadly blows. The Warhammer was to be put on display for a festival, but thieves got it first. The Skull Crusher still travels Tamriel in search of its creators.<BR>
<BR>
Goldbrand<BR>
<BR>
This magical Sword is almost a complete mystery. Thieves tell tales about its golden make and how it was actually forged by ancient dragons of the North. Their tales claim that it was given to a great knight who was sworn to protect the dragons. The Sword lends its wielder the ability to do fire damage on an enemy. Goldbrand has not been sighted in recent history and is said to be awaiting a worthy hero.<BR>
<BR>
Fang of Haynekhtnamet<BR>
<BR>
Black Marsh was once known to be inhabited with what the Argonians called the Wamasus. Northern men considered them to be intelligent dragons with lightning for blood. One such mighty beast, Haynekhtnamet, was slain by the Northern men, though it took 7 days and nights, and a score of men. One of the surviving men took a fang home as a trophy. The fang was carved down into a blade and fashioned into a small dagger. The Dagger mysteriously houses some of the beast's magical properties and grants the user the ability to do shock damage on an opponent. This unique Dagger is seen occasionally by traveling heroes.<BR>
<BR>
Umbra Sword<BR>
<BR>
The Umbra Sword was enchanted by the ancient witch Naenra Waerr, and its sole purpose was the entrapment of souls. Used in conjunction with a soul gem, the Sword allows the wielder the opportunity to imprison an enemy's soul in the gem. Naenra was executed for her evil creation, but not before she was able to hide the Sword. The Umbra Sword is very choosy when it comes to owners and therefore remains hidden until a worthy one is found.<BR>
<BR>
Denstagmer's Ring<BR>
<BR>
All that is known of this Ring is that it may grant the user protection from certain elements. Even the name Denstagmer is a mystery.<BR>
<BR>
Helm of Oreyn Bearclaw<BR>
<BR>
One of Valenwood's legendary heroes is Oreyn Bearclaw. Son of King Faume Toad-Eye, he was a respected clan hunter and a future leader. Wood Elven legend claims Oreyn single handedly defeated Glenhwyfaunva, the witch-serpent of the Elven wood, forever bringing peace to his clan. Oreyn would go on to accomplish numerous other deeds, eventually losing his life to the Knahaten Flu. His Helm stood as a monument of his stature for future generations to remember. The Helm was lost eventually, as the Clan split, and is now a treasured artifact for adventurers. The Helm of Oreyn Bearclaw is rumored to improve the wearers agility and endurance.<BR>
Daedric Crescent Blade<BR>
<BR>
Probably the most rare and even outlawed item of all the great prizes is the Daedric Crescent Blade. The Blade was used by Mehrunes Dagon's Daedric forces in the capture of the Imperial Battlespire. These extremely unique Blades were gathered up and destroyed after the Battlespire was recaptured by the Empire. All but one it seems. Though the Empire believes them all to be destroyed, it is rumored that one still remains in existence, somewhere in Tamriel, though none have ever seen it. The Blade lends it's weilder the ability to do great damage on an enemy and allows him to paralyze and put heavy wear on his enemy's armor. Quite the prize for any mighty warrior, if it does indeed exist.<BR>
"""
"""<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT COLOR="000000" SIZE="3" FACE="Magic Cards"><BR>
泰姆瑞尔的闻名至宝<BR><BR>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT"><BR><BR>
下面列出了一些在泰姆瑞尔的传说中发现的更具传奇色彩的物品。有些的存在已被证明，而另一些可能只是传说中的东西。无论如何，这些物品已经进入了民间的故事，我们会讲给我们的孩子听，而他们也会告诉他们的孩子。<BR>
<BR>
君王链甲<BR>
<BR>
有时亦唤作墨里奥斯之甲或凯娜瑞丝馈赠，是质量无与伦比的古代胸甲。其赋予着甲者吸收生命值、抵御魔法效果并在并在中毒后解毒的神力。据说，当凯娜瑞丝认为着甲者难堪兹位时，君王链甲便会被剥夺，并藏匿至下一位获选者出现。<BR>
<BR>
黑檀链甲<BR>
<BR>
黑檀链甲在史前时代由暗精灵女神波耶西亚所造。谁人穿得此甲，且可保有多久，均决于她手。如果某一着甲者得到认可，护甲的法力会给予着甲者额外的火焰抗性、魔法抗性，并提供魔法护盾。着甲者几时失去着甲资格只由波耶西亚方能决定，而女神可能非常反复无常。<BR>
<BR>
破法者<BR>
<BR>
明面上看是一面锻莫塔盾的破法者是泰姆瑞尔最古老的神器之一。除却其于鲁肯-沙利多之战中的重要戏份以外，破法者几乎可以护持盾者以周全，通过反射魔法或使任何施法中的法师沉默使其免受免受任何施法者侵害。据说，破法者仍眷念故主，并不会久居他人篱下。对大多数人而言，持有破法者不论多久，都是赚到不亏。<BR>
<BR>
克里萨米尔<BR>
<BR>
圣骑士之剑是一柄古老的阔剑，攻防俱佳，甚至防御方面更胜一筹。 其可为执剑人增益生命，使之免于火焰伤害，并将对执剑人施放的各种法术反弹给施法者。少有剑士可挥舞克里萨米尔哪怕须臾，只因其择勇士豪杰而栖，而非逢迎之物。<BR>
<BR>
玛格努斯之杖<BR>
<BR>
作为泰姆瑞尔上古神器之一的玛格努斯之杖，对其创造者玛格努斯而言是一种形而上学的装置。使用时，其将吸噬敌方的生命和秘法能量。随着时间的推移，法杖会在持有其的法师变得过强，足以破坏法杖誓要捍卫的秘法平衡之前弃他而去。<BR>
<BR>
巫者之戒<BR>
<BR>
大法师锡拉拜恩的巫者之戒是神话和寓言中最受欢迎的神器之一。在泰姆瑞尔的古久历史中，锡拉拜恩对其戒指的精妙操作拯救了全大陆，自彼时起，戒指还帮助了一些并不志存高远的冒险者。其以能够反弹对佩戴者施放的法术而最为闻名，且可为佩戴者加速并恢复生命。没有冒险者可以长期据有巫者之戒，因为传言说，戒指由锡拉拜恩径自发号施令。<BR>
<BR>
菲纳斯特之戒<BR>
<BR>
数百年前，一位需要上乘防护以在冒险生涯中存活的人士制造了菲纳斯特之戒。菲纳斯特数百年的寿数，全仰仗此枚戒指，自其后就在外人间相传起来。戒指提升了佩戴者对毒药、魔法和电击的整体抵御。尽管如此，菲纳斯特仍然狡猾地诅咒这枚戒指，以至于其最终从持有者的所有中消失并返回另一个栖身之地，不满于留在除菲纳斯特本尊以外的他处。<BR>
<BR>
卡吉特之戒<BR>
<BR>
卡吉特之戒是一件古老的遗物，其出现早于使用并令此戒指闻名的盗贼拉津数百年。拉津用戒指的力量令自己隐踪匿迹，风驰电掣。有赖于戒指，他成为了艾斯维尔历史中的头号大盗。拉津的下场是个谜，但据传说，戒指对长期此种勾当以逆反并消失，令拉津在敌人面前束手无策。<BR>
<BR>
莫拉格-巴尔之锤<BR>
<BR>
又名吸血鬼钉锤，莫拉格-巴尔之锤汲取其受害者的法力并移转至持有者，对敌方的体力亦如是，也将之转移给其持有者。莫拉格-巴尔对其神器非常率性。有关此柄钉锤的传说众多，其似乎是征服法师的上佳之选。<BR>
<BR>
卡拉维库斯・维尔面具<BR>
<BR>
古时候，“太虚”卡拉维库斯・维尔制作了一副适合自身个性的面具。面具佩戴者更有可能得到泰姆瑞尔民众的积极响应。其个性越鲜明，增益便越大。此副假面最为人知的故事便是闻名遐迩的贵妇阿瓦莉亚的传说。在少女时代，她被一个恶毒的下人严重毁容。阿瓦莉亚与卡拉维库斯・维尔做了一笔黑暗交易，报偿便是面具。虽然假面没有改变她的相貌，但霎时间她便广受众人尊敬与爱慕。在与一位交往深厚的男爵结婚一年零一天后，卡拉维库斯・维尔重新取回了面具。尽管已经怀了他的种，阿瓦莉亚还是被男爵的家族扫地出门。二十一年零一天后，阿瓦莉亚之女以弑父报仇雪恨。<BR>
<BR>
梅鲁涅斯利刃<BR>
<BR>
历代以来，黑暗兄弟会都垂涎这把黑檀岩匕首。此等神话级法器能够瞬杀任何生物。梅鲁涅斯利刃的任何持有者都于史无据。然而，黑暗兄弟会一度被一场恶性内斗所重挫元气。人皆怀疑此事与利刃有关。<BR>
<BR>
救世主的庇护<BR>
<BR>
海尔辛的另一件神器是救世主的庇护胸甲。胸甲具有抵御魔法的特殊功能。传说海尔辛将其剥皮赐予第一个也是唯一一个逃离其猎场的凡人。这位佚名的凡人将剥皮制作了此件魔法胸甲，为其未来的冒险所用。救世主的庇护有在英豪之间流转的趋势，犹如自作主张一般。<BR>
<BR>
苦仁之矛<BR>
<BR>
苦仁之矛则是更为神秘的神器之一了。世人对此矛几近一无所知。虽然于史籍已不可考，但多则认同其乃魔族本源之说。唯一闻名而与其相关的传说是，在战斗尖塔陷落之时，一名强悍英雄持有此矛。此英雄倚借长矛襄助，击败了梅鲁涅斯・大衮并重夺战斗尖塔。自彼时后，苦仁之矛便鲜见于泰姆瑞尔。<BR>
<BR>
众魔灾厄<BR>
<BR>
众魔灾厄是一柄强力钉锤，由无常暴烈之火中的神圣黑檀岩锻造而成。其作为麦坎的传奇兵戈，曾是用于将黑暗造物送回湮灭的利器。该武器具有从湮灭召唤生物的能力，过去用于对抗战斗尖塔中对抗魔族战将，现在正与冒险者一起浪迹大陆。<BR>
<BR>
暗影之弓<BR>
<BR>
传说中，暗影之弓是由魔君诺克图娜尔铸造。传奇级游侠雷尔拉斯・吉尔为执行秘密任务获赠此弓，然而功败垂成，弓也丢失不见。雷尔拉斯的战败并非激战不敌，据信，凭借此弓，他放倒了许多敌人。此弓给予射手以隐形和提速的能力。暗影之弓的目击记录层出不穷，甚至据说第二纪元时阴狠的暗精灵刺客卓姆便曾持有此弓。<BR>
<BR>
兰达高夫之拳<BR>
<BR>
贝加林氏的兰达高夫以天际最强战士之一之名载入了泰姆瑞尔史册。他以悍勇善战闻名，并且影响了众多战局。当哈拉尔德王征伐天际时，他终于迎来了自己命运的结局。哈拉尔德王敬重此位豪杰，却自将夺走了兰达高夫的腕甲。哈拉尔德王驾崩后，腕甲便消失不见。国王声称兰达高夫之拳腕甲赋予了穿戴者更大的气力。<BR>
<BR>
君主冰刃<BR>
<BR>
君王冰刃实乃泰姆瑞尔最为珍贵的神器之一。传说有闻，邪恶的大法师阿尔米昂・塞尔莫用一只寻常寒霜元素的加强形态--寒霜君王的灵魂附魔了一名勇士的阔剑。战士苏尼亚尔・阿西本打算参与对一位域外贤王行刺，并僭祚为新君。暗杀失败，大法师也被囚禁。冰刃会冻结任何剑下之敌。君王冰刃在人际相传，不得久留。<BR>
<BR>
周遭之戒<BR>
<BR>
世人对此件神器知之甚少，但据说其能使佩戴者能够融入周遭环境。<BR>
<BR>
使徒之靴<BR>
<BR>
使徒之靴是一个真正的谜。据信，穿上靴子后着靴者便能悬浮起来，尽管未尝有人目睹如此。<BR>
<BR>
导师之戒<BR>
<BR>
对任何魔法学徒而论，此枚戒指都是珍贵的财富。其可以提升佩戴者更多智慧与智识，从而更高效地使用魔法。据传卡尼・阿斯隆高阶巫师制造了这枚戒指。这是他为聆其教诲的门下年轻弟子所作。在阿斯隆故去后，戒指和其他一些财产散佚，并在整个泰姆瑞尔流转。<BR>
<BR>
疾风之戒<BR>
<BR>
此枚戒指的实质尚不为人知，但望文生义而论，再辅以少数传闻令人认为其可为佩戴者提速。<BR>
<BR>
吸血鬼之戒<BR>
<BR>
吸血鬼之戒是泰姆瑞尔最为致命而稀有的神器之一。据说戒指有能力汲取受害者的生命并转予佩戴者。戒指的确切本性和起源完全未知，但许多长者则称此物乃旧时晨风一众吸血鬼追随者的邪恶创造。吸血鬼之戒是一种极为罕见的神器，每隔上百个双月循环周期才会出现一次。<BR>
<BR>
埃雷唐坚盾<BR>
<BR>
埃雷唐是布莱顿历史上的传奇圣骑士。他因痛改前非的勇气和决心而广受追捧。在一个故事中，据说他将男爵命悬一线的女儿从邪恶战将手中救出。作为报偿，男爵倾尽财帛为埃雷顿打造了一面附魔盾牌。该盾牌可让埃雷唐有几率治愈创伤。<BR>
<BR>
哈斯多奇之杖<BR>
<BR>
哈斯多奇据说是个争强好胜的巫师。他巡游四方，寻觅劲敌。据他所知，他从未找到一个接下战书的巫师。据信，他因为其法力为众多人所畏惧而感到颇为孤寂，便将自己的生命力与其法杖合为一体，其灵魂附于法杖之上，直至当下。泰姆瑞尔全大陆的施法者一直在寻找这魔杖。其可赋予持有者以魔法防护，显然对任何施法者而言都是一件宝具。<BR>
<BR>
血虫之盔<BR>
<BR>
血虫之盔据说是蠕虫之王珍贵的孑遗之一。头盔乃是魔法构建的骨骼的造物。头盔准许佩戴者召唤骷髅并操纵亡灵。此盔对死灵法师而言可谓一件珍贵的神器。<BR>
<BR>
龙骨链甲<BR>
<BR>
此件胸甲是任何收藏家或英雄都可拥有的最顶级神器之一。其由真正龙骨所造，在第三纪元初期被帝国首席战斗法师祖林・阿克图斯附魔。其制作精良、巧夺天工，欲据为己有者甚众。胸甲的魔力是令佩戴者抵御火焰，并以火焰爆能击伤敌人。有关祖林・阿克图斯与胸甲的附魔之间的知之甚少，但一个古老的传说声称他于一位云游勇士有所亏欠。就像战士征战四方一般，龙骨链甲亦从不作久留。<BR>
<BR>
碎颅者<BR>
<BR>
碎颅者是一柄硕大而强力的兵器。此战锤是由巫师多拉克・古萨尔以魔能燃起的炉火为热量，由良匠希尔邦高・罗拉穆斯锻造而成。钢材由魔法硬化，武器的自重惊人地轻，从而使挥击更为强力，捶打更加致命。该战锤本打算是用作节日展览，但盗贼抢先窃据之。碎颅者仍然在泰姆瑞尔寻求与匠人的重逢。<BR>
<BR>
黄金烙印<BR>
<BR>
这柄魔法太刀简直是个彻头彻尾的谜。盗贼们常谈及其黄金构造以及实质地被北境古龙所铸的传说。故事讲到，其本是赠予一名立誓保卫龙族的强大骑士之物。此太刀赋予执剑人以火焰杀伤敌方的能力。黄金烙印在近代不见诸史册，可谓兵刃有利剑，宝刀待英雄。<BR>
<BR>
哈尼赫纳迈之牙<BR>
<BR>
黑沼泽曾经以阿尔贡人呼之为“瓦马苏斯”的沼龙的栖息地而闻名。北方人认为他们是智慧的龙族，血脉中流淌着闪电力量。这一族中一只强大的怪兽--哈尼赫纳迈，被北方人在七天七夜之内，以数十人的伤亡为代价所击杀。幸存者中的一员拔下一只尖牙作为战利品带回家。尖牙被雕刻成刀刃，制成了一把短匕。该匕首神秘地附有怪兽本身的一些魔法属性，并令使用者可对对手造成电击伤害。此柄独特的匕首偶尔会为云游四方的英杰们所目睹。<BR>
<BR>
噬影剑<BR>
<BR>
噬影剑由古代女巫奈茵拉・瓦尔所附魔，其唯一目的即是俘获灵魂。此剑与灵魂石结合使用，令执剑人有机会将敌人的灵魂囚禁在灵魂石中。奈茵拉因其恶堕造物而被处决，但在此前她将噬影剑藏匿起来。噬影剑对执剑人的选择甚是挑剔，因此在堪当斯任者出现前会一直隐匿不见。<BR>
<BR>
丹斯塔格莫之戒<BR>
<BR>
我们只知道该戒指可予以佩戴者对于某些元素伤害的保护。就连丹斯塔格莫这个名字也是个谜。<BR>
<BR>
奥伦“熊爪”之盔<BR>
<BR>
奥伦“熊爪”是威木的传奇英雄之一。身为“蛤目”弗姆王之子，他是受人尊敬的氏族猎手和储君。木精灵传说声称奥瑞因孤身一人击败了精灵森林的蛇妖女巫格伦弗努亚，为其氏族带来了永远的和平。奥瑞因本要实践其王道征途，却最终丧命于纳哈腾流感。他的头盔作为对其伟业的纪念而留存，供后人铭记。随着氏族分裂，头盔最终散佚，现在成了冒险者的争相竞逐的神器。据传，奥伦“熊爪”之盔可以提升佩戴者的敏捷与耐力。<BR>
魔族新月刃<BR>
<BR>
可能所有神器中最稀有，甚至最不为官厅法度所容忍之物便是魔族新月刃了。梅鲁涅斯・大衮的魔族大军在攻占帝国战斗尖塔时使用了这种刀兵。此类尤其独特的兵器在帝国光复战斗尖塔后便集中销毁。却唯独漏了一把。 尽管帝国确信已尽数销毁，但有传言称在泰姆瑞尔的某处仍有一把留存，虽然未尝有人一睹。新月刃令持有者对敌人以巨大杀伤，并允许其麻痹敌人和极大磨损提防护甲。倘若此物确实存在，那对任何猛士而言都是相当不错的神器。<BR>
"""

木门

阿迪拉尼尔提到，现在有一些走私者正在为第六家族做事，但她没能查出他们到底在走私什么。阿迪拉尼尔觉得很奇怪，那些平时爱吹嘘的走私者，突然对为第六家族工作的事保持低调。不清楚他们走私的是什么，也不知道为何如此保密。我认为这正是凯乌斯・科萨德斯想要找的东西。

> INFO.NAME a1_7huleeyainformant 2050715403896519486
Huleeya hadn't heard of a Sixth House cult, but he knew a lot about the Nerevarine cult. He gave me notes to give to Caius. The main thing I gathered is that the Temple's conflict with the Nerevarine cult is tied up with ancient grievances between the Ashlanders and the Great Houses.
胡利亚没听说过第六家族邪教，但他对尼瑞瓦因教派很了解。他给了我笔记，让我交给凯乌斯。我收集到的主要内容是，神殿与尼瑞瓦因教派的冲突与灰烬之民和各大家族之间的宿怨息息相关。

> INFO.NAME a1_4_muzgobinformant 7116277302832410471

I'm beginning to see a pattern here. Rather than pay informants with hard cash, Caius Cosades trades favors for information. And as the new recruit in the organization, I provide the favors. Ah, well. A lesson in humility.
情报总管让我找巴尔莫拉法师公会的莎恩・格拉-穆兹格布告诉我尼瑞瓦因的情况，然后再向他报告。他说，我得帮她一点小“忙”。我开始发现其中的规律了。凯乌斯・科萨德斯不是用现金支付给线人购买情报，而是用人情换取情报。作为组织的新成员，我提供了好处。啊，好吧。算是上了一课。 {差事,老鼠}

因为我能够杀死大量夸尔拉氏族和昂戴氏族的吸血鬼，拉克斯・伯尔尼允许我使用加洛姆代乌斯这里的伯尔尼牲口，但前提是我不能杀死他们中的任何一个。如果我杀了它们，加洛姆代乌斯将不再欢迎我，而且会当场遭到攻击。

Apparently Delitian doesn't care HOW I take care of it, as long as it is taken care of in private. When I'm sure this anonymous writer will never print lies about King Helseth again, I'm to report back to Delitian.

> INFO.NAME tr09_journalist 2522430370161841036

我被告知工匠大厅里没有叫特雷斯・瓦里斯的人。但从现在的说法来看，我几乎可以肯定，特雷斯・瓦里斯就在这里的某个地方，但没有人愿意承认。

> INFO.NAME tr09_journalist 1105986762881416793

> INFO.NAME tr09_journalist 3142112700646828548
I found Trels Varis. He wishes to keep his hidden office a secret, and threatened to kill me, but instead he decided to let me go. Since the location of his office is no longer a secret, he plans to relocate immediately. He warned me not to touch anything or interfere with him or his colleagues, or he will kill me.
我找到了特雷斯・瓦里斯。他希望保住他的秘密办公室不被人知道，并威胁要杀了我，但他却决定让我离开。由于他办公室的位置不再是个秘密，他打算立即搬迁。他警告我不要碰任何东西，也不要干涉他或他的同事，否则他就会杀了我。 {计划}

> INFO.NAME tr09_journalist 1552423991295423512
I reported to Tienius Delitian that Trels Varis had given me his word that he would not discuss King Helseth in 'The Common Tongue'. Tienius Delitian was very pleased with my service. He gave me 3000 gold to cover my expenses and a 'King's Oath' blade -- exactly like those used by the Royal Guard. Only those sworn to the king's service and tested by great trials may use them. They bear deadly curses that kill thieves and traitors.
我向蒂纽斯・德利天报告说，特雷斯・瓦里斯已经向我保证，他不会再在《众口真言》上讨论赫尔塞斯国王。蒂纽斯・德利天对我的努力非常满意。他给了我3000金币来弥补我的开销，还有一把利刃“国王之誓”--和王室卫兵使用的一模一样。只有那些宣誓为国王服务并经过巨大考验的人才能使用它们。它们带有致命的诅咒，可以杀死盗贼和叛徒。 {瓜尔}

> INFO.NAME a2_2_6thhouse 4282199852086467

He said I would come to Dagoth Ur ' in his flesh, and of his flesh'. I don't feel any different, but the marks of the disease are plain on my face. I'll have to return and report to the Spymaster on the Sixth House base, and hope he knows of some way to cure this disease.
我按照情报总管的命令杀死了达格斯・加雷斯。但达格斯・加雷斯临死前对我下了诅咒，现在我得了尸化病。他说我会来到达格斯・乌尔身边，“你将会带着本属于他的肉体去往他的身边，和他融为一体”。我没有任何异样的感觉，但我脸上的疾病痕迹很明显。我得回去向第六家族的据点的情报总管报告，希望他知道有什么办法能治好这种病。

我在赛达尼恩附近旅行时发现了一具尸体。根据在他身上发现的一些物品来看，这似乎是一个名叫普罗塞苏斯・维特留斯的人的尸体。他随身携带着一张羊皮纸，上面似乎有税务记录。他身上还有200金币，可能是他征收的税款。

> INFO.NAME da_sheogorath 32230109952487810069

> INFO.NAME ic29_crusher 3153627015319787364
Imperial Cult: Skull-Crusher
帝国教团：碎颅者

> INFO.NAME ic29_crusher 4594192092072731924
The Oracle believes that I am fated to recover the ancient warhammer Skull-Crusher. I must discover a sealed Daedric ruin that may be accessed only through the Halls of the Dead. To help me solve the puzzle of this prophecy, the Oracle told me to consult a Dunmer scout and a Dunmer savant. Her vision suggests I must face restless spirits and powerful Daedra to recover the warhammer. If I find Skull-Crusher, I must return it to the Oracle so she may free it of its creators' curse.
神谕者认为，我命中注定要找回远古战斧碎颅者。我必须发现一个封闭的迪德拉废墟，只有通过亡灵殿堂才能进入。为了帮我解开这个预言的谜题，神谕者让我去咨询一位丹莫侦察兵和一位丹莫学者。她的幻象显示，我必须面对不安分的亡灵和强大的迪德拉才能找回战锤。如果我找到了碎颅者，就必须把它还给神谕者，这样她就能解除它的创造者下的诅咒。 {迪德拉式}

> INFO.NAME ic29_crusher 244173012020273776
The Oracle says she can detect no evil curse upon Skull-Crusher. She assured me it is safe, and gave me a special blessing so I might dedicate myself further to the service of the Nine. She has no more quests for me, but she will send word for me through others of high rank in the cult if she needs my help again.
先知说她在碎颅者身上检测不到邪恶的诅咒。她向我保证这里是安全的，并给了我一个特别的祝福，让我可以进一步为九圣灵服务。她已经没有任务给我了，但如果她再需要我的帮助，她会通过教团中的其他高层传话给我。

神谕者派我前往迪德拉的圣祠阿沙米米卡拉，去找回一件名为汹炙卷轴的强大神器，并将其归还给她。如果我选择更大的挑战和风险，我可以尝试用卷轴来杀死圣祠中古老的高精灵祭司克尔卡莫和他强大的高精灵保镖梅亚兰。 {迪德拉式}

神谕说，通过杀死克尔卡莫和梅亚兰，我为治疗师乌尔约拉德和他的主人多'法拉恩・斯蒂芬-内克报了仇，并为世界除去了一个大魔头。作为报酬，她给了我荣耀之铠。她告诉我，当我准备好进行另一项神谕者的任务时，再和她联系。

我已经找到了卡斯坦茨-布查恩，并且成功激活了它。在这些废墟的深处，我很难知道它对上面的城市会有什么影响。

> INFO.NAME tr_showpower 11251939968109497
If I understand the Dwemer symbols on the Karstangz-Bcharn, I believe the machine is now causing ashstorms in Mournhold.

> INFO.NAME tr_showpower 4187249101383228438
Almalexia is pleased with the ashstorms created by the Karstangz-Bcharn. The city of Mourhold is strangled by the harsh weather. The decorative trees lining the city streets are dying, and the people are frightened. I can only hope the goddess does not allow this to go on for long.
阿玛莱西娅对卡斯坦茨-布查恩制造的灰烬风暴很满意。哀伤之城被笼罩在了恶劣的天气之下。城市街道两旁的装饰树木正在枯萎，人们惊恐万分。我只能希望女神不要让这种情况持续太久。

> INFO.NAME tr_assassins 1888927612387829059
Plitinius Mero tells me that Helseth is incredibly well protected, and any attempt on him would be unlikely to succeed. He suggests I speak with the informant, though. Also, Mero has told me I may return to him any time I am in need of information.
皮利廷纽斯・梅罗告诉我，赫尔塞斯被保护得非常好，任何针对他的企图都不太可能成功。不过，他建议我和线人谈谈。此外，梅罗还告诉我，如果我需要信息的话，可以随时回来找他。

> INFO.NAME ms_blackdart 294151621112736271

But I suspect they are not telling me the truth.

I took no immediate action, giving myself time to consider his offer.
我在萨德瑞斯-莫拉找到了莫萨农，当面质问他被挪用的资金的事。他承认了自己的罪行，并提出只要我答应对坎克图尼安・博尼乌斯保守他的行踪秘密，他就会归还2500金币 -- 其余的他已经花掉了 -- 并且他会尽快归还其余的钱。我没有立即采取行动，给自己留出时间考虑他的提议。

> INFO.NAME tr07_guard 4078244882569210655

> INFO.NAME tr07_guard 449812871240537655
Near a chest owned by Ivulen Irano I found a handwritten copy of guard duty rosters for the past several weeks. The handwriting is tiny and almost illegible, with frequent misspellings. But three names are always correctly spelled -- Milvela Dralen, Ivulen Irano, and Aleri Aren -- and those watches when all three are the only guards in the Throne Room have been underlined twice. This is quite peculiar. I think it is what Tienius Delitian has been looking for.
在伊武伦・伊拉诺拥有的一个箱子附近，我发现了一份手写的过去几周的卫兵职责名册副本。笔迹很小，几乎无法辨认，经常出现拼写错误。但有三个名字的拼写总是正确的--米尔维拉・达拉伦、伊武伦・伊拉诺和艾蕾莉・爱伦--而当这三个人是王座室里仅有的守卫时，这些表都被划了两道线。这很不正常。我想这是蒂纽斯・德利天想要的东西。 {瓜尔}

> INFO.NAME tr07_guard 3479243352395420961

> INFO.NAME a1_dreams 8888287693085825729
Sleepers Awake
沉睡者苏醒

> INFO.NAME a1_dreams 93357471205120343
I had a disturbing dream. I can only recall one part. A tall figure with a golden mask led me among the dead as through a wedding celebration. I heard many voices, but no lips moved. I strained to breathe, but my chest didn't move. The tall figure spoke with each figure as he passed among them, laughing and joking, as if they were alive, but they made no reply. I tried to cry out, but without breath, my tongue fluttered in vain.
我做了一个令人不安的梦。我只记得其中一部分。一个戴着金色面具的高大身影，带领我穿过一群亡灵，就像穿过一场婚礼庆典一样。我听到很多声音，但说话的人嘴唇都纹丝不动。我努力呼吸，但胸口毫无动静。高大的人影在经过每一个人影时都会和他们说话，有说有笑，就像他们还活着一样，但他们没有回答。我试图呼喊，但没有了呼吸，我的舌头徒劳地舞动着。

> INFO.NAME discontent in the temple 2250715554873626266
I am a faithful believer.... but Almalexia makes me uneasy. For the last 50 years, the Tribunal stopped walking among us, stopped listening and speaking with us. This worried me, and made me sad. Were our gods abandoning us? Were they growing weak? But since Almalexia has lately come among us again, I feel more worry, not less. Her face glows brightly with hope and power, but her words seem dark and bitter.
我是一个忠实的信徒……但阿玛莱西娅让我感到不安。在过去的50年间，审判席不再与人民走到一起，不再倾听人民的需求、不再与人民交流，这件事让我非常忧虑与痛心，我们的神难道要抛弃我们了吗？他们正在失去力量吗？虽然最近阿玛莱西娅又一次降临到了我们身边，我却更加担心了。她的脸因为希望与力量容光焕发，但她吐出的真言却愈加黑暗与苦痛。 {信仰}

是的……迷宫之戒。巴里尔扎尔本人是个强大的法师……事实上，相当强大。他在第二纪元中期创造了这枚戒指，之后不久就消失了。我不清楚神器的用途，%PCName。我只知道圣母想要它。我只能假设它能让她更好地关爱她的人民，尽管我觉得这很难想象。

> INFO.NAME reorganize the temple 777060658815161
Without the power of the Heart, our divine powers diminish. Our days as gods are numbered. I have told my priests that I shall withdraw from the world, and that the Temple should be prepared for a change. We may be honored no longer as gods, but as saints and heroes, and the Temple will return to the faith of our forefathers -- the worship of our ancestors and the three good daedra, Azura, Mephala, and Boethiah. The missions and traditions of the Temple must continue... but without its Living Gods.
没有了洛克汗之心的力量，我们的神力就会减弱。我们作为神的日子已经不多了。我已经告诉我的祭司们，我将退出这个世界，神殿应该准备好迎接一场变革。我们可能不再被尊为神，而是被尊为圣徒和英雄，神殿将回到我们祖先的信仰 -- 对我们先祖们和三位善良的迪德拉，阿祖拉、梅法拉和波耶西亚的崇拜。神殿的使命和传统必须继续……但再没有现世神。 {沙尔}

> INFO.NAME boots of the apostle 1972225609398918055
The place-name reference in the Oracle's prophecy is obvious. An ancient Dunmer stronghold called Berandas lies south of the village of Gnisis in the West Gash region. I would also not be surprised to find that the reference to "wings of twilight" designates the guardians of the treasure you seek. Winged twilights are Daedric servants of the Daedra Lord Azura, one of the Anticipations worshiped in the Tribunal Temple.

> INFO.NAME boots of the apostle 152371261350415987
When Talos Stormcrown was a young man in Skyrim, he went into the mountains to learn the secrets of the Greybeards. He learned the secrets of the high peak winds -- the roar of the winter blast, and the warm silk of the summer updrafts. When he descended from the mountains, he came riding the clouds, striding through the air in great boots he claimed were gifts of the Greybeards for his cunning craft and riddling. After Septim yielded his crown, the boots disappeared, and have been lost for many years.
当塔洛斯・暴风王冠还是天际的一个年轻人时，他进入山区学习灰胡子的秘密。他学会了山顶之风的秘密--冬日疾风的咆哮和夏日暖风的丝绸。当他下山时，他驾云而来，穿着一双巨大的靴子在空中大步流星，他声称这是灰胡子送给他狡猾的手艺和谜语的礼物。塞普汀让出王位后，这双靴子就消失了，多年来一直下落不明。 {屈服}

> INFO.NAME shrine of the dead 2675616906217797153

Either way, it could have been a very powerful tool, but it was buried at the end of the First Era, along with the rest of Mournhold.
我读过关于这座圣祠的文章。据传在某个时期，它拥有巨大的力量。丹莫用它来驾驭他们祖先们的力量。有人说它可能被用来召唤亡灵军团，但这从未得到证实。不管怎么说，它可能是一个非常强大的工具，但它在第一纪元末年和哀伤之城的其他部分一起被深埋在地下了。 {先祖}

阿玛莱西娅之手是女神阿玛莱西娅的亲卫。女神之手们发誓要敬爱、保护并以各种方式服务阿玛莱西娅。他们的身体和灵魂被神圣的魔法所强化，他们的盔甲和武器带有可怕的神圣附魔。有人说，这些女神之手是世界上最可怕的凡人战士。 {瓜尔,卫兵,魔法疾病,附魔之术}

> INFO.NAME hands of almalexia 21159901161779935

你正在找一位阿玛莱西娅之手？真有趣。一位阿玛莱西娅之手正在离宫区附近徘徊，喃喃自语，行为怪异。

> INFO.NAME dissident priests 2496127873165737557
The Dissident priests dispute Temple doctrine. They challenge the purity and divinity of the Tribunal, suggesting their powers are sorcerous, not divine. They also condemn the arbitrary power of the Ordinators, and accuse the Temple hierarchy of self-interest and corruption. The Dissident Priests are outlawed and persecuted by the Temple.
异见祭司质疑神殿教义。他们质疑审判席的纯洁性和神性，认为他们的力量是巫术，而不是神力。他们还谴责殿卫的专断权力，并指责神殿高层的私利和腐败。异见祭司遭到神殿的取缔和迫害。 {神殿卫兵们,遭到神殿的迫害}

> INFO.NAME don't belong here 1053063175264265

I mean, look at old Bols over there with his torn, sweat-and-saliva stained shirt, his head like a giant, corprus-infected melon, and that faltering gait of his like a guar with venereal warts. It's a wonder he even remembers to put his pants on in the morning, it really is. Now, compare him with me.
这就对了。我对这个地方来说太出色了。在炽热的锻炉边上做苦力这种工作最好留给平民。我的意思是，看看那边的老博尔斯，穿着那件破烂的、沾满汗水和唾液的衬衫，他的头就像一个巨大的、被尸化病感染的瓜，他那蹒跚的步态就像一头得了性疣病的瓜尔。他甚至记得在早上把裤子穿上，这真是个奇迹。现在，再对比一下我。

我听说的就这些。我听说写《众口真言》的人是一个叫特雷斯・瓦里斯的人。我自己并不认识这个名字。我有一个习惯，就是亲自认识哀伤之城的人的名字。而这个人我并不认识。而其他我交谈的人也不认识。这本身就很值得注意。我猜，这个人躲得很好，而且想保持隐蔽。但我是在哪里第一次听说这个人的？在工匠大厅里。所以，也许可以去那找找。 {令状}

> INFO.NAME mace of slurring 1437120201389518329
Yes, it's a rather...odd piece. From what I've gathered, it was crafted near the end of the Second Age by Kyanka, a slightly deranged Altmer weaponsmith and enchanter. He had a rather warped sense of humor, and apparently delighted at the thought of reducing opponents to a gibbering mess before crushing them to death. The mace has, admittedly, seen little use. Do you wish to part with it? I can offer you 10000 gold for it.
是的，这是个相当……奇怪的东西。据我所知，它是一个叫凯安卡的有点疯狂的傲特莫武器匠和附魔师在第二纪元末年打造的。他有一种相当扭曲的幽默感，显然，他很喜欢让对手神智错乱再把他们锤打至死。诚然，这把钉锤已经没什么用了。你愿意割爱吗？我可以出10000金币买下它。 {老鼠}

> INFO.NAME sewers and ruins 23008103602687514087
If you're an adventurer, you'll want to go down there. The poor and the lawless live in the sewers under the city. It's dangerous -- but it's the only way to reach the ruins of Old Mournhold, where the real treasure lies. I'm probably wasting my breath -- but be careful down there. Maybe you think you're tough, and maybe you are... but there're things down there can kill you before you get your weapon out.
如果你是个冒险家，你会想去那下面看看的。穷人和法外之徒住在城市下面的下水道里。那里很危险 -- 但却是到达哀伤之城旧址的废墟的唯一途径，真正的宝藏就藏在那里。我说这话大概是浪费口舌 -- 但在下面要小心。也许你认为自己很厉害，也许你确实很厉害……但下面的东西可以在你拔出武器之前就杀死你。

> INFO.NAME black dart gang 2999895793137010807

他们在神殿下水道伏击了我和我的爱人。瓦里纳挡住了他们，让我逃跑。当我回头看时，瓦里纳已经倒下了。我只是继续跑。现在瓦里纳的幽灵在晚上来找我，求我去找他，救他。他说他有一条信息给我……但我不能去那里。我无法面对黑镖帮。瓦里纳是一个强大的战士，但只要一枚飞镖就能在几秒钟内杀了他。他们肯定会杀了我。

> INFO.NAME little advice 12885128822538910859
If you're looking for excitement and loot, try the sewers. The residential and the Temple sewers are two completely separate drainage systems. Use grates in Godsreach and the Great Bazaar to reach the residential sewers -- and also in the Royal Palace, I've heard. I don't know about the Temple system -- probably in the Temple itself. The poor and the lawless live under the city, %PCName. It's dangerous -- but it's the only way to reach the ruins of Old Mournhold, where the real treasure lies.
如果你在寻找刺激和战利品，你可以去下水道试试。居民区的下水道和神殿的下水道是两个完全独立的排水系统。通过离宫区和大集市的活板门可以到达居民区下水道 -- 我听说王室宫殿里也有。我不知道神殿下水道系统的情况 -- 可能就在神殿里面。城市下面住着穷人和法外之徒，%PCName。那里很危险，但却是到达哀伤之城旧址的废墟的唯一途径，真正的宝藏就埋藏在那里。

> INFO.NAME little advice 137186796108155586
My advice... leave me alone.
我的建议是……离我远点。

> INFO.NAME little advice 11392216712003319409

> INFO.NAME little advice 2094220342252388225
No one will ever grow rich hunting. But it is a pure pleasure for itself. Take your time. Sneak up on your prey. Surprise it with a swift, silent arrow. There is no greater pleasure than to drop a cliff racer with a single arrow.
没人能靠打猎致富，但打猎本身就是一种乐趣。慢慢来，悄悄接近你的猎物，以迅雷不及掩耳之势一箭射中猎物，一箭射中峭壁迅鸟是最大的乐趣。 {潜行}

> INFO.NAME little advice 157403399120459055

> INFO.NAME little advice 1144018432228524978

> INFO.NAME little advice 23576220211423514324

> INFO.NAME little advice 19139287163203512660
How do you judge a job's difficulty? Consider three things: location, opposition, and payoff. Long walks into the wilderness are usually tougher than local or town tasks. Tough opponents make tough jobs. Daedra, vampires, rogue Telvanni -- you'll learn which ones to look out for. And finally, if the reward offered is large, the dangers will be large, too.
如何判断一些工作的难度？考虑三点：地点、敌人和回报。在野外长途跋涉的任务通常比在本地或城镇执行任务更难。艰难的敌人造就艰难的任务。迪德拉、吸血鬼、泰瓦尼无赖--你会知道哪些人需要提防。最后，如果报酬很高，风险也会很高。

> INFO.NAME little advice 190453052515814369
How do you know when you've been given a task too tough for you? You have to decide. If it seems too tough, it probably is. Guild stewards and faction leaders don't really know how much you can handle. And some don't care. You have to look out for yourself. But as long as you haven't been given a deadline for completion, it's usually smart to wait and tackle those tough jobs after you're stronger and better equipped.
你怎么知道你接到的任务对你来说太难了？你必须做出判断。如果看起来太难，那很可能就是太难了。公会管家和派系领导并不真正了解你的承受能力。有些人根本不在乎。你必须为自己着想。但只要没有给你规定完成任务的最后期限，通常明智的做法是等待，去其他地方做一些工作，等你变得更强大、装备更精良之后再去完成那些艰巨的任务。

> INFO.NAME little advice 633623660273719775
About doing quests for factions. If you try to complete every task you're given, sooner or later you'll run into trouble. Don't assume that, just because someone gives you a job, you ought to be able to complete it. When you get a job that's over your head, be patient. Go do something else for a while, and come back when you're tougher, better skilled, and better equipped.
关于为派系做任务。如果你试图完成每个任务，迟早会遇到麻烦。不要以为别人给你任务，你就一定能完成。当你接到一份超出你能力范围的工作时，要有耐心。先去干点别的，等你更坚强、技术更好、装备更精良时再回来。

> INFO.NAME little advice 15147129031918618185
I am sure you can persuade Dram Bero to support you as Hortator... if you can find him. Orvas Dren has Nevena Ules and Velanda Omani in his pocket. You might want to make a little trip to the Dren Plantation before talking to them. And then there's Yngling Half-Troll.
我相信你能说服德拉姆・贝罗支持你担任统谏使……如果你能找到他的话。内维娜・乌莱斯和维兰达・奥曼尼处于奥瓦斯・德伦的掌握之下，在和他们交谈之前，你可能需要先去德伦种植园转转。还有记得去见一下英灵・半巨魔。

> INFO.NAME little advice 16369126751670624337
New here? Take the silt strider to Vivec or Balmora. Fast and cheap. No trouble with wild animals. And smugglers. And bandits. And outlaws. Go see Darvame Hleran over at the strider port, over the bridge and east along the water. And tell her Vodunius Nuccius sent you.
新来的？坐阔步沙蚤去维威克或巴尔莫拉。又快又便宜，没有野生动物的麻烦，还有走私者，还有强盗土匪，还有亡命之徒。去见达瓦梅・勒兰，在阔步沙蚤站那边，过了桥，沿着水往东走，告诉她是沃杜尼乌斯・努奇乌斯派你来的。

> INFO.NAME little advice 6806119891911025550

> INFO.NAME little advice 124735414790028426
You look like you can take care of yourself. Then why don't you do something about those smugglers in Addamasartus cave? It's right over there near the silt strider port. Yet these guards! Look at them. Just strutting around. Someone must have paid them to ignore the smuggling going on here.
你看起来能照顾好自己，那你为什么不对付阿达马萨图斯洞穴里的走私者？就在阔步沙蚤港口附近。然而这些卫兵！看看他们，趾高气扬的，一定是有人付钱给他们，让他们无视这里的走私活动。 {瓜尔}

> INFO.NAME little advice 1248319992938512979
If you want to live to a ripe old age, buy a weapon and as much armor as you can wear and still run from trouble. Buy a spell or two. And practice your skills. Don't practice on citizens. We call that foul murder, and we don't like it. But you can kill smugglers and bandits and other outlaws all you like. Outlaws have no rights. Plenty of adventurers make a living from killing and looting outlaws. That smuggler scum down in Addamasartus, for instance. The cave down near the silt strider platform.
如果你想长命百岁，买一把武器和尽可能多的盔甲，还能躲避麻烦。买一两个法术，训练你的技能。不过不要在市民身上练习，我们称之为谋杀，我们不喜欢这样。但你可以随便杀走私者，强盗,强盗和其他不法之徒。不法之徒没有人权，很多冒险者都靠杀戮和抢劫不法之徒为生。比如阔步沙蚤港口附近有个洞穴，叫阿达马萨图斯，里面听说最近有走私犯人渣出没。

> INFO.NAME little advice 16890297712091512590
If you need directions, talk to our local scout, Elone the Redguard. She's here in the tradehouse somewhere. And you might want a copy of 'Guide to Vvardenfell' -- I think I still have a copy for sale.

> INFO.NAME little advice 3154228361751410315
Things are pretty tame hereabouts. But get off the roads and head northwest into the Bitter Coast, or northeast into the Ashlanders, and things get a lot more interesting in a hurry.

> INFO.NAME little advice 240211693246220355

想当佣兵或探险英雄？在这里可没什么机会。老鼠和偶尔出现的强盗是我们唯一的麻烦。

> INFO.NAME little advice 39552635230657179
You're a freelance adventurer, yes? If you're looking for challenge, try Esutanamus, a Daedric shrine on an offshore island to the southeast, or Nchuleft, a Dwemer ruin to the southeast where the plains and the slopes of Red Mountain meet. They're large ruins -- easy to find.
你是自由冒险者，对吧？如果你想挑战一下，可以去东南方离岸小岛上的迪德拉圣祠埃苏塔纳姆斯，或是东南方平原和红山山坡交汇处的锻莫遗迹纳曲莱夫特。这些遗迹都很大，很容易找到。 {迪德拉式}

> INFO.NAME little advice 22741266951436712057
You're a freelance adventurer, yes? There're many tombs, ruins, and lairs in the Grazelands to the south and west. Just keep your eyes open. They're often marked by a clump of rocks or trees at the entrance.
你是自由冒险者，对吧？在莱尔南部和西部的放牧平原上有许多坟墓、废墟和巢穴。只要睁大眼睛，入口处通常会有一堆石头或树木作为标记。

> INFO.NAME little advice 677944423046923989
This is still very wild country out here in the Grazelands. Master Aryon is trying to get along with the Ashlanders, but there are still plenty of outcasts and renegade Ashlanders who attack outsiders on sight. The big Zainab Ashlander camp is off to the southwest. Don't start trouble with them. They are very sneaky, and their warriors are great fighters, but we're more-or-less at peace with them right now.
放牧平原仍然是一个非常荒凉的地方。阿里昂大师正试图与灰烬之民和睦相处，但仍有很多被遗弃的人和叛变的灰烬之民会当场攻击外来者。哉纳布灰烬之民的大营地就在西南方。不要和他们惹麻烦。他们很狡猾，他们的战士也很能打，但我们现在和他们还算和平相处。 {潜行}

> INFO.NAME little advice 30696374967517577
If you're a mercenary, or a questing hero, you must go visit Master Aryon. He always has lots of very ambitious projects going on. And you MUST see his tower. It's really something.
如果你是佣兵，或者是探险英雄，一定要去拜访阿里昂大师。他总是有很多雄心勃勃的计划。你一定要去看看他的塔楼。那真的很了不起。

> INFO.NAME little advice 2270729783254161801
Vivec is huge. It is easy to get lost. But if you observe the law, you can't get into much trouble. My advice is wander freely. Learn your way around. See what the craftsmen and traders have to sell. See the sights the pilgrims come to see -- the Ministry of Truth, the High Fane, the Palace of Vivec. And while you're here, go take a tour of Ebonheart, the Imperial town across the lagoon to the west. A lot to see and do over there, too.
维威克城很大，很容易迷路。但如果你遵守法律，就不会惹上大麻烦。我的建议是自由闲逛，熟悉附近的道路，看看工匠和贸易商都卖些什么。看看朝圣者来此的目的，真理之岩、至高神殿、维威克神殿，顺便游览一下黑檀心，西边环礁湖对面的帝国人城镇。那里也有很多值得看的东西，和值得做的事。

> INFO.NAME little advice 1921131430108332615
If you need to earn some money to support yourself while you're in Vivec, try the Imperial Guilds in the Foreign Quarter. They often have odd jobs for willing adventurers. And ask tradesmen and craftsmen you meet. They often have simple errands that need doing. The pay is small, but the goodwill gained by serving local people and the experience traveling around the city may be worth more than the gold you earn.
如果你在维威克城期间需要赚钱养活自己，可以去外邦区的帝国公会试试。他们经常会为愿意冒险的人提供一些工作。你也可以向遇到的商人和工匠打听。他们经常会有一些简单的差事需要做。虽然报酬不高，但为当地人服务所获得的善意以及在城市中旅行的经验可能比你赚到的金币更有价值。 {帝国人}

> INFO.NAME little advice 131842002764323137
Mistress Dratha prefers female mercenaries and adventurers. Go see her. She may have some work for you.
德拉萨夫人更喜欢女性雇佣兵和冒险者。去找她吧。她可能会给你安排一些工作。 {一些活}

> INFO.NAME little advice 13515278711142814340
Mistress Dratha doesn't like men. She won't roast you or anything. But if you want something from her, like a favor, or a job, be very proper and polite. Don't try to be funny. She does hire men for various tasks. But I always wondered if she saves the nasty work for males.
德拉萨夫人不喜欢男人。她不会烤了你什么的，但如果你想从她那里得到什么，比如帮忙或工作，要非常得体礼貌，别耍花招。她确实会雇男人做各种任务，但我总在想，她是不是把恶劣的活儿留给了男人。

> INFO.NAME little advice 1488635072214910475
Go on inside if you like. Look around. But don't mess with anything. And if you're going to talk to anyone, talk real nice. Stay out of the dungeon, that's where all the corprus victims are. It's not pretty. And they aren't mean, really. Just crazy mad and hungry.
你可以进去四处看看，但别乱动任何东西。如果你想和谁谈话，就好好说，别进地牢，尸化病的受害者都在那里，那里不漂亮。他们并不坏，真的，只是又疯又饿。

> INFO.NAME little advice 26162168161972518968
In principle, a member is not be given tasks that exceed the member's rank or abilities. In practice, sometimes mistakes are made. You are not expected to fail and die for those mistakes. Use judgement. Be patient. Take the initiative. Train yourself. Equip yourself. Study your target and situation more carefully. Then return to your task when you are ready, and succeed.
原则上，成员不会被赋予超出其等级或能力的任务。在实践中，有时会犯错误。我们不希望你因为这些错误而失败或死亡。要有判断力。要有耐心。主动出击。训练自己。装备自己。更仔细地研究你的目标和情况。当你准备好时，再回到你的任务中，并取得成功。

> INFO.NAME little advice 13640318562211919306
Let me warn you. The quests for the Temple at lower ranks are not too difficult. But suddenly after you reach Curate rank, the quests get very, very difficult. Don't be surprised if you have to do a lot of skill-building outside the Temple before you can handle the higher rank quests. These tasks are tests of faith, yes, but they are also tests of good judgement and common sense.
让我警告你。低阶的神殿任务并不太难。但当你达到祭主等级后，任务会突然变得非常非常困难。如果你必须在神殿外进行大量的技能积累，才能应付更高等级的任务，请不要感到惊讶。这些任务是对信仰的考验，但同时也是对良好判断力和常识的考验。

> INFO.NAME little advice 11947179366161203
Just because your lord gives you a task, don't assume you should be able to do it. Your lord doesn't really know what you can or can't handle. And most Telvanni lords don't care.
不要因为上级交给你一项任务，就认为你一定能完成。你的领主并不真正了解你的能力。而大多数泰瓦尼领主并不在乎。

> INFO.NAME little advice 96322164076299436
If you accept a task from a superior, you are honor-bound to complete it. But unless there is a deadline, or an issue of honor, you are NOT supposed to die trying. Use common sense. If you find you are not yet ready to face a challenge, be patient, train, outfit yourself, and revisit the task at a later date.
如果你接受了上级的任务，你就有完成任务的荣誉束缚。但除非有最后期限，或者事关荣誉，否则你不应该死磕到底。运用常识。如果你发现自己还没有做好迎接挑战的准备，请耐心等待、训练、装备自己，并在日后重新审视这项任务。

> INFO.NAME little advice 396613601281755130
Just because your superior gives you a task, don't assume you should be able to do it. Your superior doesn't really know what you can or can't handle. And some superiors don't care.
不要因为上级交给你一项任务，就认为你一定能完成。你的上司并不真正了解你能做什么或不能做什么。有些上司根本不在乎。

> INFO.NAME little advice 259942865635092117
Nobody is going to hold your hand in the Legion. In the Imperial cult, they just test your faith and your shoe leather. But here, your superior gives you orders, and you find you're out of your depth, you're supposed to be smart enough to be patient, get some training, experience, and new equipment, and try it again later when you're better prepared.
在军团里，没人会牵着你的手。在帝国教团，他们只会考验你的信仰和鞋皮。但在这里，上级给你下达指示，你发现自己力不从心时，你应该有足够的耐心，接受一些训练，积累经验，换上新装备，等以后准备充分了再去尝试。 {帝国人}

> INFO.NAME little advice 28177259642621728771
The services required at lower ranks in the Imperial cult are not very difficult or dangerous. But any task you do for the Oracle, Lalatia Varian, will be very difficult, very dangerous, and suited only for experienced, powerful, well-equipped adventurers.
帝国教团低级公署所需的服务难度不大，也不危险。但你为神谕者拉拉蒂亚・瓦里安做的任何任务都会非常困难、非常危险，只适合经验丰富、力量强大、装备精良的冒险者。 {帝国人}

> INFO.NAME little advice 30111573026704475
Look. If you're the bloody-minded type, tries to complete every task a boss gives you, you're in for a world of hurt. Happens all the time. You breeze through a couple of jobs, then you hit one you can't budge. I can't tell you what to do, but me, I go find something else to do for a while. Sure, nobody likes to admit you can't do a job. You brood over it, lie awake nights figuring how your gonna crack that nut. But patience and good sense is as important as blood and courage in this business.
听着，如果你是那种血气方刚的人，试图完成老板交给你的每一个任务，你就会受到很大的伤害。这种事经常发生，你轻而易举地完成了几个任务，然后你遇到了一个你无法完成的任务，我不能告诉你该怎么做，但我，我会去找点别的事情做一段时间。当然，没人喜欢承认自己做不了一些工作。你会耿耿于怀，夜不能寐，盘算着如何破解难题。但在这个行业里，耐心和理智与血性和勇气同样重要。

> INFO.NAME little advice 2576933592066224959
Higher quality picks and probes are definitely worth their higher price. But keep cheaper ones around as well for the easier locks and traps. Also be sure to find a good source for buying these instruments.
高质量的开锁器和陷阱探针绝对物有所值。但也要随身携带便宜的开锁器和探针，以备容易上锁的锁具和陷阱之需。另外，一定要找到购买这些工具的好渠道。

> INFO.NAME little advice 783617424428217896
If you have the patience, sneak around everywhere you go. It will take longer, and may arouse suspicion, but it's excellent practice.
如果你有耐心，可以到任何地方偷偷潜行。这需要更长的时间，可能会引起怀疑，但却是极好的练习。

> INFO.NAME little advice 2590513238756122625
Don't risk a frontal confrontation with anything. When in doubt, sneak.
不要冒险与任何东西正面冲突。有疑问时，就潜行。

> INFO.NAME little advice 29947208481420612081
Alchemists are easy targets for inexperienced thieves. They have far too many ingredients for them to keep an eye on all of them all of the time.
炼金术士很容易成为没有经验的小偷的目标。他们有太多的原料素材，不可能时时刻刻都盯着所有的原料素材。

> INFO.NAME little advice 125096360577018710
Merchants know their own inventories far better than you do. Never attempt to trick them into buying something you stole from them.
商人比你更了解自己的库存。千万不要试图骗他们买你从他们那里偷来的东西。

> INFO.NAME little advice 28647462266757668
Noble families often aren't around to watch their manors so they lock everything up. This makes them a wonderful opportunity to practice your skill at picking locks in the privacy of someone else's house. And of course, don't neglect to check the contents of that chest after you pick it.
贵族家庭通常不在身边看管庄园，所以他们会把所有东西都锁起来。这就为你提供了一个绝佳的机会，在别人的私宅中练习开锁技巧。当然，撬开箱子后也不要忽略检查里面的东西。

> INFO.NAME little advice 2929716067276717856
The elite of Morrowind may not have all the armor and equipment you need as an adventurer. But don't overlook precious stones or fine jewelry and clothing; to the right merchant those items can be worth more and be more easy to carry than some heavy iron armor.
作为冒险者，晨风的精英们可能没有你需要的所有盔甲和装备。但也不要忽视宝石或精美的珠宝和衣服；对于合适的商人来说，这些物品可能比一些沉重的铁甲更值钱，也更容易携带。

> INFO.NAME little advice 31356284898699424
You can't be a successful thief if you always steal from the same merchant, or even stay in the same town. After you've picked them clean, explore somewhere else to give them a chance to restock.
如果你总是从同一个商人那里偷东西，甚至呆在同一个城镇里，你就不可能成为一个成功的小偷。在你将他们一扫而空后，去别的地方探险，让他们有机会重新进货。

> INFO.NAME little advice 17222130182467313190
You will get slaughtered if you start acting like a warrior. Always sneak up to your target and take advantage of your stealth. Even a dagger is effective if used in the right way at the right time.
如果你开始像个战士一样行动，你就会被屠杀。一定要悄悄潜行接近目标，利用你的隐蔽性。如果在正确的时间以正确的方式使用，即使是匕首也很有效。

> INFO.NAME little advice 215501840788733974
Keep a good sense of your surroundings, no matter how good you are sneaking, you're always better off if no one is around.
保持对周围环境的良好感知，无论你的潜行技术有多高超，如果周围没有人，你总是会更好。

> INFO.NAME little advice 273388995142705141
If possible, always take a single item at a time. It increases the risk, but it's excellent practice.
如果可能，每次只拿一件东西。这会增加风险，但却是极好的练习。

> INFO.NAME little advice 3078911023292535132
Always study your target, and take a good inventory of what he has before attempting to steal anything. If he has his eye on that shiny silver claymore, he won't notice you pocketing a few tarnished throwing stars.
在试图偷东西之前，一定要研究你的目标，好好盘点一下他有什么。如果他盯上的是那把闪闪发光的银质大剑，他就不会注意到你手里拿的是几颗褪了色的投掷手里剑。

> INFO.NAME little advice 268212608920701313
Practice stealing and pickpocketing by taking cheap things from small merchants. Don't go after the big stuff until you're experienced.
从小商贩那里拿些便宜的东西来练习偷窃和扒窃。在经验丰富之前，不要去偷大件。

> INFO.NAME little advice 2313110342475128931
How do you know when you've got a quest too tough for you? If it sounds too tough for you, it probably is. You must use your own judgement. Guild stewards don't really get to know your abilities. All they know is that a guy never comes back. They don't know if he got lost interest, or got eaten.
如何判断任务对你来说太难？如果听起来对你来说太难，那很可能就是。你必须有自己的判断力。公会管理员并不真正认识你的能力。他们只知道一个人一去不复返。他们不知道他是失去了兴趣放弃了，还是被吃掉了。

> INFO.NAME little advice 1599615223071730442
The farther from civilization you go, the worse the dangers. But there're exceptions to that rule. Ald Sotha is a short walk from Vivec. But only a five-year veteran with full kit ought to be peeking into that hole. And I hear there's a couple of spots in Vivec's sewers where you wouldn't send a team of Ordinators. But it's your call. You see something you don't like, back out, and find something else to do while you train and build up your kit.
离文明聚落越远，危险越大。但也有例外，奥德-索萨离维威克很近，但只有五年的老兵带着全套装备，才能窥探那个洞口。我听说维威克城的下水道有几个地方是不会派神殿卫兵们去的。但这是你的决定，你看到不喜欢的东西，就退回去。在你训练和装备的时候找点别的事做。

> INFO.NAME little advice 297416033127723972
Use illusion spells like invisibility to scout an area before you go on the offensive. Often a cunning spellcaster can simply avoid opponents and obstacles, move right to the objective, and leave without taking a scratch.
在进攻之前，使用隐形等幻觉类法术侦查一个区域。通常情况下，狡猾的施法者只需避开对手和障碍物，直接向目标移动，然后毫发无损地离开。 {幻术系}

> INFO.NAME little advice 111731783792425412
Join the Mages Guild. Rise ranks to get good rates for services. And stay in their good graces by minding their rules and performing the required duties.
加入法师公会。提升等级以获得优惠的服务费。遵守法师公会的规定并履行规定的职务，就能得到他们的青睐。 {老鼠}

> INFO.NAME little advice 29891187491864825331
A good strategy is to paralyze your opponent, cast some kind of touch spell that does damage for awhile, like poison, then retreat to a farther range to cast your targeted, long range spells. Recast paralyze if the creature isn't dead by the time they reach you again.
一个好的策略是麻痹对手，施放某种能在一段时间内造成伤害的触击法术，比如毒药，然后退到更远的范围施放有针对性的远程法术。如果敌人再次到达你身边时还没死，就重新施放麻痹术。

> INFO.NAME little advice 3062426141146556201
Learn the Mark, Recall, Levitation, and Open spells. Mark and Recall are essential for any long-distance travel. There are plenty of places you can't get to without Levitation. And treasure does you no good if it's behind a locked door or in a locked chest.
学习标记、召回、浮空和开锁法术。标记和召回是长途旅行的必备法术。很多地方没有浮空术是去不了的。如果宝藏在锁着的门后或锁着的箱子里，对你也没有好处。 {锁上的门}

> INFO.NAME little advice 326077624287914367
Invest in potions to restore your magicka. In hostile territory, these potions can save you a lot of downtime. Even supposing you can find some safe place to get some rest and regain your magicka, who needs the aggravation?
多准备些恢复魔力的药水。在敌对区域，这些药水能为你节省大量时间。即使你能找到安全的地方休息并恢复魔力，何必自找麻烦呢？ {需要}

> INFO.NAME little advice 31479101062352930554
When you think you are just about to encounter some heavy opposition, get those shield-style spells up. The life they save may be your own.
当你觉得自己即将遭遇强大的敌人时，就赶紧使用护盾型法术吧。它们可能会救你的命。

> INFO.NAME little advice 3016264761971728343
Don't be afraid to invest in armor. Even if you carefully avoid close combat like a smart spellcaster, things go wrong, and armor can save your skin when the unexpected happens.
别舍不得在盔甲上花钱。即使你像一个聪明的施法者一样小心翼翼地避免近身战斗，事情还是会出错，而盔甲可以在意外发生时救你一命。

> INFO.NAME little advice 707819516231810696
Use the spellmaker. It's cheap, and a custom-designed spell tailored to your skills, magicka reservoirs, and spellcasting style will always outperform the standard spells you buy from service casters.
使用自制法术。这很便宜，而且根据你的技能、魔力和施法风格量身定制的法术总能胜过你从服务施法者那里买来的标准法术。

> INFO.NAME little advice 91510361932627599
Buy a spell of every type that you can find. This will give you the best options later when you're creating your own custom spells.
每种类型的法术都要买一个。这将为你以后创建自己的自制法术提供最好的选择。

> INFO.NAME little advice 2954034802783511538
Buy paralyze as soon as you can. Keeps the creatures off you and allows you to cast those more elaborate spells.
尽快购买麻痹术。让生物远离你，让你可以施放那些更复杂的法术。

> INFO.NAME little advice 20075696663035558
How do you judge a job, decide if it's too tough for you? Good question. Me, I check three things: location, opposition, and payoff. First, if it's a long walk, I worry. If it's a Daedric ruin, or a Dunmer stronghold, or a Telvanni tower, I worry. If it's way up north, or near Red Mountain, I worry. Second, if the opposition is tough, I worry. Daedra worry me. Vampires worry me. Telvanni wizards worry me. Third, if the reward is fat, I worry. Nobody pays you a crate of gold for a walk in the park.
如何判断一个任务是否对你来说太难？问得好，我主要看三点：地点、对手和回报。首先，如果是长途跋涉，我就会担心。如果是迪德拉废墟、丹莫堡垒或泰瓦尼塔楼，我就会担心。如果是在北方或红山附近，我就会担心。其次，如果对手很强，我也会担心。迪德拉让我担心。吸血鬼让我担心，泰瓦尼巫师让我担心；第三，如果奖励丰厚，我也会担心。没人会给你一箱金币让你在公园里散步。 {迪德拉式,报酬}

> INFO.NAME little advice 33523429197013181
Nobody is going to coddle you in the Fighters Guild. In the Imperial cult, they give you stuff that old ladies could do in their sleep. But here, you get in line for work, and if something comes to you that is out of your depth, you're supposed to be smart enough to back off and come at it again later when you have the equipment and chops.
在战士公会，没人会溺爱你。在帝国教团，他们给你的任务，老太太做梦都能做完。但在这里，你得排队干活，如果遇到超出你能力范围的事情，你应该聪明地退缩，等以后有了装备和技能再去做。 {帝国人,工作}

> INFO.NAME little advice 320962972120326784
I bet old Mollimo and his hirelings could make short work of Trerayna Dalen. But they way I hear it, Mistress Therana has got Mollimo on a short leash. Won't let him out of the tower, wants to keep him and the guard real close so everything safe. Granted, it's probably the safest, and most economical tactic, but it's dull and tiresome, and I think it's getting on Mollimo's nerves.
我敢打赌，老莫里莫和他的手下一定能轻松搞定特雷娜・达伦。但我听说，西拉那女士把莫里莫拴得紧紧的，不让他出塔楼，想让他和卫兵塔离得很近，这样一切就安全了。当然，这可能是最安全、最省钱的办法，但这很无趣，也很烦人，我觉得这让莫利莫很不爽。 {工作,瓜尔}

> INFO.NAME little advice 980080082674620343
Security is pretty tight at the tower, what with Trerayna Dalen's siege and all. Better not ruffle any feathers if you have any business in the tower. If Mollimo thinks you've got something cooked up with Dalen, he might kill you first and let the old necromancer ask questions later. Heh-heh.
由于特雷娜・达伦的围攻，塔楼的戒备相当森严。如果你在塔楼里有什么事，最好别惹麻烦。如果莫利莫认为你和达伦有什么勾结，他可能会先杀了你，然后再让老死灵法师问问题。嘿嘿。 {开锁}

> INFO.NAME little advice 276881608633172795
Trerayna Dalen has challenged Mistress Therana for Tel Branora. Dalen and her mercenaries have been camped out here for months, but they haven't got much to show for it. I think she may have run out of steam. Or maybe the mercenaries are getting restless. Might be Therana's captain, Mollimo, would welcome some help.
特雷娜・达伦为了泰尔-布勒诺拉向西拉那女士发起了挑战。达伦和她的雇佣兵已经在这里扎营好几个月了，但他们并没有得到什么好处。我想她可能是气数已尽。或者是佣兵们开始不安分了，也许西拉那的队长莫利莫会欢迎一些帮助。

> INFO.NAME little advice 3075413332454929067
The Shrine of Molag Bal is not a pilgrimage for the casual traveler. The interior is cursed and dangerous, and the Temple has not been successful in keeping it clean of Daedra-worshipping witches and warlocks. Go view the ruins from the outside, but don't go inside unless you are strong and well-prepared.
莫拉格・巴尔圣祠可不是随便什么人都能去朝圣的。内部被诅咒，危险重重，神殿也没能成功地清除掉崇拜迪德拉的女巫和巫者。你可以去外面的废墟看一看，但除非身体强壮、准备充分，否则不要进去。

> INFO.NAME little advice 2117237921323220278
Don't bother looking for a convenient system of bridges or ferries across the lakes and rivers. There aren't any. If you're traveling in the Ascadian Isles, be prepared to get wet, or to use magic to fly or walk across the waterways.
不要费心寻找方便的桥梁系统或渡船横跨湖泊和河流。根本没有。如果你要在阿斯卡迪亚群岛旅行，就要做好淋雨的准备，或者使用魔法飞过或走过水道。

> INFO.NAME little advice 508824254249168437
The Fields of Kummu is an easy, safe walk southeast from town. Visit the shrine, and earn the blessing of Vivec.
库姆原野距离城镇东南方有一段轻松安全的路程。拜访圣祠，获得维威克的祝福。

> INFO.NAME little advice 2927230718819114830
If you do the crime, pay the fine. You KNOW you owe it. So why don't you just PAY the fine? You wonder why people look at you with a lousy disposition? Because there's gold on your head, and maybe someone in Black Marsh doesn't know it, but he's the only one.
如果你犯下了罪行，就得交罚款。你知道这是你欠的。那你为什么不交罚款呢？你想知道为什么人们看你的眼神都很差吗？因为你头上有金币，也许黑沼泽有人不知道，但他是唯一的一个。 {认识你}

> INFO.NAME little advice 541957932461430658
Stay away from the mudcrabs. Swamp Fever. Or join the Tribunal Temple. Initiates get free Cure Disease at the shrines.
离泥沼蟹远点。沼泽疟疾，或者加入审判席神殿。入会者可在圣祠免费获得疾病治愈。

> INFO.NAME little advice 1259920497247168398
Some neglected ancestral tombs around here. Locals don't like it, but you can find some nice bits. Ghosts and ancestral spirit guardians are dangerous.
这附近有些荒废的先祖墓穴。当地人不喜欢这里，但你可以找到一些不错的东西。鬼魂和祖灵守护者很危险。

> INFO.NAME little advice 84312379587652772
Some rough customers come into town now and then for supplies. I think they might be smugglers and bandits holed up locally. Be doing a public service to clean them up, and might find yourself some nice loot in the bargain.
时不时会有一些粗鲁的客人来镇上买东西。我认为他们可能是藏匿在当地的走私者和强盗土匪。把他们清理干净是在为公众服务，说不定还能为自己找到一些不错的战利品。

> INFO.NAME little advice 2933164702792021458
New in Morrowind, eh? Well, the natives are not very friendly. They still resent the Empire, and they look down on the other races. They don't like outlander Dunmer very much either. If you aren't Dunmer and native-born, you're an outlander, just like the rest of us.
晨风新来的？当地人并不友好。他们仍然憎恨帝国，看不起其他种族。他们也不太喜欢外地人丹莫。如果你不是丹莫和本地人，你就是外地人，就像我们其他人一样。 {泰姆瑞尔帝国}

> INFO.NAME little advice 3054442211812013686
It pays to take it slow when you first come to Morrowind. When you talk to folks, keep an eye on their dispositions. They let you know if you don't like them, and it's smart to get on a f'lah's good side before you ask for a favor.
初到晨风，慢慢来是有好处的。当你和人们交谈时，留意他们的反应。如果你不喜欢他们，他们就会让你知道，在你想要请求帮忙之前，先和一个f'lah（老乡）打好关系是很明智的。

> INFO.NAME little advice 16218272792095952
Best bet if you're new here is to hook up with one of the Imperial Guilds -- Fighters Guild or Mages Guild. It's not what you know, it's who you know. You'll get discounts on training and services, and if you need work, they know where to find it.
如果你是新手，最好的办法就是加入帝国公会 -- 战士公会或法师公会。重要的不是你懂得多少知识，而是你认识什么人。你会在训练和服务上得到折扣，如果你需要工作，他们知道去哪里找。 {帝国人}

> INFO.NAME little advice 2018520112243419605
You look like a f'lah who knows his way around, eh? Looking for what others are looking for. Well, they don't have an Imperial charter, but there's honor among thieves, if you know what I mean. Look in the tradehouses and cornerclubs, talk around. If you look likely, and talk likely, they'll give you the word.
你看起来像个懂行的f'lah（伙计），对吧？在找别人在找的东西。好吧，他们没有帝国人的特许证，但盗亦有道，你懂我的意思吧。在贸易行和议会所里找找看，四处聊聊。如果你看起来有可能，说话也有可能，他们就会给你消息。 {谈}

> INFO.NAME little advice 26860306083247622226
Don't expect the natives to take to you right away. Colonists like us -- outlanders, settlers from the other provinces -- will be more open and friendly at the start. Then, maybe when you do a few things, get your name around, gain a reputation, then the locals will open up a little. Stick to your own kind to start, and it will go a little easier.
别指望当地人会马上接受你。像我们这样的殖民者 -- 外地人、来自其他省份的定居者 -- 一开始会对你更加开放和友好。然后，当你做了一些事情，让你在当地打出了名头，赢得了声誉，当地人就会对你稍微开放一些。一开始先和自己的同类交往，这样会容易一些。

> INFO.NAME little advice 3255310583163914497
Well, most outlanders stick close to the Imperial Guilds and the legions. But you might consider service in one of the Dunmer Great Houses. They aren't real fond of outlanders. And you have to look around hard for a patron -- someone who'll speak for you, help you advance to the higher ranks. But the Great Houses are where the real opportunities are. House Hlaalu and House Redoran are pretty reasonable. House Telvanni -- the wizard house -- they're another story.
大多数外地人都喜欢帝国公会和帝国军团。但你也可以考虑加入丹莫的某个大家族。他们并不喜欢外地人。你必须四处寻找资助者 -- 一个能为你说话，帮助你晋级的人。但大家族才是真正有前途的地方。哈拉鲁家族和瑞多然家族还算合理。泰瓦尼家族 -- 巫师家族 -- 就另当别论了。 {帝国人,机会}

> INFO.NAME little advice 234287841168030031
DON'T head for the back country until you're ready. I did, and they took my stuff, and I count myself lucky. There's plenty of work, good opportunities near the towns down here in the southwest. But Red Mountain? No way. Out east with the Telvanni? Not yet. Up north in Sheogorad? Just toss your stuff in the water and slit your throat -- it'll be much faster, and less painful.
在你准备好之前，不要去红山。我就是这么做的，他们只是拿走了我的东西，算我走运。西南部的城镇附近有很多工作机会。但红山？门都没有。去东部的泰瓦尼地区？也不行。去北边的谢尔格拉德地区？那我建议你直接把你的东西扔到水里，然后自己割开自己的喉咙 -- 这样会快很多，也不会太痛苦。 {幸运}

> INFO.NAME little advice 856214413164273087
Hmm. You'll be looking for better armor. And a decent weapon. Let me make a suggestion. A lot of people out there are wearing very nice armor and carrying very nice weapons. You don't want to go taking those things from honest citizens, because you'll end up doing hard labor. But if you happen to find some outlaws wearing nice armor and carrying nice weapons, well, the bailiffs don't mind at all if you knock them over the head and take their stuff.
嗯，你需要更好的盔甲，还有像样的武器。我给你个建议，外面很多人都穿着很好的盔甲、拿着很好的武器。你不会想从诚实的市民手里抢走这些东西的，否则你的下场只有做苦工。但如果你碰巧发现一些不法之徒穿着漂亮的盔甲，带着漂亮的武器，那么法警们根本不会介意你敲他们的头，抢他们的东西。

> INFO.NAME little advice 272151181915281170
Me, I can afford it, so I buy my bed and board here. But there's no harm in sleeping rough, and eating what you can find. Anywhere outside of town you can just lay down and take your rest -- provided there ain't no thieves or kagouti around. But the guards don't like you sleeping in the streets. It annoys the gentry.
我付得起钱，所以我在在这里租了一张床。不过露宿街头也没什么不好，能吃什么就吃什么。在城外的任何地方，你都可以躺下休息 -- 只要周围没有小偷或盾角蜥。但卫兵不喜欢你露宿街头。这会惹恼贵族。 {瓜尔}

> INFO.NAME little advice 25326318635610711
You can read, can't you? Well, read some books. That's what they write 'em for. Got all the damn advice anyone could want in 'em. Buy 'em, read 'em, sell 'em back. Most folks don't mind if you take a peek at what books they got. Proud of being book-learned. Of course, if the f'lah is SELLING books, he wants you to buy 'em, THEN read 'em. It stands to reason.
你会读书，对吗？那就读点书吧。人们写书就是让你读的。吸取书里的所有该死的建议。买下它们，阅读它们，再把它们卖回去。大多数人不会介意你偷看他们的书。他们为自己是书香门第而感到骄傲。当然，如果这个f'lah（伙计）是卖书的，他希望你先买，然后再读。这是有道理的。 {令状}

> INFO.NAME little advice 20716865470626437
Don't know anything about adventuring? Here's the basics. Travel light, run like a kagouti. Don't go poking in holes unless you know what you're doing. Common sense.
对冒险一无所知？那我给你一些基本知识。轻装上阵，像盾角蜥一样奔跑。除非你知道自己在做什么，否则别去探洞。这是常识。

> INFO.NAME little advice 23461272711692331735
Where to start. Probably in Balmora. That's the House Hlaalu district seat. They've got a Fighters Guild and Mages Guild there, and a legion fort -- though I don't know if they're recruiting. They have all the services you need -- trainers, smiths, outfitters -- and if you join a guild and work your way up, the discounts and perks are worthwhile.
从哪里开始？可能在巴尔莫拉，那是哈拉鲁家族议院的所在地。那里有战士公会和法师公会，还有一个军团要塞 -- 不过我不知道他们是否在招兵买马。他们有你需要的所有服务 -- 驯兽师、铁匠铺、装备店 -- 如果你加入公会并努力往上爬，折扣和福利都是值得的。 {工作}

> INFO.NAME little advice 290424981117230807
Phew. You're bittergreen green, outlander. Might as well wear a sign, "New in Town." Word of advice. Buy a little good will. Lose a few drakes, gain a friend. Folks will loosen up if your spread a little of the Emperor's gold around.
呼。你是苦绿，外地人。还不如挂个牌子“新来的”给你个建议。买点好感，失去几个龙币，得到一个朋友。如果你把皇帝的金币散播出去，人们就会放松警惕了。

> INFO.NAME little advice 2136124912127065261
Your first visit to Morrowind, outlander? Then learn the law and local customs. Get a copy of Law and Custom in Morrowind. Slavery is legal here. Foul murder is illegal, but if he strikes the first blow, you're in the clear. A verbal attack is illegal, just like an unprovoked physical attack. Folks are touchy about personal honor. Watch your tongue, or you'll get called out to a duel.
你第一次来晨风吗，外地人？那就学习法律和当地习俗吧。买一本《晨风的法律与习俗》。奴隶制度在这里是合法的。谋杀是违法的，但如果对方先动手，你的反击就是正当的。语言攻击是非法的，就像无缘无故的人身攻击一样。人们对个人荣誉很敏感。注意你的言辞，否则你会被叫去决斗。

> INFO.NAME little advice 8301187191161611327
We see a lot of new faces like yours here in Seyda Neen. If you're hoping to stand out from the crowd, you need to practice a lot to improve your skills. And if you want to increase your general level of competence, focus on your major skills -- the ones most important to your trade. That way you'll advance more quickly. And another little tip newcomers forget. Always carry a little food so you can freshen up when fatigue gets you down. Eat a little, and you can feel your energy coming back.
我们在赛达尼恩见过很多像你这样的新面孔。如果你想在人群中脱颖而出，就得多加练习，提高自己的技能。如果你想提高自己的综合能力，那就把重点放在主修技能上，也就是对你的职业最重要的技能。这样你的进步会更快。还有一个新手容易忘记的小窍门。一定要随身携带一点食物，以便在疲劳时可以补充体力。吃一点，你就能感觉到精力充沛。 {需要,提示}

> INFO.NAME little advice 3134129964876314433
You wouldn't think so, but there are number of old abandoned tombs in the area. I thought this area had never been settled, but apparently, long before the Empire opened Vvardenfell up for settlement, someone has put a lot of ancestors to rest here. Most of us can't get past a superstitious distaste for rooting around in ancestral tombs. But you're an outlander. It shouldn't bother you, should it?
你可能不知道，但这一地区有很多废弃的古墓。我还以为这里从未有人定居过，但显然，早在泰姆瑞尔帝国开放瓦登费尔前来定居之前，就有人在这里安葬了许多祖先。我们中的大多数人都不喜欢在先祖墓穴里乱翻东西。但你是外地人。应该不会有什么问题吧？

> INFO.NAME little advice 2741066531984117339
Go to the Prefect of Hospitality, Angaredhel the Altmer, at the Gateway, and purchase the necessary Hospitality papers. It's not that expensive, and you don't want any trouble with the guards.
去找城门口的招待处长，一个叫安加雷德尔的傲特莫，购买必要的招待文件。这并不贵，而且你也不想在卫兵面前惹麻烦吧。 {闸门,瓜尔}

> INFO.NAME little advice 2581624354151364066
The best way to travel in Sadrith Mora is by the guild guide teleports at the Mages Guild in Wolverine Hall. It gets you past the foolishness at the Gateway, and most of the services you need are right in Wolverine Hall.
在萨德瑞斯-莫拉最好的旅行方式是在狼獾大厅的法师公会通过公会向导传送。它能让你避开海关的蠢事，而且你需要的大多数服务就在狼獾大厅里。 {愚蠢,闸门}

> INFO.NAME little advice 3470243601364710022
Looking for work in Sadrith Mora? Start with the Fighters Guild and the Mages Guild at Wolverine Hall. If you're thinking of trying to serve House Telvanni, go talk to the Telvanni Mouths over at the Council Hall.
在萨德瑞斯-莫拉找工作？从狼獾大厅的战士公会和法师公会开始吧。如果您想侍奉泰瓦尼家族，请去议会大厅与泰瓦尼的发言人交谈。

> INFO.NAME little advice 2611027953307205476
According to the Collective Articles of the Council of the Great House Telvanni, out-house and outlander guests in Sadrith Mora may not travel in town or speak to or conduct business with citizens, tradesmen, or publicans unless they have Hospitality Papers. Hospitality Papers may be obtained from the Prefect of Hospitality, Angaredhel, at the Gateway Inn for 25 gold.
根据泰瓦尼家族议会所制定的集体条款，除非持有招待文件，否则萨德瑞斯-莫拉的非住户和外地人不得在城里旅行，不得与市民、商人或公职人员交谈要事或做生意。招待文件可以花25金从闸门旅馆的招待处长安加雷德尔处获得。

> INFO.NAME little advice 206921311142365556
Sadrith Mora is the only place to shop for goods and services in the Telvanni District. All the other Telvanni settlements are small, with very few services and very poor selections.
萨德瑞斯-莫拉是泰瓦尼地区唯一可以购买商品和服务的地方。其他泰瓦尼定居点都很小，服务设施很少，没多少可选的东西。

> INFO.NAME little advice 16326288722358217525
Watch out for small camps of outcast Ashlanders. They prey on careless pilgrims. There's a large Ashlander camp beyond Mount Kand and Mount Assarnibibi to the north -- Erabenimsun camp. The Erabenimsun tribe is not very hospitable, but we're more or less at peace with them at present, so don't rile them.
当心那些灰烬之民流放者的小营地。他们专门劫掠粗心的朝圣者。坎德山和阿萨恩尼比比山之外的北面有一个很大的灰烬之民营地 -- 埃勒比尼姆孙营地。埃勒比尼姆孙部落不是很好客，但目前我们与他们多少还算和平相处，所以不要激怒他们。 {礼物}

> INFO.NAME little advice 2184728842546019675
Most pilgrims will need guards and guides to reach the pilgrim sites, but someone like you should have no trouble on your own. Follow Foyada Ilibaal northwest to Mount Kand, then Mount Assarnibibi is northeast of Mount Kand, across Foyada Zabirbael. Just take your time, keep landmarks in sight, and be ready to hoof it back to the stronghold if you get in trouble.
大多数朝圣者需要卫兵和向导才能到达朝圣地，但像你这样的人自己去应该没问题。沿着伊利巴勒熔渠向西北走，就能到达坎德山，然后阿萨恩尼比比山就在坎德山的东北方向，穿过扎比尔贝尔熔渠。慢慢走，注意观察地标，如果遇到困难，随时准备马不停蹄地返回堡垒。 {瓜尔}

> INFO.NAME little advice 2441142542640818872
We've had a lot of trouble with blight monsters escaping through the Ghostfence and attacking the village and outlying settlements. The Temple and House Redoran has called for volunteers to come help protect Maar Gan from monster attacks. Talk to the priests at the shrine if you might be willing to help. And talk to the volunteers who are lodging at the Andus Tradehouse.
我们遇到过很多麻烦，枯萎病怪物逃出幽魂之墙，袭击村庄和外围定居点。神殿和瑞多然家族号召志愿者前来帮助保护玛尔-甘免受怪物袭击。如果您愿意帮忙，请与圣祠的祭司们交谈。并与在安杜斯贸易行住宿的志愿者交谈。

> INFO.NAME little advice 29808239682462111553
Visit the Tower shrine, and ask the priests there about it. Quite a story. 'To you, Lord Dagon, I bite my thumb.'  Hah hah hah. Quite a trick. Maybe, if you're a questing hero, you'd like to match your wits against a Daedra?
参观塔楼圣祠，向那里的祭司打听一下。有个不错的故事：“为了你，大衮大人，我咬破了大拇指。”哈哈哈。真是好笑。也许，如果你是个探险英雄，你想和迪德拉比试比试？

> INFO.NAME little advice 66814576200015326
Not much up here to keep a questing hero like yourself busy, I'm afraid. It's pretty quiet, and that's the way we like it. You might take a look at the Daedric ruins to the southwest, though. Don't know anything about them, myself. No business fooling with that stuff. But they say a lot of those old sites have hidden treasures.
恐怕这里没什么需要你这样的探险英雄操心忙碌的事。这里很宁静，我们就喜欢这样。不过你可以去西南边的迪德拉废墟看看。我对那里一无所知，也没必要知道，但据说很多古迹都藏有宝藏。 {忙着,迪德拉式}

> INFO.NAME little advice 31770240923247032717
People around here are suspicious of strangers asking a lot of questions. Maybe something they're doing isn't exactly legal. They don't want anyone poking around. You understand?
这里的人都对问题很多的陌生人心怀警惕。也许他们在做的事情并不完全合法，他们不希望有人到处打探。你明白吗？

> INFO.NAME little advice 201882961974801680
If you're looking for trouble, and not particularly superstitious, there are a number of ancient abandoned tombs in these parts.
如果你想找麻烦，又不是特别迷信，这里有很多被遗弃的古墓。

> INFO.NAME little advice 2238228158287022473
There's a lot of wildlife in the Bitter Coast swamps. There's a market for alit and kagouti hide, and some folks swear rat meat is the sweetest meat in Morrowind.
苦涩海岸的沼泽里有很多野生动物，这里有鳄蜥和盾角蜥皮市场，有些人发誓老鼠肉是晨风中最甜的肉。

> INFO.NAME little advice 119802667289912807
There are nests of dreugh somewhere along the Bitter Coast. They're not to be trifled with. I don't think the value of the hide is worth the trouble. But it's the challenge and danger itself that attracts some people. More power to them.
在苦涩海岸的某些地方还有蟹灵的巢穴。它们可不是好惹的。我认为鼠皮的价值不值得大费周章，但正是挑战和危险本身吸引了一些人。他们更有力量。

> INFO.NAME little advice 3788232451380113869
You may have heard people refer to the Bitter Coast as the Smuggler's Coast. There's a reason for that. A lot of islands and coastline, with plenty of caves and hidey-holes, and few people around. Perfect for men with boats who want to keep their business private.
你可能听说过人们把苦涩海岸称为走私者的海岸。这是有原因的。这里岛屿和海岸线众多，有很多洞穴和藏身之处，而且人迹罕至。非常适合有船的人私下活动。 {事}

> INFO.NAME little advice 95123413300347676
Here's a notion. Steal from thieves. Perfectly legal. Outlaws got no rights, and they'll none of them be missed. You're a big hero if you bag a few thieves. And you end up with their stuff. Slick, eh? Of course, it's dangerous. But you can't get ahead without taking some risks.
我有个想法：偷鸡摸狗，完全合法。亡命之徒没有权利，也没人会怀念他们。如果你能抓到几个小偷，你就是大英雄了。而且你还能拿他们的东西当战利品，不错吧？当然，这很危险，但不入虎穴焉得虎子。

> INFO.NAME little advice 21185135362764217184
Mind your own business is my advice to visitors. Don't get nosy, or some people may take strong objection. If you think you're hot stuff, and you want to throw your weight around, go ahead. But I warned you.
别多管闲事，这是我对游客的忠告。不要多管闲事，否则有些人可能会强烈反对。如果你觉得自己很了不起，想大显身手，请便。但我警告过你了。

> INFO.NAME little advice 847025867278623837
They've sealed off the eggmine. Only letting miners in. But there is a secret entrance from the river bed.
他们封锁了卵矿场，只允许矿工进入，但河床上有个秘密入口。 {尼希斯卵矿场}

> INFO.NAME little advice 138613330761428304
Don't go poking around in the Old Velothi tower. The renegade Telvanni wizard Baladas Demnevanni lives there, and he doesn't welcome visitors.
别去那座老维洛提塔楼打探了。叛变的泰瓦尼巫师巴拉达斯・德姆内瓦尼住在那里，他不欢迎访客。

> INFO.NAME little advice 997225757237565275
It's pretty quiet right around Gnisis, especially for a questing hero like yourself. But out to the east are a bunch of bandit caves. Might be some loot and bandits there that'd be easy pickings for someone like you.
尼希斯附近风平浪静，对你这样的探险英雄来说尤为如此。不过东边有很多强盗洞穴。那里可能有些战利品和强盗，对你这样的人来说很容易下手。

> INFO.NAME little advice 99882645159588640

如果你想找工作，可以考虑一下死颅军团。这职位没没那么抢手，可能会有空缺。问问达瑞斯将军吧。

> INFO.NAME little advice 3228712911958911917
