既然你来了，就应该看看维威克的面具。去神殿问问梅拉・德罗拉，让他告诉你维威克的面具背后的故事。

> INFO.NAME little advice 686453462120328096
I bet you couldn't throw a stone around here without hitting a smuggler. 'Smuggler's Coast' is what they call this stretch of coast from Seyda Neen north to West Gash. Now, no one HERE would think of trying to cheat the Emperor of his taxes. No. We're loyal citizens.
我敢打赌，你在这里随便扔块石头出去都能砸到个走私者。“走私者海岸”是他们对从赛达尼恩向北到西境之痕这段海岸的称呼。不，这里没有人会想去偷税漏税，我们是忠诚的公民。

> INFO.NAME little advice 32358161091915225615
A fellow looking for trouble might take a peek around in the old Daedric ruins on an island to the south. Probably safer than stirring up trouble in town, anyway.
想找麻烦的人可以去南边岛上的迪德拉废墟看看，总比在城里惹事要安全得多。 {迪德拉式}

> INFO.NAME little advice 323723948562628631
You look like someone who is thinking about going into Red Mountain. We will not stop you. But we warn you: without protection from blight diseases, you won't get far. And even with protection, and plenty of blight cures when protection fails, you must plan on short forays inside and quick returns for heals and cures. And the creatures inside are terrible and numerous. And the ruins and citadels are worse.
你看起来像是要去红山的人。我们不会阻止你，但我们警告你：没有应对枯萎病瘟疫的防护措施，你走不远的。即使有保护措施，当它失效时你还得有足够的枯萎病治疗方法，你也必须规划好，只在短时间内进入红山，然后迅速返回以获得治疗和治愈。里面的生物既可怕又数量庞大。废墟和堡垒里的情况更糟。 {疾病,计划}

> INFO.NAME little advice 6126261832187221723
The Imperial Legion may be recruiting. I hear the units are at full strength in the town forts, but there might be openings on the frontier, up at Fort Darius. Speak to Frald the White, Knight Bachelor and Chapter Steward of the Hawkmoth Legion.
帝国军团可能正在招兵买马。我听说城镇要塞里的部队已经满员了，但边境上的达瑞斯要塞可能还有空缺。去找苍白者弗拉德吧，他是鹰蛾军团的学士骑士兼分会管事。 {帝国人,力量}

> INFO.NAME little advice 3528677187410269
We get pilgrims here from time to time, since we're the closest port to a pair of sites, the Malacath shrine and the Sanctus Shrine. If you were thinking of visiting the sites, let me warn you. I heard that a group of orcs are camped out over at the site of the Malacath shrine.
我们这里时常会有朝圣者，因为我们是距离玛拉凯斯圣祠和哉颂圣祠最近的港口。如果你想去那两个地方，让我警告你。我听说有一群兽人在玛拉凯斯圣祠那边安营扎寨。

> INFO.NAME little advice 20392225971245920880
Lots of ruins here on Sheogorad. If you're an adventurer looking for loot, or trouble, it might be worthwhile exploring the island. Mzuleft is the big Dwemer ruin everyone knows about. But there are other places on the island, less famous, less often visited, that might be more interesting. And safer.
谢尔格拉德这里有很多废墟。如果你是个冒险家，想找点战利品或麻烦，也许值得一探。姆祖莱夫特是个人尽皆知的大型锻莫遗迹。但岛上还有其他地方，籍籍无名，人迹罕至，可能更有趣。而且更安全。

> INFO.NAME little advice 2475845702385631107
Caldera is a quiet, law-abiding town. Not much call for adventurers or mercenaries here. A good place to shop for equipment and look for a trainer, though.
卡尔德拉是一个安静守法的小镇。冒险者或雇佣兵在这里并不吃香。不过倒是个购买装备和寻找训练师的好地方。 {法律}

> INFO.NAME little advice 24122284242624317152
Ald'ruhn is a good place for experienced fighters and mercenaries. Both the Fighters Guild and the Imperial Legion are looking for recruits, and they offer rapid advancement if you do well with the tasks the guild steward or the chapter steward assigns you. And if you're planning to make a career here in Ald'ruhn, you might consider House Redoran. It's hard for outlanders to rise above a certain rank, but if you show promise, and get a sponsor, you can go all the way to the top... in theory, anyway.
奥德'汝因是经验丰富的战士和佣兵的好去处。战士公会和帝国军团都在招兵买马，如果你能很好地完成公会管家或分会管家分配给你的任务，他们会给你带来快速晋级的机会。如果你打算在奥德'汝因发展，可以考虑瑞多然家族。外地人很难晋级到某一等级以上，但如果你表现得未来可期，并得到赞助，你就能一路走到顶端……反正，理论上是这样。 {雇佣兵,帝国人}

> INFO.NAME little advice 164951480229794220
If you are looking for work, and have skill and experience in the arcane arts, you can't do better than the Ald'ruhn Mages Guild. Edwinna Elbert, the guild steward, is in her own world, like most mages, but she's good-hearted and sensible, if you can get her attention. And you can't advance very far in other factions around here unless you have good fighter's skills. Except, the Temple, if that's to your taste. People with arcane skills can rise pretty fast in their ranks.
如果你正在找工作，并且拥有奥术方面的技能和经验，那么奥德'汝因法师公会是你最好的选择。法师公会管家埃德温娜・埃尔伯特和大多数法师一样，沉浸在自己的世界里，但她心地善良，通情达理，如果你能引起她的注意的话。除非你有很好的战士技能，否则在这里的其他派别中你是无法晋级的。神殿除外，如果你喜欢的话。拥有奥术技能的人可以在他们的派系中迅速崛起。

> INFO.NAME little advice 20611295471551616711
Ald'ruhn is fortunate in having two enchanters and two alchemists. Even though Cienne Sintieve and Llether Vari are up in the more expensive Manor District, I think you'll find the selection and service with Tanar Llervi and Anarenen at the Mages Guild every bit as good. Of course, if you're affiliated with the Mages Guild, you'll want to try Tanar Llervi and Anarenen first.
奥德'汝因很幸运地拥有两名附魔师和两名炼金术士。虽然西恩・辛提夫和雷瑟尔・瓦里在更昂贵的庄园区，但我想你会发现法师公会的塔纳尔・勒维和阿纳雷恩的服务同样出色。当然，如果你隶属于法师公会，你该先去找塔纳尔・勒维和阿纳雷恩。

> INFO.NAME little advice 686310959678021230
Do yourself a favor, mate. Hook up with the Guild. Now, maybe I got you wrong, don't take offense. But I'm watching you, and you look and move like someone in the Trade. The Guild can help you. And frankly, the Guild could use your help. Maybe you know, maybe you don't.... The Guild and the Camonna Tong are in a Guild War for control of Vvardenfell. The Camonna Tong are the ancient Dunmer syndicate. They hate outlanders, and always will. If they win, there'll be no place for you here, outlander.
帮你自己一个忙，伙计。跟公会联系吧，也许我误会你了，别见怪。但我在观察你，你的样子和行动都像公会里的人。公会可以帮你。老实说，公会需要你的帮助。也许你知道，也许你不知道……公会和卡莫纳堂正在进行一场公会战争，争夺瓦登费尔的控制权。卡莫纳堂是古老的丹莫集团。他们憎恨外地人，永远都是。如果他们赢了，这里就没有你的容身之地了，外地人。

> INFO.NAME little advice 2775122294307029747
You look like you're looking for something. It might be you'll find it at the Rat in the Pot. A fellow named Aengoth the Jeweler. He's good at looking for things. And finding them. And a warning. Stay clear of the Camonna Tong. They don't like outlanders, and what they don't like, they kill.
你看起来在找什么东西，也许你可以去锅中之鼠看看。珠宝商阿恩戈斯，他很擅长找东西，而且能找到。还有个警告，离卡莫纳堂远点，他们不喜欢外地人，他们会杀了不喜欢的东西。 {老鼠}

> INFO.NAME little advice 572829185274464241
If you want weapons or arms in Ald'ruhn, or need weapons and armor repaired, look for Dandera Selaro the Smith in Ald'ruhn-under-Skar. Dandera Selaro serves all comers, and has a quality selection. The other three smiths in Ald'ruhn have faction associations. Ergnir the Nord is the Fighters Guild smith, and Tuveso Beleth is the House Redoran smith at Redoran Council Hall. Yambagorn gro-Shulor is the Legion's smith at Fort Buckmoth. And Daynes Redothril the pawnbroker may also be worth a look.
如果你想在奥德'汝因搞到武器装备，或者需要修理武器和盔甲，请在奥德'汝因-蟹骨之下的的铁匠商铺找丹德拉・塞拉罗。丹德拉・塞拉罗向所有人提供服务，并且有良品待售。奥德'汝因的其他三个铁匠都有派系协会。诺德人埃尔格尼尔是战士公会的铁匠，图维索・贝莱斯是瑞多然议会大厅的瑞多然家族铁匠。扬巴贡・格罗-舒洛是雄蛾要塞的军团铁匠。典当商戴尼斯・瑞多瑟尔也值得一看。 {盔甲维修}

> INFO.NAME little advice 2820953291952514426
While you're here, you have to take a look at the Daedric ruins. Ashalmawia. Very old. Remarkable. Safe to go up there, in the daytime at least. I wouldn't go inside, though. Place is cursed.
既然来了，不妨去迪德拉遗迹，阿沙尔马维亚看看。它非常、非常古老。至少白天去是安全的，但我不会进去。那地方被诅咒了。 {迪德拉式}

> INFO.NAME little advice 25957198471077212354
Strangers get lost up here. Be careful. My advice is keep an eye to the coast, then pick a landmark, then keep them both is sight as you explore. The Daedric ruins to the east, for example, are visible for a long distance.
陌生人很容易在这里迷路。小心点。我的建议是先观察海岸，然后选一个地标，然后在探索过程中同时观察这两个地标。比如东边的迪德拉废墟，很远就能看到。 {迪德拉式}

> INFO.NAME little advice 2434625998154753841
We don't like outlanders. We don't like them in our Council Club. We don't like trouble. We do like a little peace and quiet. If you don't mind.
我们不喜欢外地人；我们不喜欢他们进入议会所；我们不喜欢麻烦；我们喜欢宁静，如果你不介意的话。 {棍棒}

> INFO.NAME little advice 18709150742074210919
If you need to meet a guy, you want to look in at the South Wall, cornerclub, south of the river. Talk around; if they like your looks, they'll open up. But be careful. The Council Club, also on the south side, is Camonna Tong territory, the local mob. They don't like outlanders, except under building foundations.
如果你想找什么人，就去南墙街角俱乐部看看，就在河的南岸。如果他们喜欢你的长相，就会敞开心扉和你谈谈。但要小心。议会所也在南边，那是当地黑帮卡莫纳堂的地盘。他们不喜欢外地人，除了被埋在地里砌进墙里的。 {需要,棍棒}

> INFO.NAME little advice 84372506210727392
Be smart. Join the Guild. Honor among thieves, right? You're new here, don't know your way around, get in a little trouble -- a lot of trouble, more likely. Oh, you'll learn, fast enough, I guess. But get gold on your head, and things get tougher. The Guild will steer you straight, towards the sweet and away from the sour. And they're a regular guild -- discounts on your training and services and everything. Do yourself a favor. Start easy, with friends. Then later, you want to freelance, fine.
放聪明点，加入公会，盗亦有道，对吧？你初来乍到人生地不熟，会惹上小麻烦，甚至是大麻烦，我想你会很快适应的。但如果你被悬赏通缉，事情就变得棘手了。公会能引导你走向正轨，远离酸甜苦辣与人间疾苦。而且他们是正规公会 -- 你的训练和服务都能得到折扣。给你自己规划一下，从简单的开始，和朋友一起。如果以后你想做自由职业者，也没问题。 {认识你,忙}

> INFO.NAME little advice 994624855506220023
You look like you might not faint wearing heavy armor. You might check out the Legion garrison at Fort Moonmoth. They like 'em big over there, and maybe they're looking for recruits. Good benefits, chance for advancement, get a piece of land at retirement, maybe even end up a knight.

> INFO.NAME little advice 2722125028149886972
Well, if you're considering a mercenary career, the Fighters Guild isn't too choosy. No, don't take offense. I just mean they're relaxed, easy going, give along, get along. Legion is a lot tougher outfit, and fussy about ends and means, if you follow me. And those House Redoran people -- well, they are tough and sharp, but a bit tiresome in the duty-and-honor line.
如果你想当雇佣兵，战士公会可不会挑剔。不，别见怪。我的意思是他们态度很宽松，随遇而安，没什么严格的纪律。如果你明白我的意思，军团是个更强硬的组织，严格履行职责，对目标和手段都很挑剔。而那些瑞多然家族的人--嗯，他们很强悍，也很敏锐，但在责任和荣誉这条线上有点令人厌烦。

> INFO.NAME little advice 16828113161949615915
One little word. 'Ingredients.' Pointy hats and bottlepackers all need their ingredients. Go out, pop a skeleton apart, get the bonemeal, make a quick drake. Now, you have to be careful, because the locals don't like you out digging up their aunties. So get a book, read up, know the kinds of rocks and herbs you're looking for, and off you go. Start small. Leave the big Daedra and scary stuff alone, right?
一个简单的词，“素材”。那些尖帽子巫师和天天捣药玩瓶子的都需要素材。到外面去，随便拆一具骷髅，拿到骨粉，随便造点药水赚点龙币。不过你得小心点，本地人不是很喜欢你随便去挖他们的七大姑八大婶。所以事先找本书读一读，了解你要找的石头和草药的种类，然后就出发，从简单的做起。别去找那些大型迪德拉怪物和别的可怕的东西，对吧？

> INFO.NAME little advice 4554537349246222
If you want to make your mark as a mage, you haven't got much choice. It's the Mages Guild or nothing. Oh, you can pick up experience and education from the Temple or the Imperial cult, but here in the settled West, the Mages Guild has all the best people, best libraries and facilities, best work opportunities. Of course, all the REAL wizards are Telvanni Dunmer, out on the east coast. But they are all either cranky or crazy or just plain mean. You got to be tough just to TALK with those wizard-lords.
如果你想成为一名法师，那你的选择不多。要么加入法师公会，要么一无所有。哦，你可以在神殿或帝国教团学习积累经验，但在定居点的西部，法师公会拥有最好的人、最好的图书馆和设施、最好的工作机会。当然，真正的法师都是东海岸的泰瓦尼家族的丹莫。但他们要么脾气暴躁，要么疯疯癫癫，要么就是很刻薄。要想和那些巫师大人交谈，你得有过硬的本领。 {帝国人}

> INFO.NAME little advice 2349213562990526938
The easy way to get started is to join a Guild. Do their jobs, earn your way up the ranks, get the discounts, training, and other services. Gets you out and around in Vvardenfell, a little at a time, get to know the country and the people. The Guild takes an interest in you, doesn't send you in over your head. The Fighters Guild and the Legion, anyway. The Mages Guild is another story. Some old chair-polisher, doesn't have a clue what he's sending you into, doesn't much care.
入门的简单方法就是加入公会。给他们做一些工作，靠自己的努力晋级，获得折扣、训练和其他服务。让你在瓦登费尔四处漫游，一点一点地了解这片土地和人民。公会会对你感兴趣，不会把你送上绝路。反正战士公会和军团是这样。法师公会则另当别论。一些老法师，不知道他派你去做什么，也不太关心。

> INFO.NAME little advice 32730501277161293
Outlanders new in Vvardenfell do best in Balmora. House Hlaalu is Imperial through and through, and you get a good mix of native and Imperial people and services. Not as friendly to outlanders up north in House Redoran country, or down in big Vivec City, and DEFINITELY not friendly out east with the Telvanni wizards. Shop the outfitters, then check out the guilds for work. If you want to be adopted by a Great House, you'll need a patron, and that's easier when you've got a reputation.
初到瓦登费尔的外地人最好去巴尔莫拉。哈拉鲁家族是彻头彻尾的帝国人，这里有本地人和帝国人，也有各种服务。北边的瑞多然家族领地或大维威克城对外地人并不友好，而东边的泰瓦尼巫师也绝对不友好。逛逛装备店，然后去公会找工作。如果你想加入一个大家族，你需要一个资助者，如果你有名声，那就容易多了。

> INFO.NAME little advice 26283129063009126892
You should speak with the monk An-Deesei at the Argonian Mission. If the monk's life interests you, that is.
你应该去阿尔贡尼亚使馆找僧侣安-迪瑟谈谈。如果你对僧侣的生活感兴趣的话。

> INFO.NAME little advice 6681148961746627443
If you need to know something about the merchant's trade, talk to Bolrin in Ebonheart at the East Empire Company Hall. He's been a merchant with the East Empire Company here for years, and he knows his stuff.
如果你需要了解一些商人的交易情况，可以去黑檀心的东帝国公司大厅找波尔林谈谈。他在这里做东帝国公司的商人已经很多年了，他很懂行。

> INFO.NAME little advice 356225843811916266
If you need to know about clothes, and you want to talk to a clothier, talk to Milie Hastien in Balmora.
如果你需要了解服装，想找裁缝铺的人谈谈，可以去巴尔莫拉找米莉・哈斯蒂安。

> INFO.NAME little advice 6527196682828317469
If you want to know about a place on Vvardenfell, talk to a scout. And the scout I'd talk to is Elone. You can find her at Arrille's Tradehouse in Seyda Neen. She's traveled all over the island.
如果你想了解瓦登费尔的某个地方，那就去找个侦察兵问问。如果是我就会去找侦察兵埃隆。你可以在赛达尼恩的阿里尔贸易行找到她。她走遍了整个岛屿。 {谈}

> INFO.NAME little advice 1582215293888325846
Fenas Madach is the thief's thief. Retired, of course. Or so he says. He has a business up in Gnisis, Madach's Tradehouse. You want to talk shop with a thief, go talk to Fenas Madach.
费纳斯・马达奇是个真正的盗贼大佬。当然，他已经退休了。至少他自己是这么说的。他在尼希斯有间马达奇贸易行。你想和盗贼谈生意，就去找费纳斯・马达奇。 {事}

> INFO.NAME little advice 2887412587138876697
Most assassins don't like to talk about their trade. Take the Morag Tong, for instance. Tight-lipped about everything. But Ingokning, the assassin at the Skyrim Mission in Ebonheart? He doesn't mind talking. In fact, he'll bend your ear if you aren't careful.
大多数刺客不喜欢谈论他们的生意。比如莫拉格堂。对什么都守口如瓶。但黑檀心天际大使馆的刺客英戈克宁呢？他不介意多嘴。事实上，一不小心他就会把你的耳朵拧下来。

如果你想和弓箭手讨论射箭，可以去找黑檀心的伊安。你通常可以在码头附近的广场上找到他，就是龙雕像那里。 {谈}

> INFO.NAME little advice 118859481208974993
Athal Nerano is the proverbial 'silver-tongued rogue'. He knows the rogue's trade, and loves to talk about it. He lists his residence as Madach's Tradehouse in Gnisis.
阿塔尔・内拉诺是传说中的“银舌流氓”。他精通流氓行当，喜欢谈论这些。他住在尼希斯的马达奇贸易行。

> INFO.NAME little advice 1332936563717989
You should speak with the monk An-Deesei at the Argonian Mission. If the monk's life interests you, that is.
你应该去阿尔贡尼亚使馆找僧侣安-迪瑟谈谈。如果你对僧侣的生活感兴趣的话。

> INFO.NAME little advice 97131103009413563
Llevana Salaren at the Temple in Molag Mar is the most knowledgeable acrobat I know. I didn't say BEST acrobat. There's others who can leap higher and jump farther, but she can TALK acrobat talk better than any other acrobat I've ever met.
莫拉格-玛尔神殿的莱瓦娜・萨拉伦是我认识的最博学的杂技演员。我可没说她是最棒的杂技演员。还有其他人能跳得更高更远，但她比我见过的任何其他杂技演员都更会说杂技术语。 {谈}

> INFO.NAME little advice 21062112881978123370
My notion of the ideal knight is an Orc named Dumbuk gro-Bolak. He serves with the Legion under General Darius up in Gnisis. You'll usually find him in the barracks. Look him up. He knows his trade, and Vvardenfell.
我心目中的理想骑士是一个名叫杜穆布克・格罗-博拉克的兽人。他在尼希斯的达瑞斯将军麾下的军团服役。你通常能在兵营里找到他。去找他，他很了解他的职业，也了解瓦登费尔。

> INFO.NAME little advice 234875632110220344
If you were to ask me for the model of a warrior, I'd have to say Miles Gloriosus. He's at the Andus Tradehouse in Maar Gan right now, on a crusade to kill off all the monsters sneaking through the Ghostfence, but he always has time to talk with an admirer.
如果你要问我战士的典范，我不得不说迈尔斯・格洛里索斯。他现在正在玛尔-甘的安杜斯贸易行，讨伐所有偷偷穿越幽魂之墙的怪物，但他总是有时间和崇拜者聊天。 {潜行,谈}

> INFO.NAME little advice 291392498268423164

> INFO.NAME little advice 13039228981365825921

If you want to talk with a spellsword with extensive experience in Morrowind, talk to Strillian Macro at the barracks in Gnisis. He's served with several garrisons on Vvardenfell, knows the island and its people, and doesn't mind taking time out to talk with anyone who shares his interest in his profession.

> INFO.NAME little advice 542625647341320968
If you want to know everything there is to know about being a mage, let me suggest Estirdalin at the Balmora Mages Guild. You want to talk to an expert in the trade, patient, and well-spoken -- someone who likes to talk about the subjects. You don't want a trainer -- not unless you expect to pay for the information. And you don't want someone too busy or important to talk to you. Try Estirdalin. He's smart, friendly, and ready to talk.
如果你想知道关于法师的一切，让我推荐巴尔莫拉法师公会的埃斯特达林。你需要的是一位有耐心、谈吐得体的行业专家--一个喜欢谈论相关话题的人。你不需要训练师，除非你想花钱买信息。你也不要找太忙或太重要的人。试试埃斯特达林。他聪明、友好，随时准备和你交谈。 {忙着}

> INFO.NAME little advice 1874952556747169
There's an enchanted transportation system in the old Dunmer strongholds. Created ages ago, but still works. You need a thing called an 'index' to use the system. Not many of them around. Collectors will pay a pretty drake for them.
在丹莫的旧堡垒里有一个附魔的运输系统。很久以前就有了，但现在还能用。你需要一个叫“引路石”的东西才能使用这个系统。这种东西不多了，收藏家会花大量龙币买下。 {工作,收集者}

> INFO.NAME little advice 19803228648862137
Yes, buying and selling Dwarven artifacts without an Imperial charter is illegal. But I've never heard of anyone pinched for it.
没错，没有帝国人的特许证，买卖矮人文物是违法的。但我从未听说有人因此被抓。

> INFO.NAME little advice 1886295746611929
If all it takes is a little persuasion, a flask of Telvanni bug musk is what you need. Makes even an Orc charming.
如果只需要一点劝说，一壶泰瓦尼虫麝香就是你需要的。它甚至能让兽人变得迷人。

> INFO.NAME little advice 131552644227112359
Best bargain for a risk-taker is a jug of sujamma. Makes you strong as an ogrim -- not for long, but long enough.
对冒险者来说，最好的便宜货就是一壶苏伽玛。它能让你变得像蠹虐食人魔一样强壮 -- 时间不长，但也足够了。 {奥格力姆}

> INFO.NAME little advice 151721995257886024
I've never seen a successful adventurer who didn't carry a couple of Almsivi Intervention scrolls with him on long expeditions. Two reasons. Emergency exit. And it lets you move a LOT more loot than you can carry on foot. And faster goes without saying.
我从未见过一个成功的冒险者在远征时不随身携带几个奥姆希维干预卷轴。原因有二。紧急出口。而且它能让你搬运比步行更多的战利品。更快的速度不言而喻。

> INFO.NAME little advice 1830425214167636072
I've never seen a successful adventurer who didn't carry a couple of Divine Intervention scrolls with him on long expeditions. Two reasons. Emergency exit. And it lets you move a LOT more loot than you can carry on foot. And faster goes without saying.
我从未见过一个成功的冒险者在远征时不随身携带几个圣灵干预卷轴。原因有二。紧急出口。而且它能让你搬运比徒步搬运更多的战利品。更快的速度不言而喻。

> INFO.NAME little advice 29403274862814808
If you do the crime, pay the fine, don't do the time. You might think a little hard labor isn't a bad price to pay, but while you're breaking rocks for the Empire, you lose the edge in your useful skills, and it takes a long time to get back to where you were before.
如果你犯下了罪行，交了罚款，就不用坐牢。你可能会觉得干点苦力不算什么，但当你为帝国砸石头的时候，你本来的各种技能久疏于锻炼就会逐渐退步，要花很长时间才能恢复到以前的水平。 {泰姆瑞尔帝国}

> INFO.NAME little advice 1584133641041224652
If you take a job that's too hard for you, don't kill yourself. Wait until you're bigger and stronger, then try again.
如果你接受了一份对你来说太难的工作，别去送死。等到你变得更高更强壮时，再去尝试。

> INFO.NAME little advice 15933216522200427592
If you want to improve a skill you're terrible at, it's worth paying for a little training, just to get you started. Sure, you can teach yourself, but it can be slow and frustrating.
如果你想提高自己不擅长的技能，值得花点钱接受一下训练，只是为了让你入门。当然，你可以自学，但可能会很慢，而且令人沮丧。

> INFO.NAME little advice 3219120251791225772
If you kill yourself trying to complete a job that's too difficult for you, it's nobody's fault but your own.
如果你为了完成一项对你来说太难的工作而去送死，这不是别人的错，而是你自己的错。

> INFO.NAME little advice 1650105461312428566
Don't fight when you're tired. Don't try to cast spells when you're tired. You'll fail much more often when you're tired. That's why veterans always carry a couple of Restore Fatigue potions for an emergency.
疲劳时不要战斗。疲劳时不要尝试施法。疲劳时施法失败的次数会更多。这就是为什么退伍军人总是随身携带一些恢复体力药水以备不时之需。 {这些药水}

> INFO.NAME little advice 30065136011644315896
When you take a job, you have to have the good sense to hold off until you're stronger if it seems too hard for you.
当你接受一项工作时，如果觉得它对你来说太难了，你必须有足够的理智，等到你更强壮时再去做。

> INFO.NAME little advice 13756105811994122503
If you find yourself stumbling into trouble when you're tired, stop being so reckless. Keep an eye out. If you're entering unfamiliar territory, and you think it might be hostile, slow down to a walk, look around, catch your breath, and be ready for trouble.
如果你发现自己在疲惫时跌跌撞撞地闯了祸，就不要再这么鲁莽了。保持警惕。如果你正在进入陌生的领域，而且你认为那里可能充满敌意，那就放慢脚步，环顾四周，喘口气，随时准备应付麻烦。

> INFO.NAME little advice 17545243371364211941
If you're heading into the backcountry, always carry a couple of Restore Health, Restore Fatigue, Cure Disease, and Cure Blight potions with you.
如果要进入荒郊野外，一定要随身携带几支恢复生命、恢复体力、治愈疾病和治愈枯萎病的药水。 {这些药水}

> INFO.NAME little secret 25693272922242731603
Oh yeah, sure. Heard ya the f-f-first time.
哦，是的，当然。第-第-第一次听到你说。

> INFO.NAME little secret 1596014266109399564
Wha?
什么？

> INFO.NAME little secret 930395562513723882
If you are looking for access to the places of power, start with Tienius Delitian, King Helseth's Captain of the Royal Guard. He's fair and professional, and King Helseth is no simple figurehead, unlike his predecessor. There's real power there, and Helseth is just going to get more powerful as he learns how Mournhold works.
如果你在寻找进入权力场所的途径，从蒂纽斯・德利天开始，他是赫尔塞斯国王的王室卫兵队长。他公正而专业，而且赫尔塞斯国王不像他的前任那样简单。他是个真正有手腕的人，而赫尔塞斯在了解了哀伤之城的情况后，只会变得更加强大。 {瓜尔,工作}

> INFO.NAME little secret 1124825171175287403
Modern Mournhold is built upon the ruins of Old Mournhold. At the end of the First Era, Mournhold was destroyed by Mehrunes Dagon. Sotha Sil and Almalexia arrived and drove Mehrunes Dagon back into Oblivion, but the city already lay in ruins. You can reach the abandoned passages of Old Mournhold through the sewers beneath Mournhold, and adventurers still seek lost treasures in the First Era ruins.
现代的哀伤之城建立在哀伤之城旧址的废墟上。在第一纪元末年，哀伤之城被梅鲁涅斯・大衮摧毁。索萨・希尔和阿玛莱西娅来到这里，将梅鲁涅斯・大衮赶回了湮灭位面，但城市已经成了废墟。你可以通过哀伤之城下面的下水道到达哀伤之城旧址的废弃通道，冒险家们仍然在这个第一纪元的废墟中寻找失落的宝藏。

> INFO.NAME little secret 2500677723394663
Here's our little secret. I can kill you without quickening my pulse.
这是我们的小秘密。我杀了你毫不费力。

别惹阿玛莱西娅之手。这不是一个你能再犯第二次的错误。

> INFO.NAME little secret 944310901808522852

别惹王室卫兵。这不是一个你能再犯第二次的错误。 {瓜尔}

> INFO.NAME little secret 65414780932151
All the power in Mournhold starts with Almalexia at the Temple. Of course, no mere mortal is going to get access to the Lady of Mercy. But Fedris Hler, her steward, is quite approachable. Start with him, win his confidence, and then maybe things will open up for you.
哀伤之城的所有力量都是从神殿里的阿玛莱西娅开始的。当然，凡人不可能随便接触到仁慈圣母。但费德里斯・赫勒，她的管家，是很容易接近的。从他开始，赢得他的信任，然后事情也许会豁然开朗。

> INFO.NAME little secret 16941787082512064

> INFO.NAME little secret 10185225361949731231
You're an adventurer, right? Then watch out if you go down in the sewers. That's the way to the ruins of Old Mournhold, yes, and that's where an adventurer can make his fortune. But... the Black Dart Gang preys on adventurers down below. They look harmless -- like outcasts or beggars. You may think you're tough... you can handle anything. But not the Black Dart Gang.
你是个冒险家，对吗？那么，如果你下到下水道里去，就要小心了。那是通往哀伤之城旧址的废墟的路，是的，那是冒险家们能寻找到财富的地方。但是……黑镖帮在下面猎杀冒险者。他们看起来无害 -- 就像流浪汉或乞丐。你可能认为你很强……你什么都对付得了。但黑镖帮可没那么简单。

> INFO.NAME little secret 251731914716407914
I've heard that a fellow named Dovor Oren has deep pockets. He is looking for weapons and armor -- special items -- and he pays well. I can't tell you where to find him. Just keep your eyes out for him and his associates.
我听说有个叫多沃尔・奥伦的家伙腰缠万贯。他正在寻找武器和盔甲 -- 特殊物品 -- 而且报酬丰厚。我不能告诉你去哪里找他。只要你留意他和他的朋友就可以了。

> INFO.NAME little secret 1656921162306334539
Smuggling raw glass is a crime. All raw glass belongs to the Emperor, so it's the crime of treason, and punished by death. But... there's so much money to be made selling black market raw glass that it's a rare merchant who'll refuse to buy a piece from you. Of course, if the mine guards catch you stealing raw glass, they just kill you. Which is why we don't steal raw glass.
走私玻璃矿是犯罪。所有的玻璃原矿都属于皇帝，所以这是叛国的罪行，要处以死刑。但是……卖黑市原矿玻璃可以赚很多钱，很少有商人会拒绝向你买一块玻璃。当然，如果矿场卫兵抓到你偷玻璃原矿，他们会直接杀了你。这就是我们不偷玻璃原矿的原因。 {瓜尔}

> INFO.NAME little secret 90711268416724565

这是个危险的地方，所以家族的人都不会来这里，所以我们一直把黑檀岛的秘密藏在心里，现在你知道我们的秘密了。外地人，你很勇敢，能来这么远的地方，所以我们会让你活下去，但不要碰黑檀。

> INFO.NAME little secret 673821472106711099
I like your style, n'wah. Here's a tip. Propylon. Ever been in a Dunmer stronghold? Have you seen the propylon chambers, with the two big stone pillars? They're transportation devices. Except you need a key to use them -- a tiny little thing called a 'propylon index'. A guy tried to sell me one -- wanted a fortune for it, so I told him to blow. Later I hear this guy went to a Daedric shrine called Maelkashishi, and forgot to come back. So maybe the propylon index went there with him. And stayed.
我喜欢你的风格，N'wah（外地人）。给你个提示，引路器。去过丹莫的堡垒吗？你见过有两根大石柱的引路室吗？它们是传送装置，不过你需要一把钥匙来使用它们 -- 一个叫做“引路石”的小东西。有个家伙想卖给我一个，要价不菲，我让他滚蛋。后来我听说这家伙去了一个叫梅尔卡诗诗的迪德拉圣祠，却没再回来。所以也许引路石和他一起留在了那里。 {财富,迪德拉式}

> INFO.NAME little secret 3047192883193230349

库什塔什皮的南边和西边，也就是阿希穆萨营地西边的迪德拉老地方，是一个叫做桑尼特的古老洞穴的入口。他们就是在那里发现了两个猎人的尸体，他们的肉被尸化得又白又膨胀。智者是不会去那里的。 {迪德拉式,膨胀块茎}

> INFO.NAME little secret 22109176162271620109
We miners don't grow the eggs. We just harvest them. The queen lays the eggs, the workers plant them, tend them, and nourish them, and we harvest them. Doesn't hurt the colony. They grow far more than they need.
卵矿不是我们矿工种的，我们只是收获它们。夸蚂女王产卵，工人种植，照料，滋养，然后我们收获。这对夸蚂群没有坏处，它们长出来的比需要的多得多。 {工作,计划}

> INFO.NAME little secret 61475781385732581
Kwama foragers and warriors won't attack us, since they're used to our smell. But they attack intruders. And you smell like an intruder. But don't worry. The queen squirts out foragers and warriors like seeds. If the foragers and warriors bother you, kill them, or run past, whichever is easier. But do us a favor, and don't kill the workers. They won't bother you, and we need them to keep the queen laying and the eggs ripening.
夸蚂觅食者和夸蚂兵虫不会攻击我们，因为它们习惯了我们的气味，但他们会攻击入侵者，而你闻起来就像入侵者。不过别担心，女王会像播种一样，把觅食者和兵虫喷出来，如果觅食者和兵虫打扰了你，杀了他们，或者跑过去，随便哪种更容易些，但帮我们个忙，别杀工蚁，它们不会打扰你们，我们需要它们来让女王继续产卵，让虫卵成熟。 {工作}

> INFO.NAME little secret 9604216873090621947
When the blight gets a mine, you have to kill or cure them. It doesn't pay to cure the foragers, workers, or warriors -- a healthy queen can produce them fast enough. But you HAVE to cure the queen, or the mine is doomed. To cure the queen, you need to cast a cure blight spell or have scroll of Daerir's Blessing.
等枯萎之症感染的生物进入了矿场，你就得杀了它们或者治好它们。治愈觅食者、工蚁或兵虫并不划算--一个健康的夸蚂女王可以很快生产出它们。但你必须治愈女王，否则矿场就完了。要治愈女王，你需要施法治愈枯萎病或戴瑞尔的祝福卷轴。 {工作,生命}

> INFO.NAME little secret 266442382321106923
Want to cure a blighted queen, but don't have the cure blight spell? Then you need to buy some Scroll of Daerir's Blessing scrolls. NOT Daerir's Miracle -- they cure YOU. Daerir's Blessing scrolls cure the target. Try Crulius Pontanian at Fort Moonmoth, or Miraso Seran at Telvanni Council Hall, or Ureso Drath at the Ald'ruhn Temple.
想要治愈得了枯萎病的夸蚂女王，但没有治愈枯萎病的魔法？那么你需要购买一些戴瑞尔的祝福卷轴。不是戴瑞尔的奇迹--它们只能治愈你自己。戴瑞尔的祝福卷轴可以治愈目标。去月蛾要塞的克鲁留斯・庞塔尼安，或者泰瓦尼议会大厅的米拉索・瑟然，或者奥德'汝因神殿的尤瑞索・达拉斯试试。

> INFO.NAME little secret 31094156631656225366
There's a lot of money to be made looting the Dwarven ruins. Against the law, yes, but where's there's a profit to be made, folks turn a blind eye. One problem -- the artifacts are often made of metal, and heavy as hell. Unless you're a big brute, it's tough to carry away all the loot. Me, I carry a Divine Intervention or an Almsivi intervention scroll. Load up, read the scroll, and I'm back in town with a load of goods.
掠夺矮人废墟可以赚很多钱。没错，这是违反法律的，但只要有利可图，人们就会睁一只眼闭一只眼。问题是，这些文物通常是金属制造的，而且重得要命。除非你是个大块头，否则很难带走所有战利品。我则携带圣灵干预卷轴或奥姆希维干预卷轴。装上东西，读一下卷轴，我就能带着货物回城了。 {利益}

> INFO.NAME little secret 276181128340255511
You like to poke your nose into doors out in the backcountry? A little suggestion. The places that look like they're made of a golden metal? With spires and towers? Those are Dwarven ruins. They're kinda dangerous -- partly because of the old Dwarven machines in them, and partly because of the kind of things that like to hide out in such old ruins. All the old ruins inside the Ghostfence, for example, are ancient Dwarven ruins. And I hear that vampires like them, too.
你喜欢在荒郊野外探头探脑吗？给你个小提示。那些看起来像金色金属做成的地方？有尖塔和塔楼？那些是矮人遗迹。它们有点危险 -- 一方面是因为里面有矮人的古老机器，另一方面是因为有种东西喜欢藏在这种老废墟里。比如说，幽魂之墙内所有的古老废墟都是矮人的遗迹。而且我听说灰烬吸血鬼也喜欢它们。

> INFO.NAME little secret 703916010385010941
You're an outlander, maybe you don't know about the kinds of Daedric ruins we have here in Morrowind. Daedra cults worship the Bad Daedra. You can learn more about that at the Temple. Anyway, long ago, before the Temple put a stop to it, people used to worship bad Daedra -- Molag Bal, Malacath, Sheogorath, and Mehrunes Dagon -- at Daedra shrines. But lately, since the Empire came in, some people have taken up worshipping the bad Daedra at these old sites. And I warn you. These are dangerous places.
你是个外地人，也许你不知道我们晨风这里的迪德拉遗迹的种类。迪德拉邪教崇拜邪恶的迪德拉，你可以在神殿了解到更多信息。总之，很久以前，在神殿制止这一切之前，人们经常在神殿圣祠中祭拜邪恶的迪德拉--莫拉格・巴尔、玛拉凯斯、谢尔格拉斯和梅鲁涅斯・大衮。但最近，自从帝国来了之后，有些人开始出没于这些旧址祭拜邪恶的迪德拉。我警告你，这些地方很危险。 {迪德拉式,泰姆瑞尔帝国}

> INFO.NAME little secret 1588253092529329077
What are the most dangerous places in Morrowind? Well, probably the ash vampire citadels inside the Ghost Fence, on Red Mountain. But outside the Ghostfence? I guess the Daedric ruins would be the worst. They're all over the place, and full of bad Daedra, and the crazy folks who summon them. I hear vampires are pretty bad, too, but I've never seen any, personally. And the Dwemer sites are pretty bad, too.
晨风最危险的地方是哪里？嗯，可能是幽魂之墙内的灰烬吸血鬼城堡，在红山上。但是幽魂之墙外面呢？我猜迪德拉废墟是最危险的地方，那里到处都是邪恶的迪德拉和召唤他们的疯子。我听说吸血鬼也很可怕，但我从没亲眼见过。锻莫遗迹也很糟糕。 {迪德拉式,锻莫族,锻莫遗址}

> INFO.NAME little secret 16531102192603444
Daedra? You know what they are, right? Well, Daedric shrines are where Daedra cults worship Daedra. Bad people who summon bad Daedra. Stay away from them. Why? Because Daedra are nasty. And the folks that worship them are even nastier.
迪德拉？你知道它们是什么吧？迪德拉圣祠是迪德拉邪教祭拜迪德拉的地方，恶人会召唤邪恶的迪德拉，离他们远点。为什么？因为迪德拉很恶心，而崇拜他们的人更下流。 {迪德拉式}

> INFO.NAME little secret 452027941264710687
How do you recognize a Daedric shrine? Well, they've got long, funny names, like Ashurnibibi or Zaintiraris. Some are well-known sites, like Ald Sotha and Bal Fell. And stone and architecture is unmistakable. Big, dark, grey-green stone ruins, funny angles, funny markings and patterns on the stone. Weird oval crooked doors. And inside, all funny angles.
怎么辨别迪德拉圣祠？它们的名字又长又有趣，比如阿舒尼比比和扎因蒂拉里斯，有些是著名的地点，比如奥德-索萨和巴尔-费尔。石头和建筑都是独一无二的。巨大、阴暗、灰绿色的石头废墟，石头上有奇怪的角度、奇怪的标记和图案。奇怪的椭圆形歪门。里面都是奇怪的角度。 {迪德拉式}

> INFO.NAME little secret 1906331586162422013
You know, people say the Zainab -- and Ashlanders in general -- are lying and untrustworthy. But I think it is partly a problem of pride. If the truth will shame them, they don't want to say it. Among the Ashlanders, no one would be rude enough to force an Ashlander to admit something shameful. But we civilized people, in may ways we are less careful of another's feelings than the Ashlander savages. In particular, the men are very proud. I don't know about the women. We rarely see them here.
你知道，人们说哉纳布人 -- 以及大多的灰烬之民 -- 都在撒谎，不可信。但我认为部分原因是自尊心作祟，如果真相会让他们蒙羞，他们就不想说出来。在灰烬之民当中，没有人会粗鲁到强迫一个灰烬之民承认一些可耻的事情。但我们这些文明人，在某些方面却不如野蛮的灰烬之民那么顾及他人的感受。尤其是男人们非常骄傲，我不了解女人，这里很少见到女人。

> INFO.NAME little secret 3241323702538914393
If you're thinking of traveling up country, near Sheogorad, or out Molag Amur way, or inside the Ghostfence, you need to know about corprus. It's a disease that turns normal creatures into beasts. Turns men into twisted, mad lumps of flesh, superhumanly strong, and full of hatred. You get corprus from fighting with diseased creatures. It's hard to get corprus, but harder to get rid of it. In fact, I hear there is no cure.
如果你想去谢尔格拉德附近的乡下旅行，或者去莫拉格-阿穆尔的路上，或者幽魂之墙内，你得了解尸化病。这种病会把正常生物变成野兽，把人变成扭曲、疯狂的肉块，力量超人，充满仇恨。与患病的生物战斗会得尸化病，得尸化很难，但要摆脱它却更难。事实上，我听说没有解药。 {需要,疾病}

And there's always been hostility between the Temple and the Imperial administration, but since Helseth's accession, the tension between Imperial-leaning Dunmer and Almalexia's supporters is much worse.

We are living in strange times, outlander. The voices that speak in dreams say the Sleeper awakes. Dagoth Ur stirs beneath Red Mountain, and all his hosts shall spill forth and spoil the land.
我们生活在一个奇怪的时代，外地人。梦中的声音说沉睡者苏醒了，达格斯・乌尔在红山下蠢蠢欲动，他所有的敌人都将肆虐这片土地。 {沙尔}

> INFO.NAME latest rumors 2449632375284811909
Everyone is very curious about this outlander who claims to be the Nerevarine.
大家都对这个自称是尼瑞瓦因的外地人非常好奇。

> INFO.NAME latest rumors 277571563029963872
They call them 'corprus beasts.' They come from Red Mountain. Once they were men. Then blight storms come. They walk in the storms. They get sick, grow fat and stupid. Now they wander like mad beasts, killing and eating. Very bad, very bad.
他们称之为“尸化兽”。他们来自红山，他们曾经是人，后来枯萎病风暴来了，它们在风暴中行走，他们生病，变胖，变蠢。现在他们像疯狂的野兽一样游荡，杀戮和进食，非常糟糕，非常糟糕。

所以你被任命为统谏使和尼瑞瓦因，实现了尼瑞瓦因预言。我本来不会相信的，但我的线人向我保证这是真的。如果现在你也能与神殿达成和解，你或许就能联合所有晨风的力量对抗达格斯・乌尔和红山。

我听说你自称是“化身”--传说中重生的尼瑞瓦。我父亲常说，“当你听到难以置信的事情时，不要相信它”。'据我所知，你的故事已经够精彩了，不需要再依赖古老的预言。我建议你以自己的名声为重，把迷信留给先知和圣人吧。

> INFO.NAME latest rumors 2006019135927810663

The Office of the Watch in the Hall of Justice is worried about sending their own Ordinators out after this killer. The rumor is that the Office of the Watch is looking for outside help. You're an outlander. Did you know five other outlanders were killed just the same way?

你听说了吗？七个受害者？在维威克城？全部被割喉？当只有几个外地人被杀时，神殿卫兵并没有大惊小怪。但现在有两个自己人被割喉，正义厅堂的人似乎很担心。我听说监察办事处正在悄悄地四处寻找一些特殊的帮手。任何能在两名神殿卫兵拔出武器之前杀死他们的东西，听起来都需要特别的帮助。 {神殿卫兵们}

With the coast honeycombed with smuggler caves, and Camonna Tong locals carrying tiny packages overland by night, I'll never catch them. But maybe you'll have better luck.
我负责监视苦涩海岸的走私活动，这工作对我来说太大了。他们通过哈拉-奥德和纳尔-莫克运送月亮糖、斯库玛、黑檀矿、锻莫文物等等，你能想到的都有。海岸上到处都是走私者的洞穴，卡莫纳堂的当地人夜里从陆路运送小包裹，我永远也抓不到他们。但也许你的运气会好些。 {幸运}

> INFO.NAME latest rumors 5901169562982028388
I keep tabs on Redoran's conflicts with Hlaalu and Telvanni. It's fairly easy. The Redoran Council is public and above-board, and they openly fund and support strikes against the rogue Telvanni bases. The dispute over Caldera with Hlaalu is more subtle. Redoran feels it should jurisdiction over the ebony mines, but Hlaalu and the Caldera Mining Company out-maneuvered them. Either one of those conflicts could flare into open war. Little we can do about it, but keep the Legion informed.
我一直在关注瑞多然与哈拉鲁和泰瓦尼的冲突。这很简单，瑞多然议会是公开的，光明正大的，他们公开资助和支持对泰瓦尼无赖基地的打击。与哈拉鲁的卡尔德拉之争则更为微妙。瑞多然觉得自己应该对黑檀矿场拥有管辖权，但哈拉鲁和卡尔德拉矿业公司却胜过了他们。这些冲突中的任何一个都有可能演变成公开的战争。我们对此无能为力，只能随时向军团通报情况。

Worried about the Redoran -- who think THEY should own Caldera -- and the Twin Lamps, who want to embarrass the Company or help slaves escape.
我一直在关注卡尔德拉矿业公司。我们都觉得这里面有猫腻--可能有好几件事--但我们还没打入他们的内部。他们可能在偷现金，或者黑檀矿原矿，或者两者兼而有之，但我们还不确定“他们”是谁。公司的安保措施很严密，我们担心瑞多然和双灯会，前者认为卡尔德拉应该归他们所有，后者则想让公司难堪或帮助奴隶们逃跑。 {开锁}

And I don't see why the maps are so important. Smuggling, maybe. But I'm wondering if they're thinking about landing and moving the Legions through here. In case of trouble.
我正试着更新苦涩海岸的地图。这个地区没有商品地图。就是这样。岛屿、山脉、沼泽、湖泊、河流，这是不可能的。我越来越了解这里的沼泽和水道，也许和当地人一样了解，但我无法与当地人融为一体，在西境之痕或灰烬之地也毫无用处。我不明白地图为什么这么重要，也许是为了走私，但我在想他们是不是在考虑，让军团在这里登陆和转移，以防万一。

The Ordinators have their hands full with heretics and dissidents at home. They can't go out chasing Daedra lovers.
神殿禁止崇拜四个邪恶的迪德拉：梅鲁涅斯・大衮、玛拉凯斯、莫拉格・巴尔和谢尔格拉。但这个岛很大，有很多荒野，有很多古老的迪德拉遗迹，正等待着一群新的崇拜者。神殿卫兵们在晨风内忙于对付异端和异见祭司。他们不可能出去追逐迪德拉爱好者。 {迪德拉式,手}

我们很幸运，当我们占领泰尔-沃斯时，我们测试了公爵和其他家族的决心。我们发现他们并不打算为保护定居点而战。我们派出了我们的异类和不满者，去争取新的权益。有些能活下来，有些活不下去。哈拉鲁和瑞多然必须做出回应。但最终，活下来的人将扩大我们在瓦登费尔的势力和影响。

> INFO.NAME recent events 477217101223864261

These creatures were beyond anything dreamt of by the Dwarves, creatures it would take the power of a god to create. I would like you to learn more about the attacks.

> INFO.NAME divine powers 1441615219606315393
Almalexia, Sotha Sil, and I gained our divine powers from the Heart of Lorkhan. And now we no longer have access to the Heart, so we must lose our divinity. I have always worn my divinity lightly -- fundamentally, I am not at all a serious person -- and I will not miss it. I have tried to do what was necessary. I am afraid I have done some harm. I assure you -- I will be quite content to be a mere mortal again, dedicated to my own amusements.
阿玛莱西娅、索萨・希尔和我从洛克汗之心获得了我们的神力。而现在我们已经无法再接近洛克汗之心，所以我们必然失去神性。我总是轻易耗尽我的神力 -- 说到底，我根本不是一个严肃的人 -- 而且我也不会怀念它。我一直试着做必须做的事情。我担心我已经造成了一些伤害。我向你保证 -- 我将非常满足于再次成为一个普通的凡人，投入到我自己的娱乐中去。

> INFO.NAME foolishness 25695289582267421091

I paid for my foolishness, paid in full.  Unfortunately, my wife was made to pay as well.  She caught the Blight shortly after arriving, and her frail constitution couldn't handle it.  I lost her to the damned disease, and it ruined me.  No one could replace her.  None of the women I've ever know could ever replace her.
好吧，就是这样。年轻人的愚蠢。有梦想，有抱负。我愚蠢地追随着它们，带着我的妻子去了瓦登费尔，去追寻那所谓的“伟大冒险”。我为我的愚蠢付出了代价，沉重的代价。很不幸，我的妻子也被迫付出了代价。她在抵达后不久就染上了枯萎病，而她虚弱的体质无法承受。我因这该死的疾病而失去了她，而这也毁了我。没有人可以取代她。我所认识的所有女人都无法取代她。 {枯萎之症}

我明白了。你犯了一个严重的错误。我不相信你的托辞 -- 但我明白一个绝望的人 -- 或轻率的贪婪者 -- 可能会并无恶意却犯下恶行。很好。你可以走了。我想保住我们的秘密办公室…但我不会为此而杀了你。哦，好吧。既然我们的办公室不再是秘密的了，我们就得马上搬迁了。但不要碰这里的任何东西，也不要干涉我和我的同事，否则你别想活着离开这里。

> INFO.NAME almalexia 7665268241406314697
Almalexia is one of the gods worshipped by the Dunmer in the Tribunal Temple. She's known as the Healing Mother and Lady of Mercy, the source of compassion and sympathy, and protector of the poor and weak. She's no tender-hearted powderpuff, though. She's an important symbol of Dunmer independence to those who resent the Empire, and the Hands of Almalexia -- her personal guard -- enforce a strict adherence to Temple doctrines.
阿玛莱西娅是丹莫在审判席神殿中崇拜的神之一。她被称为治愈之母和仁慈圣母，是怜悯之心和同情之源，是穷人和弱者的保护者。不过，她不是个柔情似水的人物。对于那些憎恨帝国的人来说，她是丹莫独立的重要象征，还有阿玛莱西娅之手 -- 她的亲卫 -- 必须严格遵守神殿教义。 {泰姆瑞尔帝国,瓜尔,卫兵}

> INFO.NAME almalexia 3275253052964319925

[怀疑地盯着你。] 如果换作别人，这种说法将是无稽之谈。你有办法证明吗？我不知道该怎么想。如果这是真的，我无法想象会随之而来社会和政治后果。但如果此事被公之于众，我怀疑你会很受丹莫的欢迎。我的建议是对此事保持沉默。我当然会的。我从没有听你说过任何事。我们从没谈过这件事。明白吗？ {沙尔}

> INFO.NAME almalexia 21977287891209022767
[Stares at you thoughtfully.] I believe you are serious. I'm not sure I believe you have killed a living god... though I do think YOU think you have. I doubt you could prove it. And I doubt the priests would believe it... or would admit it, even if it were true. Say nothing about this to anyone. Or... I suppose you can tell who you like. Who would believe you? Fascinating. Simply fascinating. So many possibilities....
[若有所思地盯着你。] 我相信你是认真的。我不太相信你杀了一位现世神…虽然我想你认为你确实杀了。我怀疑你能否证明。我怀疑牧师们是否会相信…或者承认此事，即使这是真的。不要把这件事告诉任何人。或者…我想你可以告诉你喜欢的人，但谁会相信你？有意思，真有意思。这么多种可能……

> INFO.NAME almalexia 859022382304413877
[Stares at you doubtfully.] From anyone else, such a statement would be nonsense. And you have no way to prove this statement? I scarcely know what to think. If true, I can't begin to imagine what the social and political consequences would be. But I doubt you'd be very popular among the Dunmer if this were known. My advice is to keep quiet about this. I certainly shall. I have heard nothing whatsoever from you about this. And we have not spoken. Understand?
[怀疑地盯着你。] 如果换作别人，这种说法将是无稽之谈。你有办法证明吗？我不知道该怎么想。如果这是真的，我无法想象会随之而来社会和政治后果。但如果此事被公之于众，我怀疑你会很受丹莫的欢迎。我的建议是对此事保持沉默。我当然会的。我从没有听你说过任何事。我们从没谈过这件事。明白吗？ {沙尔}

As with the tides and Tamriel's moons, all cosmic powers will wax and wane. But, when gods die, it creates ripples throughout the lands. The passing of the Three will be a prelude to the end of this era, and the beginning of the next. The followers of the End of Times are making ourselves ready for this to happen.
我们信仰的教义非常简单，亲爱的朋友。神圣的审判席，虽然曾经充满了荣耀，但如今的神已不复往日。就像潮汐跟泰姆瑞尔的双月一样，宇宙中的所有力量都会此消彼长。但是，当神死去之时，产生的涟漪将传遍整个大地。三神的逝去将是这个纪元结束的前奏曲，也是下一个时代的开始。正因如此身为时代终结追随者的我们已经做好了准备。

Only the ancestors who have already left this world will remain once the daedric scourge covers the earth. And so he promotes what he calls "the Cleansing."
他们宣扬审判席已经失去了力量，这是末日将至的预兆。恩诺・罗马利教导他的追随者们，我们在泰姆瑞尔已经命数将尽，湮灭之门即将洞开，迪德拉将肆虐这片大地。在那之后，只有那些早已离世的先祖们能留存于世。因此，他宣扬他称之为“清洗”的仪式。 {迪德拉式}

> INFO.NAME goblins 31175272302842530884
Miserable, horrid creatures. They're vile and viscious. They vary in size from smaller than a Bosmer to larger than a Nord. Some are mindless animals; others have learned the ways of magic. You'll often see them with trained Durzogs, another filthy creature.
可悲的、可怕的生物。它们卑鄙无耻，目中无人。它们的大小不一，小的比波斯莫还小，大的比诺德人还大。有些只是没有智慧的动物；有些则学会了掌控魔法。你会经常看到它们和训练有素的杜索格们，另一种肮脏的生物在一起。
